name: A 1776 Masquerade
description: 'A 1776 Masquerade' is a giant historical costume party!  We dress up as a different era of American History everyday and rewrite the history books as we go

name: A Camp With No Name
description: The horse is still dead, and we continue to beat it.  Come by and sit in the desert in A Camp With No Name, where you will be told that buttered popcorn is a perfectly fantastic snow cone flavor - why would you think otherwise? Are you daft?  (Don't worry - there are "normal" flavors galore.)  Look for us carting around chai or tidying up the playa with our vacuum cleaner.

name: Above The Limit
description: Saraswati Tea House's Tea Wallahs and Crystal Cavern's 18 foot fluorescent crystals, comfy pillows and DJs welcome our guests! Those in need of tea, art, empathy, and refreshment during their rites of passage are served by colorful tea wallahs in honor of Saraswati, the goddess of cosmic knowledge. By night, come dance and relax in the 40' Crystal Cavern dome. By day, join us for yoga and the Saraswati Speaker Series featuring presenters from diverse dimensions discussing visionary transformation.

name: Abstininthe
description: Abstininthe is the friendly bar on the playa,providing our special drink to the thirsty of BRC since the last millenium. Come try our many flavors and enjoy the music, ambience and conversation of our neighborhood bar.

hometown:
p Victoria will be embarking upon splendid journeys of light, electricity and sound. Join us in a hand crafted lighter than air adventure.
Hometown: San Francisco, CA
Contact: playaflyer@gmail.com
name: Airship Victoria
Airstreameri and Geologists
description: Dsyfunctionally Disorganized Geologists and Airstreamers with questions for Dusted passerbys. Alice and Wonderland Mad Hatter's croquet game Thursday at 5.

name: Alice in Burningland
description:
We are all mad here! Join us for a trip down the rabbit hole for your own personal "Rites of Passage".

"Eat Me" "Drink Me"...if you dare. Tea and cakes are served at four o'clock.  Follow the Mad Hatter and don't be late!

name: All Power Body Art
description: Airbrush / Body Painting / DJ with Sound System

name: Almost Real World
description: The Almost Real World is an area for people to relax and enjoy an small and intimate musical experience. Open DJ sessions and workshops will be held and musicians are encouraged to drop in and say hello.

name: Alternative Energy Zone village
description: The Alternative Energy Zone village is a home for folks who do NOT have generators and WOULD like to camp in a friendly place. (and most of us know something about solar/wind/human power).  We are open to anyone who asks (and has no gennie).

name: Ambiverts Pagoda of Penance
description: What's an Ambivert? Why it's someone who's both introverted AND extroverted! Tuesday night is Extrovert Night: bring your big personality and come dance, drink, and mingle with some of the most outlandish characters. Too wild for you? Wednesday night is Introvert Night: bring a book or a craft and come by to enjoy some coffee, a simple libation, and pretend to ignore everyone else.

name: Ambrosia
description: Camp Ambrosia invites gods and goddesses to lounge in an uncompromising atmosphere of healing, psychonautical exploration and freestyle interaction. We invite other super-beings to come and sip on smoothies, teas and potions in the comfort of our hammocks and fresh tunes.

name: and then there's only LOVE...
description: Love is the constant that bonds us together and ATTOL continues to be the place to love and be loved. We are full of love, hugs and fun. Join us in our air conditioned Orgy Dome where couples and moresomes play, attend a class, perform on our stage or learn a few tricks on our new pole dancing stage.

name: Angry Birds Camp
description: Angry Birds Camp. Come play Angry Birds on the playa with open play everyday from 1:00-3:00pm. Join us for sling shot fun as you launch stuffed animals to destroy the evil green pigs (and other stuffed animals). Fun for all ages!!

name: Anonymous Village
description: Anonymous Village is a 12 step program based village that holds Alcoholics Anonymous, Narcotics Anonymous, OA, Alanon and other meetings around the clock. We support all of those that want or need support in this harsh desert and party environment. We focus on having maximum fun with group outings, potluck meals and fellowship.

name: AOXOMOXOA
description: Our stage is open for your enjoyment and participation: dance, prance, sing, compose/recite poetry & tell your stories for BRC denizens. Live music from camp mates. Air guitar ongoing. One or more recorded Dead shows daily, a zilch display scheduled for late in the week, a cold one (if you are 21+), fresh water on hand & wacky AOXOMOXOAns at your service for all needs.AKA Scarlet/Fire @ the Mars Hotel, Eyes of the World, the Dead Sea & Beyond the Dead

name: Apocalypse Later
description: Do you experience feelings of impending doom, or maybe you lack the motivation to prepare for Armageddon? If so, come to Apocalypse Later where you can meet fellow lazy fuckers who are preparing to prepare for total annihilation.

name: Apocalypse Lounge
description: If you're looking for a cozy hookah lounge this should be on your stop while out exploring. Enjoy a hookah lounge inside and outside, an interactive mini play land, featuring: adult size sit & spin, hula hoop hoops, and wiffle ball. Come by and say hi!

name: APOKILIPTIKA
description: APOKILIPTIKA 2011- Wrongs of Passage!  Part of Terminal City Village and home to the playa's best Soviet themed camp.

name: Apres Ski BRC
description:
Great white northern border crossing, celebrations and
libations and legendary ski themed party on Wednesday night with old skool tunes.  Frolic with the ski bunnies in the only snow on the playa!  Wear your gear and goggles and come on up to the north to play!

name: AquaZone
description: Entering the empty canvas of the desert, facing your unfettered soul, is a rite of passage -- one that cannot be made without life-sustaining Water. The added beauty of Water is that the wisdom you gain can be transmitted to the Water and thereby transmuted to your body. Come quench your thirst at AquaZone's Water Bar, once again transmitting Intention to the Water for your body and soul's pleasure.

name: Arachnophobia
description: A Gothic cabaret of chaos and music.  Freaks, Gamers, geeks, goths anyone dusty is welcome!

name: Area 51
description: Just drop in and prepare to be abducted! Our beautifully zen chill space, massage tables, frozen healthy smoothies, laser light shows, live music, and parties are out of this world! Not to mention DR. MEGAVOLT'S Tesla coil, which will be featured in our camp! We'll be collaborating with the camps Feed the Artists and the Art of Such N Such, so don't forget to visit our neighbors as well!

name: Art Car Bus Stop
description: Stop chasing after Art Cars! Let them come to YOU! Wait for your ride at the ART CAR BUS STOP. Pass the time in our relaxing lounge. Tickle the senses with our art gallery. Lose something old and find something new at the Lost and Found Office. Get hyped up to the tunes of our superstar DJ's who will be rocking a fully lit neighborhood dance floor. Hurry up and wait at the ART CAR BUS STOP!

name: Art Car Camp
description: Art Car Camp features "Daily Driver" Art Cars that are street legal, insured, and registered vehicles that work their magic beyond Burning Man wherever they go. Come see some of the vehicles that first inspired the proliferation of Mutant Vehicles at Burning Man!

name: ART OF SUCH N SUCH
description:
the art of such n such is a collective force promiting the collaborative effort of the artists in the burningman commuinty nationally and abroad.
this years camp is a conduite to support the success of the honoraium art project "the fire birds of the fifth direction"

name: Art Pirates Studio and the Bad Idea Bar
description: The Art Pirates Studio provides space for creating on the playa with activities ranging from: drawing, painting, sculpting (welding), and various (non-moopy) crafts.  In this studio, you don’t have to worry about how your work turns out, as your bad ideas can be immortalized at the Bad Idea Bar with daily specials!

name: ARTery
description: The headquarters for the Burning Man Art Department.

name: Ashram Galactica Resort and Conference Center
description: After the takeover of the Hotel Ashram Galactica by CocoPocoLocoResortCorp(tm), the members of the former Ashram Galactica were instructed to provide resort and conference facilities.  We offer our clients badminton, miniature golf, bocci, and croquet.  Most importantly, we offer the GER TALKS at AG, a series of public lectures, the idea for which the TED conference totally stole from us.  The preceding has been an approved statement of CocoPocoLocoResortCorp(tm).

name: Astro Cats
description: Astro Cats is a camp for relaxation ,learning about the stars in the night sky, and public talks on astronomical topics in the evenings.

name: Astropups: Camp Pupawannahumpya
description:
Perennially furry, frisky and fabulous, the Astropups invite you to relive the sweaty days of summer camp with a queer kitsch twist (say that three times fast!).
Prepare for pups at play.

name: Ataraxia
description: Your home away from home on the playa. Come and create with us.

name: Automatic Subconscious
description: Boston's longest running Theme Camp is bringing a little East Coast love back to the playa! Come visit.

name: Avant Yard
description:
"What's all amazing that keeps us stargazing? And what do we think we might see?" - Kermit the Frog
Come play with us.

name: Bacon Without Borders
description:
Ambassadors of everyone's favorite gateway meat, Bacon WIthout Borders invites you to let us pork you on the playa & then some. Drink at the Black Rock 31 Flavours Bar,
groove to some tasty beats, and from Bacon O'clock to Bacon Thirty we unite in our love for nature's true meaty wonder in combinations you never thought possible.

name: Bad Idea Theater
description: "To Serve and Project" Bad Idea Theater returns with daily and nightly entertainment in our expanded lounge / theater complex, providing you the best in Psychotronic entertainment and potent potables. Hangovers installed and serviced and movies you just can't unsee

name: BADLANDS
description:
The badlands is an arts collective meant to gather musicians,
painters, dancers and other creatives to spontaneously combust and
make rad shit happen. Come through...

name: Baggage Check
description: Fear of commitment? Catholic guilt? Bitterness over unrequited love?  Come check that baggage with us so that you can experience Burning Man baggage free!  Sunday night all unclaimed baggage will be burned in the temple burn.

name: Balloon Chain Camp
description:
The artist crew camp for Balloon Chain art installation
http://balloonchain.com

name: Bang Bang
description: Camp Bang Bang invites you to experience our progressive art installation- Brites of Passage. Look around, and all you'll see is love.

name: Bar(e) Dairyaire – The Fundue Bar
description: The friends of fundue at Bar(e) Dairyaire will be serving Swiss cheese fondue and building life-sized paper-mache cows. Stop by on your passage and paint the cow's bare derriere to the smell and taste of molten cheese.

name: Barber Ella Shop
description: t’s three days into the burn and you’re already cursing the tangled mess that used to be your hair. Come get it dyed, styled, or just plain buzzed at Barber Ella Shop, the interplanetary playa salon that wants to give you a mohawk while surrounding you with Barbarella impersonators dressed in silver spandex à la the 1970’s class sexploitation hair-strazaganza.

name: BARBIE DEATH CAMP
description: Serving the finest "Barbiebera" for over a decade to the elite denizens of Black Rock City in our climate controlled Bistro with over a thousand Barbies to entertain the wildest of fantasies. We are Kernul Killbucks guilty pleasure and Doc Pyro is a DOG, uh, I mean GOD!

name: Barbie Death Village
description: Now in our third year on the playa, Barbie Death Village, with it's well-known subcamps Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Eden, Black Rock City Body & Paint, Loose Nutz, Preserved In Time, Boosh: The Canadian Splinteer Squad, and Clan O'Crash welcome you to the best damn village on the playa.  Come by and enjoy a nice glass of cabernet sauvignon, an Otter Pop, or nice cocktail while being entertained by the Barbiebarians, the sickest bastards on the playa.

name: Basscouch
description: Come take a load off at Basscouch and stay for a sub-sonic frequency journey that will leave you begging for more. Colorado's own mountain grown bass experience is on playa to serve your auditory resepticals.

name: Bat Country
description: Bat Country invites you to relive some of the first rites of passage. Pain, patience, acceptance, sharing, fear, joy…yes, the kindergarten playground. Of course our carousel is a bar but we'll have swings, a slide, see saws and other ritualistic devices. Of course we'll be bringing back Hunter S Tuesday and other Gonzo favorites. As the good doctor said; Buy the ticket, take the ride...

name: Bayesian Conspiracy
description: The Bayesian Conspiracy is a multinational, interdisciplinary, and shadowy group of scientists dedicated to saving the world. We devote ourselves to refining the art of human rationality and bringing about a positive Singularity.

name: bearwhalea
description: We're all just cogs here, spinning and meshing and grinding and churning out solar-baked toast for our Toast Bar.  When assembled correctly, we can be persuaded to produce slacklines, ziplines, and the ubiquitous hoop making clinic. And bearwhales.

name: Becky-ville
description: Becky Ville is the playa home of the performance troop called THE BECKYS. The Beckys will entertain their visitors as they pass through and visit playa surfers.

name: bEEcHARGE!!!
description: We are the Bees of bEEcHARGE!!!, which means we buzz around and swarm folks, serve Labeetos (Honey Based Mojitos), and do our Amazing Bee Line Dance...  And if you wear the black and yellow, then you are a BEE too!  Join us in a swarm!

name: Bell Camp
description: Visit Bell Camp and climb the three bi-level observation tower, or find a spot in our cargo net lounge. Ring our large namesake Bell, and exit through our Corridor of Passage while bathed in gently undulating colored lights.

name: BFA Camp
description: What is "BFA" all about? Stop by this friendly camp and learn for yourself.

name: Big Lebowski Camp
description: Come enjoy not only a man, but a way of life where the bowling is good, the white russians are cold, and the rug really ties the room together..."Shut the fuck up Donny!"

name: Big Puffy Yellow Camp
description: SunTea, Lounge music, Massage, Body art, Stimulating conversation, Temporary adhesion, Orifice management ...it's all here for you at BIG PUFFY YELLOW!

name: Biggest Lil S'mores on the Playa
description: We're back!  Your Biggest Lil S'mores on the Playa invite YOU to come & Indulge~ Tues/Wed/Thurs ~ 5-7p,m. at the corner of 9:30 & G!

name: Bike Course Camp
description: Support camp for the Bike Course builders, come on by and ride our mini-course at camp.

name: Bioliminati / Pimp Yr Bike
description: Bioluminati has been illuminating BRC for 16 years with art, quests and now PIMP YR BIKE; the bling-ification station where Black Rock Citizens upgrade their rides with that extra get-up-and-glow. Open daily. Donors of non-moopy craft materials get VIP access! And every evening, Micro-Cinema!

name: BIQ HQ
description: BIQ HQ - Headquarters for the BIQ Quick Repair stations located around the Playa.

name: Black Planet
description: Make your future perfect at Black Planet, live in radiant health, become an active participant in your government. DE-PROGRAMMED film festival showcasing documentaries and visually stunning sci-fi films. Featuring daily vegan food and snack giveaways, workshops on health, animal rights and sustainability, and interactive political art installation: Habeas Corpus. Deep vibrations emanate from the BlackDome: DJs Veganinblack & Dominion spin  darkwave to dubstep. Dance in the dark with us...

name: Black Rock Bakery
description: A holy order devoted to the creation of piping hot baked goods. As each batch of exquisite pastries, breads, and pizzas emerges fresh from our propane and solar ovens, a dedicated squad of warrior monks rushes the delectables to you, tireless in their journey until their destination is reached.

name: Black Rock Beacon
description: The Black Rock Beacon will be producing a daily newspaper for Black Rock City with a mix of fun articles and serious news. Our Press Club & News Room will provide shade and refreshment for ourselves as well as other members of the press and interested Burners.

name: Black Rock Botanica
description: Tarot and palm readings, candle magic, essential oils and infusions, talismans and other expressions of the mystical arts find their home behind an unassuming storefront in the French Quarter. Craft your own spirit mask, or bring a trinket from the object of your desire (or ire) and customize a voodoo doll in their image. Offerings of the sacred and the profane are encouraged to keep the botanica stocked.

name: Black Rock Boutique
description: Helping the citizens of Black Rock City stay fabulous with funky, furry, freaky fashions. Open Daily. Donations accepted.

name: Black Rock Brewery
description: In eternal devotion to the magic of hop and yeast, the Black Rock Brewery brings together home brewers from around the world, to share their honey ales, lavender meads, ginger beers, and dozens of other exotic concoctions for your drinking pleasure. Join us for contests, lessons, and tastings!

name: Black Rock Center for Unlearning (BRCU)
description: Got Too much on your mind? All those facts and figures got you down? At the Black Rock Center for Unlearning you’ll finally let go of the burdens of knowledge. Let our UNtrained professionals help you UNfigure out where you don’t want to go and what you don’t want to become.

name: Black Rock City Airbrush
description:
Black Rock City Airbrush is back!
This camp resides within the Sin City Village and offers the finest custom airbrushed T-shirts and body art made just for you! “You-say-it-we-spray-it"
We are creating MAXIMUM participation from gifted patrons!
Expect to participate, and/or take a guerilla course in airbrushing! You may even find yourself running our booth while we sneak away.

Enthusiasm, Curiosity, Compliments, Flirting, Patience, and Cold Beer go a long way at our camp!

name: Black Rock City Body & Paint
description: BRC Body & Paint, nestled within Barbie Death Village, has been voted "Best body paint camp on the playa" and is your Critical Tits headquarters.  Whether you want your boobs highlighted or your entire chest and face done by our "Playa Picassos", come by for the finest body painting around.  We'll be open most days and all day Friday, preparing all of the lovely sirens for the big Critical Tits parade.  Wine will also be available.

hometown:
MENT OF MOBILITY
At BLACK ROCK CITY DEPARTMENT OF MOBILITY, we offer the gift of mobility to disabled Burners who might have difficulty traveling to the far reaches of Black Rock City. It is our goal to expand and enhance the opportunities for our Themecamp guests to PARTICIPATE!
Hometown: Oakland, CA
Contact: BRCMobility@gmail.com
name: Black Rock City Department of Mobility
Black Rock City Epitaph
description: Visit the Black Rock City Epitaph to have a Living Obituary or Society Page announcement created for you or by you. Writers,  artists and editors will publish a daily "mural" edition of the Epitaph.

name: Black Rock City Post Office
description: There's no team in Fuck You We provide service and delivery of your U.S. and playa mail, on and off the playa. Come trade post cards, stamps and other art. We provide performance art, socialization, integration, and certified citizenship. Join us to, make a post card, work a window, deliver the mail or just for a laugh.

name: Black Rock City Recycle Camp
description: Black Rock City Recycle Camp is a participant produced & participant supported camp that wants you to bring us all of your aluminum cans. Separate all of your trash, to dispose of properly, and then come find us in Center Camp on the corner of 6:00 and the Center Camp Ring, where you get to crush your cans on the State-of-the-Art can crushing machine..!

name: Black Rock City Weddingmobile Camp
description: Mobile Legal Wedding Chapel. Cosmic Dancer officiates Weddings with the Black Rock City Weddingmobile

name: Black Rock Film Fest
description: Our open air theater will show the best short films from around the world to an international audience of art and film lovers who descend on Burning Man every year for fun, art and experience in the northern Nevada desert. Films do not need to be about Burning Man, we seek to present a showcase of the best short films from around the world about any subject.

name: Black Rock French Quarter
description: The heart of the Big Easy come to Black Rock City, including cocktails, bakery, fresh roasted coffee, botanica and voodoo shop, live music and burlesque, gumbo cookery, brewery, wine cellar, Mardi Gras, jazz funeral for the Man, vineyard, and a few other surprises. Our French Quarter buildings are based on an open design that your camp can build to join us!

name: Black Rock Hardware Shoppe
description: The name says it all. Serving Black Rock City for over 11 years, BRC Hardware Shoppe is on-site with a mess of tools and supplies to help fix or build anything on the playa. If it ain't broke, we'll fix it till it is!

name: Black Rock Kwoon and Dojo
description: The ancestral training ground for the warrior monks of BRC, in which you may explore various martial arts and philosophies. In between classes and training sessions, the monks are an elite delivery service, carrying goods from the Black Rock Bakery, Black Rock Vineyards, and Black Rock Brewery to the four corners of the city.

name: Black Rock Lemoande
description: Cold Lemonade for hot dusty humans. This is the place to come and get you thirst on ! Non-alcoholic , DJ's to swing to , hoop's to play with and people to smile with you ! Come play on our new Super sized pool table !

name: Black Rock Local 447
description: Black Rock Local 447 is like your favorite bar a not a techno warehouse or an ultralounge, but the classic neighborhood watering hole that you can't get enough of. We are all folks who work for Burning Man, and we offer you a friendly, fun environment for beating the heat and seeing what makes this.

name: Black Rock Neighborhood Association (BRNA)
description: The Black Rock Neighborhood Association (BRNA) is a Sacramento based theme camp that exists to enhance the overall quality of life in Black Rock City and to support the commonwealth of its Burners. BRNA achieves its mission by: 1. Creating and maintaining the Tree House Park for fellow Burner's enjoyment. 2. Hosting a Community Meeting for all Burners on Thursday September 1st. 3. Building community by joining neighbors together through Burning Man's 10 Principals.

name: Black Rock Preparatory Funcademy of Positivity
description: The Prepatory and Funcademy of Positivity is here to let you reclaim that most awkward rite of passage: school! Come play double-dutch, climb on a jungle gym or retake that “under the sea” prom picture with someone you actually have a shot with.

name: Black Rock Rest Stop
description: Black Rock Rest Stop is a place to rest your face or have some space. Vacant or not...this is your spot.

name: Black Rock Roller Disco
description:
There's a place on the playa where the funk and disco beat will have you rollin' nonstop!!!  Make tracks to the Black Rock Roller Disco where you can roller skate on the playa all day and all night.  The Black Rock Rollergirls will be slamin' the competition with all girl roller derby Thursday, Sept 1 and the bar ia always open.  You can even show ohh your foosball skills!!!

Stop by and say hi!!!!!

name: Black Rock Spatial Delivery
description:
Our uniformed bike messengers have served our community with playawide delivery services for your missives, parcels, letters, schwag since 1999.

This year we are recruiting the stout of heart and the sturdy of sinew to join our legions of deliverators . . . more riders, more bikes, more deliverators! Interested parties should contact BlackRockSpatialDelivery at gmail.com

name: Black Rock Supper Club
description: A showcase for culinary and mixological talents from around the world. Since 2006, the supper club has hosted gourmet candlelit dinners with musical accompaniment for artists, builders, and all the other folks who make the magic of BRC possible. Are you a chef or performer with a talent to share?

name: Black Rock Syndicate
description:
A day time oasis with shade and the some of the brightest electronic producers and DJ's spinning house, electro and techno.

Have a drink at our bar or get cooled in palm oasis by the water cannons.

name: Black Rock Travel Agency
description:
Instead of a pithy comment this year, let's have H.L. Mencken say a few words:
"For it is mutual trust even more than mutual interest that hold human associations together-our friends seldom profit us but they make us feel safe."
"Every normal man must be tempted at times to spit on his hands, hoist the black flag, and begin to slit throats."

name: Black Rock Vineyards
description: Producers of the first and only wine grown, pressed, and aged entirely in Black Rock City! Established in 1999, the vineyards have nurtured a cutting of the nearly extinct carnivorous Cabernet Dionaea for 12 years to yield the acclaimed Vinum Pejorative - vintners and wine lovers, stop by for a sip!

name: Black Rock Wine Cellar
description: The unrelenting heat of the Black Rock Desert is no place for wine! If you have a special bottle in need of tender loving care, we invite you to check your bottle into our refrigerated subterranean facility, where it will await your return under lock and key. And while you're here, why not join us for a tasting of some of the bottles we brought to share?

name: Blacklight Aquarium, The
description: Headed to the playa from the portapotty and lost your way, or vice-versa? Are you finding your passage to be utterly unrighteous? Seek the wisdom of playa oracles Maestro or Wolf-Cow. One may assist; the other may be pissed. Either way, you'll eventually end up where you're supposed to be.

name: BLD
description: Dusty on the playa since 1953!

name: Blue Oasis
description: Each evening movies will be presented in the Blue Oasis Theater. Enjoy movies on a big screen under the stars with full stereo sound. Our film collection includes big name feature films, cult movies and true art collectables. Or, bring your own (DVD format only) and arrange for a special showing. The planned program for each night will be displayed on the marquee at the front of the theater.

name: BMIR, Burning Man Information Radio 94.5 FM
description:
BMIR, Burning Man Information Radio 94.5 FM
The voice of Black Rock City and your source for official news, information, music and madness.  http://www.bmir.org and http://www.shoutingfire.com

name: Bocce Ballsy: A Division of Debocceri
description: Do you have fun with balls? Wanna play with ours? Join our crew at Bocce Ballsy: A Division of DeBocceri, International Bocce Ball Camp, for Bocce Ball Tournament, Dance Party and Happy Hour!

name: Bojon Balance Camp
description: Join Bojon Balance Camp for Rite of Passage Cocktail Hours Thursday, Friday and Saturday late afternoon. Explore the Friend Machine to discover when you cross the invisible boundary from being strangers to friends.

name: Boo Boo City
description: Boo Boo City is a teeming borough and twisted version of Mr. Rogeras Neighborhood that incorporates a deli (Mikey’s Hug Deli), a theater (The Litter Box), a place to get lost in your mind (Brain Wave Escape), and the biggest, most sweetie-pie stray cat (Boo Boo Kitty).

name: Booby Bar
description:
The B(o)(o)by Bar, a social gathering place for new and returning burners alike, consists of two well-tanned domes that house the best damned bar on the playa. The B(o)(o)by Bar is a theatrically interactive place have a drink,
 meet new friends, laugh, and enjoy each day of life in BRC.

name: Boonville Cabaret
description: the Boonville Cabaret offers a stage and a lounge with a bar. We also have an art car decorated as a Gypsy Wagon.

name: boot docks
description: come join the party

name: Bootiful and Rayical
description: With the full intention of bring peace, love and make the world a happier and smarter place, one touch and one word at a time.

name: Bounce!
description: Bounce camp is back on the playa, louder, bolder, rounder, and rolling to you. Hold on to your disco and leave the dogs at home, cause I do not listen to bounce very much, but when I do....I take one of these, I grab two of these and I bring you bitches down to your knee.  Let's do this this!

name: Bouncy Bouncy Club
description: The BBC - A jolly good place to bounce .... and home of "Le Bon Temps BRC," a great New Orleans bar on the playa.

name: Brain Freeze / Got Stickers Camp
description: Brain Freeze / Got Stickers Camp will be stickers of all sorts during the event. Stop by and find some stickers and if you are over 21 you may enjoy a frozen margarita.

name: Brand-UR-Ass N' More
description: Brand-UR-Ass N' More will stimulate your entire being, from ur mind to ur ass. Bare ur butt at the hitchin post, get a painless temporary brand, get costumed at Suburban Slippage, have a drink at the Martini Bar or get some gong vibes. Y'all come and play!

name: BRC Animal Control
description:
Since 2001, Black Rock City Animal Control (BRCAC) has tagged and inoculated countless playa animals. Safety and security from wild and rabid animals are our promises to you on Playa. We make no other promises. 
BRCAC also continues to celebrate interactivity with playful shticks, such as Demolition Enforcement Agency, Tequila Pit Crew, and our quest to find the "Winner" of Burning Man with Trophy Camp.

name: BRC Boobwash
description: BRC Boobwash! come on by to spin to win, we will be handing out boobwashes, boobwaxes (sunscreen) drinks, prizes and goodtimes!!

name: BRC Buhpartment of Buhfense
description: The mission of The BRC Buhpartment Of Buhfense is to protect our city from The Enemy and its Stuffed Animals of Malicious Intent.  Join us for basic training in our interactive human-sized maze, at boot camp, and enlist in the Buhfense of Black Rock City by participating in patriotic levels of mockery.

name: BRC Bureau of Misinformation
description: Are you lost? Are you looking for the meaning of life or maybe just the way to Center Camp?  Swing by the BRC Bureau of Misinformation, where we promise to answer all your burning questions with weird, wild, and witty responses. Our (mis)information booth doubles as a bar, so if you don't get the answer you want, we'll do our best to drown your sorrows!

name: Bread Camp
description: Come to Bread Camp for sustenance from our wood-fired oven or from the camaraderie of humans.

name: Brokedown Palace
description: Come have a cocktail, dance to the Grateful Dead and enjoy the liquid light show.  The party starts before sundown and ends whenever...What a long strange trip it's been.

name: Brooklyn California
description: Establishing a peace between East and West since 2007.  Reggae, soul and sleep till Brooklyn.

name: Bubble Tea
description: Bubbles, bubbles everywhere and drops to drink for all. Dispensing boba filled yummy tea for all you parched playa peeps.

name: Bubbles and Bass
description:
BUBBLY WITH LOTS OF BASS!

We will be rockin' you out during the AM hours with bubbly bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa, dance the morning away, and cheers with a glass of bubbly!

name: BuddhaCamp@theLotusDome
description: When deluded one is an ordinary being when enlightened one is called a Buddha. Every human being can manifest their ultimate potential and live a life of true happiness through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo. BuddhaCamp@theLotusDome Bringing True Buddhism to the playa since 2007!

name: Buffalo Nation
description: native american tradition alive and present -- evening come sit at our burial ground to listen to native american story telling, participate in a drum circle, pipe smoking ceremony; daytime come learn some words in lakota, how  to weave baskets, how to heal yourself with herbs and alternative methods;

name: Bumblepuss
description: In the year 1050 BCE, an idea began to grow. An idea so revolutionary that it would need to ruminate, morph, and gestate to perfection. For thousands of years, it floated in space. In 2007 CE, a group of non-talented, uneducated, uninspired individuals merely sat in a room unable to speak. This group was actually unimportant. Yet, beside them in the room, a motivated, frolicking, bubbling team found themselves smacked in the face with an idea. Bumblepuss was born.

name: Bunnyside
description: In the year of the rabbit, the West Side Canadian Chapter of the Global Bunny Nation will come together to create a Rite of Passage for all Burner Brethren in Black Rock City 2011.  Journey Down The Rabbit Hole and emerge as a sentient furry being on The Bunnyside.

name: Bureau of Artistic Development
description: The Bureau of Artistic Development: Apply for Creative License.

name: Bureau of Unclaimed Secrets
description:
Have a secret...leave a secret!  Need a secret...take a secret!

Stop by to unlock and share the secrets of your Rites of Passage or relax with the bureaucrats.

name: Burmingham Observatory
description: Burmingham Observatory is a place for learning, creative thinking, and mental enrichment. We are providing telescopes for nighttime stargazing and daytime playagazing. We encourage all new astronomers and even children, as we will provide basic starmaps and instruction so that you can view the night sky like never before. Come enjoy talks with our informative space advocates, lounge around and share ideas, all over a nice cup of hot coco!

name: Burn Academy
description: The Burn Academy is a Fire Conclave that provides community interaction through teaching fire performance workshops.  We will also host fire performances, teach fire safety education, and provide open spin jams where we will engage people in guided performances within a safe structural environment.

name: Burn Again Campers
description: Burned out on Burning Man? No more...because it's time to be a "burn again camper" and let our Burner Virginity Rejuvenation technicians recapture your lost playa innocence without all that unsightly cynicism.

name: Burner Beach
description: Burner Beach!

name: Burners Without Borders
description: For the past 5 years, Burners Without Borders has been bringing innovative solutions to real world problems around the world and you are invited to bring it to your communities. Come check out the amazing projects this community has undertaken while dancing to the best live music the playa has to offer as you create poi and art for ongoing BWB projects.

name: burning flix camp
description:
We will show classic comedy flx every evening.

Tuesday and Thursday night at midnight we will show "Rocky Horror Picture Show"

We supply real popcorn from a old time popper.

Stop by during the day to relax in the shade and chat about ??

name: Burning Man Earth
description: Making cartography from chaos... A dedicated team of artists, coders, and software developers have created tools to help you locate others, schedule and find themecamp events, artwork, and much more. This project is aimed at providing a digital space which encompasses the entire event and community, both in BRC and in archival form, long after the dust has settled.

name: Burning Man Studios
description: Started by some creative types, in the entertainment industry and otherwise, to share with the BM community.  Drop by for some serious advice/discussions about the entertainment world, some very un-serious bs sessions, or just to say hello.

name: Burning Souls
description: Come join Burning Souls in a psychedelic adventure of sight and sounds.  Kick your shoes off, grab a drink and absorb the energy.

name: Burning Stump
description:
Blukis the traveling Stump in BM: in pagan traditions in Lithuania and many other IndoEuropean countries are popular myths of stealing and conquering back the Sun, Blukis - symbol of undertheearth beings and energies of the underworld spirits. Drag Blukis around and burn it is an action of freeing the Sun. Blukisdraggers not only welcome the new sun, they burn their old fears, emotional baggage, everything that is old and needs to be born again..
Burn your Badluck with us!

name: Burntown Reverses the Rights
description: Don't call it a comeback; we've been here for years!  Cross the Rope Bridge of TERROR if you dare...Expect the un-expected in the General Store.  Dance the night away listening to your favorite DJ's. Chillax the day away in the beanbag dome of sleepy cuddle puddle.

name: Bus Depot Camp
description: Our camp is a working camp!  We dedicate ourselves to the Bus Depot, which services the public, in their attempts to return to Gerlach or Empire by way of Green Tortoise transportation.  We work hard, and party harder!

name: Busted!
description: Busted! offers a refuge from the elements, with ample shade, soft comfortable seating, and colorful loose walls that allow for the breeze to flow through. Busted! is a meeting place for the Burning Man community, an inviting environment where people can relax and swap stories over glasses of iced tea. As gracious playa hosts, our camp members foster and encourage interaction among strangers walking by calling them in to share a drink with other fellow participants, while helping them regenerate.

name: Cabana Club
description: The Cabana Club is an oasis of hospitality and friendship.  We serve up a refreshing array of nosh and cocktails for your Afternoon Delight and a variety of late-night themed events for the travelers of Black Rock City.

name: Cafe de la Fin du Monde
description: Coffee was meant to be roasted fresh just moments before you enjoy it! Join us on our shaded patio to start those lazy mornings, and cap off those crazy nights with a cup of the darkest expression of God's love. And remember to bring your own raw beans to share!

name: Cafe Nëgrø
description: Cafe Nëgrø provides aural and oral transformative rituals for your morning, featuring the finest in black coffee and black metal. Come for our 1 PM hour of darkness and ready yourself for the new day.

name: Cafe Village
description: Home to our Center Camp Cafe set-up, event & clean-up volunteers.

name: Camp 11:11
description:
Celebrate 11:11--11:11 is a catalyst to unite people. It's a totally vertical
moment in time. Make a wish at 11:11. Have a shot, give a kiss, or smoke a
smoke at 11:11. Flame on at 11:11. Orgasm at precisely 11:11. Does anyone know
what time is it? Its 11:11. Come help us discover 11:11 at Camp 11:11

name: Camp 54
description: Camp 54!  This year featuring our instillation "Symphony 54... in FU Sharp".  It's an interactive sculpture garden of amorphous percussive instruments made of recycled pvc tubing from domes from years past.  The instruments will be reactive to the wind and allow participants to create and experiment with an amazing scientific demonstration of acoustics of sound in tubes of all shapes and diameters.

name: Camp Acoustic Combustion
description: As the flames groove to the rhythm and the beat of the music grows more intense, you find you have a choice.  Do let the dancing carry you away, absorb your senses in the flames, or perhaps, pick up an instrument and make the flames dance yourself.  If you have your own instrument, perhaps you'll bring it to the party with you.  There's always room for one more...

name: Camp al Azar
description: Camp al Azar has artisans of all kinds, prepared to turn your body into a masterpiece. Relax to our live music, and have a cocktail, as we use a combination of airbrushed dyes and stencils, pattern rollers, stamps and fine brushed handwork in a myriad of non-toxic colors and combinations to transform you into walking art extraordinaire! Painting stations will be open every day noon to dusk.

name: Camp Armageddon
description: Armageddon - it's not the end of the world, it's the Safe Word! Armageddon is the cool place to chill, so drop by and set a spell in our living room. Bring your bike too, if it needs some love.

name: Camp Bacchanalia
description: Come celebrate Adolescent Rites of Passage from across the ages! Wear your best gender-bending formal attire to our “Drag Yourself to Playa Prom”. Join us for a Bacchanal with Satyrs, Nymphs, Gods & Goddesses, then on to the Trojan Horse procession. And it’s fun in the dust at the college rite everyone loves to hate, Spring Break 2011: La Playa! Mutant vehicle driver’s licenses issued daily, laminated with your photo.

name: Camp Beaverton
description: Camp Beaverton for Wayward Girls is a community for Gay & Queer Women, Lesbians, Bisexuals, Dykes, Sluts, Butches, Bois, Transfolk, Bi-curious and beyond. We provide a kick-ass, inclusive queer oasis in BRC for women and a continuing conversation exploring female and feminine queer sexuality.

name: Camp BurningGLAM
description: Being on the Playa, it's hard to be GLAM, but here at Camp BurningGLAM, that's how we roll.  Glamping is our RITE OF PASSAGE. Catch a ride in our limo, or come party with us for our PROM PARTY or the BIG BRIDAL BASH, but remember, you gotta get GLAM!

name: Camp Burnowanna
description: Revisit that rite of passage known as summer camp. Camp activities will include craft projects, a scavenger hunt, and other summer camp activities, with a Playa spin.

name: Camp Camp Lounge
description: Camp Cat Lounge, a place to trade barter free cat inspired garments...MEOW

name: Camp Caribbean
description: Playing world music & beats from the islands all day long including, salsa, merengue, dancehall, reggae, African beats, Brazilian beats & more. Stop by on Thursday at 2pm for our annual mojito dance party.

name: Camp Cat Lounge
description: cat camp lounge...a place to trade, barter, free cat inspired garments check it out.MEOW

name: Camp Cats!Cats!Cats!
description: Hosting the 2011 Critical Cats Bike Ride.

name: Camp CAUTION!
description: Part carnival, part miniature golf course, all CAUTION!, and the reason the back of the ticket was written.

name: Camp Chant
description: Daily DJ chanting with Deva Premal, Krishna Das, Wah, Kirtana ect.. and a beautiful "Illuminate the Fire Within" Workshop!

name: Camp Charlie
description: Camp Charlie is a land of sweets and joy, and joyness... plus home of Charlie the Unicorn and the Choo Choo Shoe art cars.  We've found a map to Candy Mountain so join us on our adventure as we cruise the Playa with fire and lights, while our amazing DJ lineup pumps out sweet sugary goodness!

name: Camp Conduit
description: Camp Conduit - gifting sun hats, hemp bondage rope, and knot instruction to the masses.  In 2010, Camp Conduit rose from the ashes of the disaster-stricken Pepper Conduit of 2008.  Returning in 2011 with more hats, more rope, and more fabulous accessories!

name: Camp Coracao
description: From Camp Coracao, Matthew and Daniel are transporting tons of chocolate in coolers w/dry ice, and carting them out to mid playa where they will gift crisp, cool perfect pieces of raw-chocolate to burningman participants to, "re-up these kids serotonin levels".

name: Camp Cow
description: Moooooooove on over to camp cow for your daily fix of body paint, branding, and delicious baked goods! Bring out the kid in you with a glass of cold milk and fresh cookies while we deck you out in some farm-fresh hide! You're guarantee'd to leave with a full stomach and a smile with plenty of good vibes to spread the dairy love. We love our vegan brothers and have plenty of alternatives to share

name: Camp Cul-de-Sac
description: Feeling homesick? Not for this home, but the OTHER one - in the OTHER world? If so, then Camp Cul-de-Sac is the place to be. We are the remedy to your longing for the comforts and familiarity of the suburbs ... just a few radial arms away. Don't worry. We won't tell.

name: Camp Cut! Cut!
description: Providing materials for the urban guerrilla! Create stencils for your burn, and share your art with fellow Burners!

name: Camp D.O.A.
description: Camp DOA is an exciting and fun-loving group of rock climbers, mountaineers, skiers, kayakers and, of course, Burners!  We offer  libations, music, conversation, dancing, hooping, and a spot to relax.  We serve the best wine and champagne in Black Rock City!!  So come in, have a seat, and share with us the decadent outdoor adventures you like to do while you enjoy a nice glass of champagne or wine!

name: Camp Dark Slide
description: Feeling adventurous? Come take a ride on the Dark Slide! Don't feel like taking you life in your hands? Come by and try you hand at our challenging 9 hole miniature golf course. Maybe just hang out in the shade with some "seasoned" burners.

name: camp dawdle
description: taking life at light speed and reducing it to a dawdle...noodling doodlers dawdling aimlessly evolving not and some toward the fun in the desert we know as burning man.

name: Camp Delicioso & Creperie
description: Wake up to freshly made crepes! Delicious friends from all over the globe will serve up our legendary treats to get your day started.

name: Camp Do Nothing
description: Earn a pendant!  Wanna come play on our jungle gym, have a go at a giant twister game, or participate in a PE class from your elementary school days?  Then come visit Camp Do Nothing and relive your youth!  The only challenge now are the tequila shots we'll have lined up for you after every game and the fact that we really do have a group exercise instructor on "staff" so be prepared to sweat!  HURRAH!

name: Camp Eden
description:
Camp Eden, a sister camp of Barbie Death Camp, provides massages, apple vinegar foot baths and aura healing. A quiet camp dedicated to rebooting the energy of a friend who looks to find solace and tranquility amongst the hustle and bustle of BRC. Let yourself relax and heal from the gifts our camp mates have to offer.

***Certified Massage Therapists and healing friends will be circulating throughout the camp. Just ask our friends in Barbie Death Camp where to navigate!

name: Camp Envy
description: Through the Wormhole Nutters from around the world have found their way Home!  Stop by Camp Envy and let your Inner Burner come out of The Closet!

name: Camp Foster
description: Welcome to Burner Summer Camp! Our Camp Counselors provide love, support, activities, games, and workshops for Burners who want to get away from it all. Our activities are mostly geared towards adults of drinking age, but we have playground equipment and activities for all ages!

name: Camp Fun Your FACE
description: Camp Fun Your FACE provides lawn games for your idle amusement! Stop by for a rousing game of badminton, bocce ball, croquet, and many board games in the shade.

name: Camp Gallavant
description: Ahoy from the Pirates of the Playa (infamous creators of the Mutant Vehicle, USS Nevada). We have the "gall" to Gallavant around the playa spreading fun and adventure throughout the City, so, visit us, enjoy the Arrgh Bar and hop a ride on a Mutant Vehicle at the #1 loading station for the Un-Official Public Transit System of Black Rock City!

name: Camp Good Time Island
description: Come visit us and you'll be "Good Timed"! Stop by to visit our jungle and get a ice cold bandana.

name: Camp Here
description: Your home away from home, all grown up and better than you remember. Come relax, have a drink and play with our toys!

name: Camp Herring Scale:Burners
description:
We're six Norwegians planning to attend Burning Man 2011 in a special way.
Not in person, but as figures in a down-scaled theme camp.
The scale we have chosen is 1:87 and the camp will fill about one cubic foot
of playa space. We want to get registered as an official theme camp.
It's an important issue for the project that all matters concerning the camp
are in proper scale, in this case 1:87.

name: Camp Hot Mayo
description: We are an open and friendly camp that enjoys good people and good times!  We are having 2 large parties this year to share our experience w/ our community!

name: Camp Insex
description: We love all things arthropod. Come ask questions, share tattoos, enjoy insect and spider stories and our Chiton Kama Sutra.

name: Camp Inspiratum
description: Inspiratum is home to the inspiration to build, create, or play.  Come fire the Crossbow Glowstick Shooters, climb the 46' Lighthouse, relax in a hammock beneath the palm trees, or check out the numerous human and otherwise powered machines that live in the outer courtyard.

name: Camp Jackpot
description: Camp Jackpot find your inner child is an place a magical as Narnia! With guided meditations, morning yoga, sunset drum circles, monkey chanting.....and our 4th year running mid afternoon  show and tell sangria!

name: Camp Make Good Choices
description: Make Good Choices! Stop at our camp- we are great listeners! We guarantee a good time with cocktails, laughs, spanks, fun events and sensual readings! Participate at our re-virginization station-let us help you enjoy your burn!

name: Camp Mayhem
description: Including unicycle trials...Not your fucking Khakis!

name: Camp Monkey Business
description:
Camp Monkey Business is an all inclusive no-holds barred camp made up of veterans (13+ years) and virgins. We believe in the power of soft rock and cold beverages. We also believe in not taking ourselves too seriously and really not taking our neighbors seriously (especially their requests to stop playing soft rock). Who knew that soft rock and frozen beverages could unite so many. 
2-4pm Soft Rock Parties Tuesday –Thursday. With Open Bar
Sporadic loving harassment with Megaphones.

name: Camp Mystic
description: Mystics are a medley of creative talent & energy. Inspired by a sense of mystery & wonder, we perceive the consciousness of We Are All One. Mystics encourage the enigmatic spirit to explore a deeper connection not only on this planet and all that exists within, but the realm of the entire universe.

name: Camp Narc
description: Come one, come all, titties big, titties small; the totter, it towers, the beer hath magic powers.  A fine microbrew, a hell of a view, there is no need to fear the Camp Narc crew!

name: CAMP O!HELL'YA'N'SHIT!
description: A tye-dye themed camp featuring a DJ, dance-stage, bar and twenty-five foot tye-dye dome. As well as an "Old School Jams" night.

name: Camp of Misfit Toys
description: Are you a misfit toy? Do you wish you had a home. Well you do at Camp of misfit toys, why stay at Misfit Island, when Santa will be here first. Come join in some christmas fun, or just be a Misfit Toy.

name: Camp Peace of Ass; aka Camp Bootylicious
description: Camp Peace of Ass, aka Camp Bootylicious; supports the vulnerable, sumptuous, cheeks of biking Burners as they travel the vast, coarse playa environment. The repetitive motion propelling your steed, up and down, fast or slow, hard or soft over and over again demands the protection and shield available only from Camp Peace of Ass; colorful, hand-crafted, fleece bicycle seat covers that are guaran-god-damn-teed to soothe and caress your precious assets all day and all night long.

name: Camp Pendant
description: Camp Pendant invites you to join us for Boozy Bunko and Polish Horseshoes. Our annual Gifting Tree with new Rites of Passage pendants and the best conversation on the Playa await you!

name: Camp Plyish
description:
plyish
We are plyish.
-adj
1.  constantly evolving through new experiences, growth, commitment and pursuit of true self; She lives plyish each day.
2.  shaped by the playa: My decision was plyish.

name: Camp Questionmark
description:
~~~~~~~~?????????~~~~~~~~
We are here to spark a process in your mind. Come and swim in the waves of questions & see how far you go. Use your questioning mind to see more than what is presented to you. You may ask yourself "what is this?" or "what is going on here?"...& we may ask you the same thing!?!
~~~~~~~~???????????~~~~~~~~

name: Camp Rain Blo Fishy
description: Camp Rain Blo Fishy Never Says No!

name: Camp Sauce A Little
description: Stop by Camp Sauce A Little for a little sip of a cold beverage. Tasty sips of cold beverages for hungry Burners making the rounds of suburban BRC.

name: Camp ShituAtion
description: We celebrate the shitty situations in life that are often a rite of passage! Want to apply for your first shitty job? Maybe get shit faced for the first time? Have a shitty first dance with a pretty lady? Do some shitty kereoke? Then come hang out with us and shoot the shit Reno style!

name: Camp Shrunken Heads
description: Camp Shrunken heads is back! We have lots of heads, head earrings and stencils for you to use and make stuff !

name: Camp Slow the Fuck Down
description: Do-Gooders of the Playa, join us as we playfully interact with our fellow burners to Slow the Fuck Down. Let's remind each other to keep the speed limit under 5 mph on the perimeter road and throughout the playa!

name: Camp Spampirish
description:
Spam-pi-rish: (noun) 
1.  A camp of party activists supporting universal laws and synergism  throughout their festivities.
2.  Partiers of a diverse background, but predominantly made of Hawaiians, vampires, pirates, and the Irish.

name: Camp Stella
description: Camp Stella is a camp of diverse queer and queer friendly folks who have agreed to experience Burning Man clean and sober for the duration of the event. Some of us are active in AA and other 12 step programs. Others are not. Stella hosts 5 open AA meetings during the week. And the now famous annual "Plain Ordinary Whoopie Party."

name: Camp Titteebumpa aka Charlie Sheen Center for Depraved
description: We will be offering breast examinations for women and men searching for titty bumps. We will have non-qualified individuals also teaching self-examination techniques. All this in our cool, air-conditioned chill tent. We will also be serving Tiger Bloody Marys to participants (while supplies last).

name: Camp To Be Continued
description: A place to chill, refill, and play. Come to our disc golf course and enjoy some beautiful shade and munchies.

name: Camp Turn n' Burn
description: Are you tired of always having the same wonderful people visit your camp every day because Camp Turn ‘n Burn would like to invite you to come in and enjoy yourselves, but then get the fuck out.  Like any other community center, we are a foundation of loving people who excel in speed-friending, a relationship-building concept that is honest to the true complexities of Burning Man.

name: Camp Unofficial Presents: The Monster Wheel Grand Prix
description: Big Wheels have grown up! Remember the excitement of Big Wheels bikes when you were a kid? Camp Unofficial is pleased to present: the Monster Wheel Grand Prix -- a portable track designed by Chicago's Creation Coalition. The Grand Prix takes Big Wheels into the realm of high art and big fun. Racers and their fans will experience an immersive art environment that is part sculpture, part competition, part excitement, part fire art and part theater.

name: Camp Upsie Dasium
description: See and Hear at Camp Upsie Dasium

name: Camp Vagikal
description: One of the most important rites of passage we all go through is the day of your birth. Come to Camp Vagikal to be reborn in Burning Man tradition. Bloody Marys served Friday morning from 6am-9am.

name: Camp Venus
description: Camp Venus home to The Venus Tour Bus of San Francisco. Bringing you vibrations of love and positive energy through sound.

name: Camp Walter
description: Walter the World's largest VW bus  can be seen cruising the playa, but always loves to welcome guests home with a space to chill at Camp Walter.  Our purpose is to inspire everyone to let loose and look beyond what is to what can be…and then get out there and make it all happen!

name: Camp Yes Please!
description: Yes: adv - Used to express affirmation, agreement, positive affirmation, or consent. Please: adv - Give pleasure to or to be pleasing to; give satisfaction.

name: Campasaurus
description: Candy, games, spankings, painting, building, dancing... And the biggest stuffed pink gorilla around. Come have it all at Campasaurus!

name: Campo Alegre
description: Campo Alegre once again presents the Motel, a friendly abode, where Burners can meet those they know, would like to know, or fantasize to know, surrounded by those they don't know.

name: Camposanto
description: We keep the sound waves filled with salsa, reggae, cumbias, and other not so electronic music during the day when our neighboring super sound camps are trying do some nappy time. Come and play a Beer-in-hand soccer match in the afternoon or join us at our sunrise drum circle. Catch us making mojitos or giving salsa lessons, take a siesta on the edge of the playa or come and dance to one of our eclectic DJ's.

name: Carnival del Fuego
description: Come for the bearded ladies, stay for the booze and acrobats!  We have an aerialist dome and welcome guest performers.

name: Carnivàle
description: Carnivàle! Stop bye The Inferno Lounge and have a cool drink. Or play one of our many carnival games and win a prize!

name: Cartoon Commune
description: For this Rite of Passage, sit/stand on either side of reality: as workshop artist, or on-stage model, and go "Drew the Looking Glass" at the Mad Hatter's Iced Tea Parties. Then try on Laughter Yoga and/or Longevity Stick Art to get your Xi flowing like the Playa wind is blowing -- and so much more.

name: CAT-ASS-TROPHY
description: Camp Cat-Ass-Trophy is the lair for the Pirate Kitty's and their Art Ship Sven the Cat.  The Pirate Kitty's can be found in the Cat-A-Tonic bar sipping there spirits  or chillin in the Litter Box Lounge.

name: Celestial Bodies Camp
description: A straight-friendly lounge and bar serving a delicious and refreshing Playa Cosmo and hosting several special events throughout the week. We're always a favorite local neighborhood hangout both daytime and evenings.

name: Census Camp
description:
The Black Rock Census has been collecting information about the population of
Black Rock City since 2002. Information is gathered by asking participants to
fill out an anonymous paper survey. The results of the Census are displayed
the following year on the Census Wagon, and in each Afterburn report.

name: Center Of Gravity (Dancetronauts)
description:
Center Of Gravity camp will take your mind, body, and soul to levels of bliss
you never thought you could reach. Our high energy participants and creative
artist create a world that is not familiar to earth. We fuel our camp with
your energy and welcome any and all. Our camp is home to the Dancetronauts and
a docking bay for all their art cars. We welcome all to enjoy the visual,
physical, and mental stimulation that the center of gravity camp has to offer.

name: cereal thrillers
description: Cereal Thrillers Cereal Bar is open mornings for a luminous bowl of sugary and colorful kids breakfast cereal. Those cereals your parents would not let you have, and there's a prize in every box!

name: Chainsawmargaritaguys
description: Chainsawmargaritaguys.  Come by for our daily happy hour where we will whip up a batch of ice cold frothy margaritas with our chainsaw.  Noon to one pm daily.

name: Chakralicious Camp
description: Chakralicious Camp is a camp dedicated to workshops, music, art, spirituality, sensuality, community and will be a 24 hour interactive camp with beautiful altars, chill spaces, visionary art, and colorful decor representing the rainbow colors of the chakras. Come take a class in Women's Moon Cycles, or Tantra for Two, or Thai Massage, or Non-Violent Communication, and at night, dance to our resident djs and rockin good bands.

name: Champagne Lounge
description: Every day is a celebration! Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun! The Champagne Lounge will be quenching your champagne thirst with a daily high-noon happy hour, in addition to unscheduled surprise happy hours throughout the day. Bring your own cup, but remember, no sex in the Champagne Lounge...okay, well...maybe.

name: Chico Urban Area Docking Port
description: Get your Inter-dimensional transfer ticket at our HQ docking station or the way station out on the playa. Also available will be Playa trading cards complete with stats. Feeling inquisitive? Meet your alternate self in our inter-dimensional communication device or just hang out enjoy the misted shade and have a frosty beverage. Don't be afraid of the coyotes.

name: Children of Chaos
description: Chaos, joy, good conversation, parades and motherly advice.  Gold Parade Wednesday, assemble at 5:30, parade at 6:00 pm.  Illuminated Specters Thursday, assemble at 8:30, parade at 9:00 pm.  Also, meet the Jewish Mother you never had - mothering in your choice of English, Hebrew, French, and/or Spanish.  In the evening, join us at the Anagram bar and watch our photo show.

name: Chop Shop
description:
Chop Shop is the best small playa neighborhood Bicycle Garage in BRC! Here in Chop Shop we have over 50 years of BRC experience in bicycles, welding and small engine repair. We are ready to repair a
wide variety of playa transportation with parts, welding repairs, and advice.  While you
visit our shop, please enjoy our sweet chill spot. You will find our daily Chop Shop
Specials such as scissors and tweezer gifts and, of course, service with a smile.

name: Chromazone
description: Display your art in the Passage of Rites Art Gallery, a glorious cornucopia leading to the home of Chroma, The Farmer's Daughter who left to illuminate the world. The arc of light from Chroma will be your guide to our home and you are welcome at all times.

name: Chrysalis
description: Chrysalis is a conscious melting pot and sacred hub of friends from around the globe, but most of us are from New Orleans, the city of celebration and rebirth. Look for our swing dancing lessons, workshops on uplifting the divine feminine AnD masculine, and stop by at any hour for discussion on how we can tangibly serve, lead, and assist humanity and all species to a resilient and harmonious existence in the time of this Great Shift.

name: Church of Respect
description:
A welcoming environment for all who want and give respect. Our steeple is your vantage point to see all Black Rock City.

http://churchofrespect.com/

name: Church of the Immaculate Consumption
description: The great sage of the Playa implores you to rise as the sun and drink deeply the graces of Our Lady of Consumption.  Lest ye be without drink or merriment in the morning light, we serve our Midwestern-style Bloody Mary to one and all!

name: Circus Boot Camp
description: Come earn your clown nose by participating in Circus Boot Camp!  We'll teach you to juggle, unicycle, hoop, slack line, trapeze, crack a whip and other circus-inspired arts.

name: Cirque Du Cliche
description: Live music, stilt, and burlesque performance.

name: Clown Town
description: Clown Town is back again for it's second year on the Playa. Don't be scared, come out and play! We'll have plenty of events to keep any clown entertained so come on by and see what we have in store.

name: Club Verboten
description: Serving The Popular Masses for 11 years Club Verboten looks forward to hosting our traditional variety of retro avant garde' dance parties in 2011.

name: Clusterf*ck United
description:
Welcome to the Clusterf*ck Zone: a colorful, tasteful, not so peaceful oasis.
Relax and enjoy our refreshing drinks, participate in wine tasting contests, get wild Bollywood-style, be part of the mess!

name: Cock n' Waffle
description: Bringing you the best in chauvinist clown performance since 2005, the Cock n' Waffle is a great place to stop by and give those legs a rest.

name: Comfort & Joy Village
description: Restore your body and lift your spirits at Comfort & Joy, a gay community oasis offering a fully functioning Gym, colorful art installations and daily events including yoga classes, discussion groups, skill building workshops, & quite queer nightlife.

name: Conception
description: Camp Conception dilates its focus on the moment when thought and idea become matter, inhabiting the interstitial wilds between sperm and egg, male and female, wave and particle, potential and actual.  We provide fertile ground for birthing art, ideas, and self-expression as a bi-product of exploring sensuality, spirituality, sexuality, and the deep insides of the creative act--the ultimate Rite of Passage between nothingness and existence.

name: Conscious Monkey Clan
description: A place of refuge for nomadic mountain deviants, the Conscious Monkey Clan unites to sound its battle cry far and wide across the playa galaxy. Inspired by Eastern wisdom and the power of Jah, the notorious Madame Astrolabe and her pillaging monkey crew, seduce all those ensnared in her booming wake.

name: Contradance Community Camp
description: Contradancing all levels every night to live music - looped/traditional/celtic/fusion/techno; fast-paced yet easy to learn with a caller who instructs (but with room for dancers to improvise).  Half the moves are with your partner, half with everyone else, resulting in a tribal vibe, where the Zen is flow, synchrony, and bonding (not footwork, not competition).

name: Contraptionists
description:
The Contraptionists invite you to visit for afternoon Snowcones from 1 until 3 Monday through Saturday.
while here see Human powered Art Trikes, 10,000 Images of God and our 
Performance, Lecture and Art Making Space-
check camp schedule for event details.
RED TENT - REMEMBERING EVOLVING DESTINIES 
- Tues. Wed. Thurs - Noon - 1:30
your art work of rites of passage will be Incorporated into our Remembering Evolving Destinies – Altar will lead the camp Procession to the temple for burning.

name: Cool Aid Oasis
description:
Cool Aid Oasis is a collective of friends coming from the Pacific Northwest.  We bring good vibes and mellow moods, hoping to cool the souls of fellow burners.  During the hottest hours of the day, we want you to come hydrate yourself with chill treats and warm beats.

Meet us at high noon for our Wild West Snowball Duel,  snow cones will follow until the cows come home.

name: Cosmic Giggle
description: Have a seasoned burner guide you on your way through our labyrinth of personal improvement.  Whether you require physical, mental or other-worldly guidance, or you just want to pump some iron, you'll find it at Cosmic Giggle.

name: Cosmic Recess
description: Cosmic Recess is a playground with a space theme.  We believe interactivity, creativity and play are neccesary components of happiness and joy!  All of our playground elements are original and homemade (most with recycled/reused materials).

name: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet
description: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet is Black Rock City's leading supplier of high-quality, low-cost soulmates since 1998. We offer quality name brand and private-label soulmates at substantially lower prices than can be found through conventional wholesale sources.

name: Couch Burner Camp
description: Couch Burners, a cross section of CouchSurfers and BRC inhabitants, welcome weary, wild, and wondrous travelers alike to chat, relax, interact, play some international games and sports, and surf the Mutant Sofa.  Come learn tips and suggestions on succesful international travel, converse in your original language, or just relax and watch some bocci, croquet, horshoes, or fire dancing with a slew of likeminded individuals participating to create a better world, one couch at a time.

name: Covered In Bees
description: Covered in Bees: Fire Bees in Space!

name: Crackwhore Camp
description: Crackwhore Camp - Bring out your inner whore and learn some street tips from the professionals.  Come visit a bunch of long-time Burners for hugs, Giant Jenga, Whoring tips, dancing, and a Crackwhore Tour in our Pimped Out Rickshaw!

name: Cris-O-Matic Circus
description:
Cris-O-Matic Circus

Step right up folks to the fantastic Cris-O-Matic! Try your luck and see what emotional turmoil and change is in-store for you.

Approach the self-serve crisis machine, if you dare, and step away with the gift of a new and improved crisis.  Crappy crisis counseling available while supplies last.  It's a 3-ring circus with sideshow fun including the infamous kittens with whips and Death by palm readings.

name: Curiouser and Curiouser
description: Follow the adventures of Alice and Friends as they discover the wonders of the Playa.  Drink tea with the Hatter, Chess with the White Queen, or lose your head playing croquet with the Queen of Hearts.

name: Cutthroat Kitty Rumhouse
description: Welcome to the Cutthroat Kitty, We are a band of misfit pussycat pirates offering delicious beverages and comfortable shade to castaways alike.

name: Cwality
description: Come spend some cwality time with camp cwality.

name: D.PACTS Skin and Candy Bar
description: Drop by our camp 10-11 am Thursday through Sunday for skin cancer screening and free suntan lotion samples from Doc Derma.  And whether you're naughty or nice, get your sugar fix from the Candy Man.  Enjoy your candy and add your candy wrapper to the evolving art project.

name: Daily Playa
description: The Daily Playa: all the news we felt like printing is back at Black Rock City for the second year running.  We welcome all contributions: playa legends, factual reporting, divination, pyrotechnic fashion instructions, interviews, images of sunrise on the playa, and anything else we can print on a page.  We are also looking for journalists to join the camp, contact us if interested.

name: Dali Ville
description:
Magical garden of surrealism.  Surrealism is a large part of every great artists awakening as one of  “Artistic Rites of Passage.” SInce Burning Man is known for its surreal art & music, we are taking the taking it to the next level, to create the waking dream.

This is home to The Incredible Music Machine project & The City Lights Honorarium winning project.

name: Dark Sparkle
description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive, the unexplainable quality that pulls you to the dark side. We bring interactive workshops and performances that challenge citizens to find mystery and beauty in themselves and others, and celebrate the unique Dark Sparkle in all of us.

name: Darwin Fish Tank
description: Dive into the Darwin Fish Tank! When you are ready to grow a pair (of legs that is!) climb out of the primordial ooze and beat the heat with our misting system for a genuine adventure in the belly of the beast. Come for the flowing beats, stay and chill amongst the waves with some liquid joy.

name: Death Guild/Thunderdome
description: 13 years of providing a black throbbing heart to Burning Man. Join us. We have cookies. Where by "cookies" I mean "grudge matches and hot chicks".

name: Decadent Oasis
description: On the edge of the desert is a welcoming Oasis of light and sound. Come dance, play, perform, and relax amid our glowing grove of palm trees and tented lounge. We invite you to join us for an ever-changing array of activities, music, games, acro-yoga, hoops, and performances on our stage.

name: Deep Heaven
description: Deep Heaven - We share our hearts with the Playa through a commitment to authenticity and honesty. Look for the heart beacon by night and the rotating heart mirror by day; seek out our hug zones, find solace and laughter in our sanctuary and attend a playshop in our dome.

name: Deitylicious Tribe
description: A fantastic tribe from afar seeking our deity.  Expect to be idolized, ritualized, and appetized!

name: DeMentha
description: Come join in the minty fun at DeMentha. You'll find great tunes from our DJ line-up, lovingly prepared fresh mojitos, aromatherapy, ample shade and plenty of cooling mist. Combined with a hearty welcome you've got the perfect recipe for a awesome time. 1-5pm daily.

name: Department of Tethered Aviation
description: DOTA is your source for all things related to kites and worshipping the wind. Come explore sounds and color in our Wind Labrynth, join our daily Kite Fly, play on our Silks, try your hand at Interactive Painting or Singing for Scaredycats, test your skills in the Batting Cage: you can Talk to God or find refuge in the BEDRoom, and by night take a virtual Tour of the Universe or shake your booty to our amazing bands!

name: Desert Morning
description: Greet the morning, and let the smell of our freshly baked bread draw you in to our oasis, where mint tea and natural soundscapes will soothe your soul and nourish your body

name: DESERT PEARL CANTINA & SCULPTURE GARDEN
description:
THE DESERT PEARL CANTINA AND SCULPTURE GARDEN IS A CHILL CAMP WHERE FOLKS
GATHER TO ENJOY THE PLAYA'S BEST COFFEE & A SERENE SCENE. MUSIC, STORYTELLING
AND QUIET CAN ALL BE FOUND HERE. WE LOVE CREATING A SPARE, SPACIOUS DESERT
HOME WHERE FOLKS CAN COME AND CHILL AND EXPERIENCE OUR ARTFUL EXISTENCE.

name: Desperados
description: Come hang with some modern day Desperados. Kick back with a cold beer listening to some funk, bluegrass and soul music.

name: Destiny Lounge
description: Enjoy our comfy shaded lounge while sipping cold ice tea or lemonade in the heat of the afternoon, playing our giant game: "Rock Yer Balls", or interacting with our latest creation: "The Oracle", which will perhaps provide you the answer of your dreams!! We're also the playa home for Spirits Fire, bringing great music, dancing and fire spinning for any and all!!

name: Destiny Oasis
description: Visions of playa paradise await you at the Destiny Oasis. A place to find some shade, do some yoga, catch a workshop, quench your thirst at our world famous bar “Marshmallow G’s”  with Caesars at lunch time & Mojitos at happy hour. Come visit our highly interactive camp of freaks, degenerates and general oddballs from Canada and the US who promise a wicked sense of humor and a very good time...

name: Deus Ex Detective Agency
description: Solve a hard-boiled mystery for the Deus Ex Detective Agency! Stop by our office to help crack a case, detective gear provided. Or just bask in the gritty noir ambiance.

name: Deviant Playground
description: DP Camp is designed to give adults a chance to relive their youth through games, activities, and varieties of play.  Come visit our bar and playground!  Look for our events in the What/When/Where.

name: Dickstracted Camp
description:
This year @ Dickstracted Camp we will explore “The Rites of the Penis.”

Learn about penis rites, myths and facts from around the world and share with us some of your own

name: Dilated Peoples Eye Spa
description: Expand your inner-vision while indulging your senses. A soothing treatment of refreshing eye drops, cucumber slices and a cooling facial gel-pack awaits you...followed by a meditative lavender-scented eye pillow surrounded by the enchanting healing powers of the Dilated Peoples Eye Spa.

name: Dilburn - Get Fired!
description: Escape the corporate ratrace - come to Dilburn to get "fired." Pick up your dream job title in the lobby. Come join our office cubicle mixer after hours!

name: Dirty Beetles
description: The Dirty Beetles are a silly collective of artists, musician,s Dj's and Designers.  This year for Burning man they will be bringing their very first art car project called "Boogaloo," the dirtiest Dung Beetle there ever was.

name: Discadelphia
description: DISC GOLF! Come to camp Discadelphia for Burning Man worthy Disc Golf course.  Didn't bring your discs?  We have loaners.  Too hot during the day? Come play at night!  We have lit baskets and glowsticks for discs.

name: Disco Knights
description: Disco Knights is back!  Bringing you the sleazy disco, psychedelic house and intimate good vibes you've come to expect.

name: DISORIENT
description:
Encounter Geodesic Temple.
Dance all night.
Play Disorient's Interactive Card Game.
Dance more.
Explore 6:1 Deep Space installation in the Dome.

Welcome to Disorient's 11th year!

name: DISTRIKT
description: A rambunctious playa day party of vociferous beats from live DJ's and luscious libations from a shaded bar.  Your daytime dancing & disorderly DISTRIKT.

name: Dodgeball Addiction
description: You don't have to skip a full week of dodgeball to attend burning man! We'll have a court with no-sting balls for your throwing pleasure.

name: Dojo Arigato
description: Dojo Arigato will teach sword styles and host giant field battles.  We will also be hosting puppet creation workshops and surprising the playa with radical puppet guerilla theatre explosions.

name: Down Low Club
description: Adhering to the tenet that "what happens at Burning Man, stays at Burning Man", we offer a comfortable, discrete & enclosed play space away from home for adult men interested in, curious about or dedicated to tactile interaction, massage & erotic/tantric man-play with other adult men on the Playa.

name: Dr. Carl's Department of Collections
description: Dr. Carl's big board of stuff is imposing, daunting and a little bit sexy. Pick something from our big board, go out and find that something. Return to us, convince an official that you deserve a fantastic reward...collect a fantastic reward.

name: Dragon Smelter Camp
description: Dragon Smelter will appear differently at day and at night, due both  to neon lights tubing that circle the exhibit, and due to the flame emissions.  Burning man attendees also can smelt small meal tokens in the image of the dragon,

name: Drama Camp
description:
Embrace it, drama is life! We are the place for you to come on stage, rant, rave, give a monologue, put on a play, or bring an instrument.
Take it to the stage!

name: Dub Scouts Troop 808
description:
Dub Scouts Troop 420, Black Rock City Council.
On my honor I will dub my best
To do my durty for wob and crunktry
and to crank the glitch slop;
To help people stay blinky at all times;
To keep properly hydrated,
perpetually bassed, and morally confused.

name: Dubscouts Camp
description: Dubscouts Music SF is hitting the Playa hard this year with there Dubscouts camp. This camp will be home to some of the best Dubstep/DnB/House producer from around the world, all mashed together on a enormous stage. Be sure to swing by this camp and get your fill of fresh beats.

name: Duckpond
description: Duckpond has the best bar on the Playa - a rocking daytime party with a 150' slip'n'slide and the bar serves Playa Specials all day and all night. Quack.

name: Dumpster Dive Bar
description: Dumpster Dive Bar: Hailing from Cascadia, bringing to you lovely libations.  Foraged, free piled, naturally harvested, gleaned and grown.

name: DUSTFISH
description: We are the missing tooth in the Smile that is BURNINGMAN...and we BLINK ALOT!

name: DustHaven
