description: Welcome to DustHaven - your haven for human connection. The spinning Wheel of Rites will choose which Rite of Passage you'll share - through story-telling or reenactment, accompanied by our live music and video projections.

name: Dusty Dice
description: Remember the joy of setting up a tent in the backyard and playing board games? Checkers, Monopoly, Life, Parcheesi... We celebrate the joy of play with just a little bit of competition. Visit and join us in a game of Twister, Chess, Dice or just bullshit.

name: Dusty Strings
description: A place to celebrate accoustic music.  Just unplug!

name: Dusty Swan Public Craic House and Celtic Cinema
description: Cold beer on tap, hot Irish coffee, fine Irish whiskey, live Irish music, and classic Irish films. Recite your limerick and get a Guinness! It's a wee slice of the auld sod, and guaranteed good craic for all!

name: Earth Guardians
description: We inspire, inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply the Green & Leave No Trace principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home. Come, volunteer and participate in our daily yoga, talks or just grab a MOOP bag!

name: Echoing Park
description: The Echoing Park is imagined as a space devoted to tactile and sonic exploration.  Comprising the Park will be several amplified and non-amplified welded percussion sculptures, and all are invited to make noise, music, and aural art here.

name: El Castor
description: Camp Theme is to teach participants how to make a body cast.  El Castor will guide volunteers in making the cast in public to visually show how to make body cast.  This will be done in tented area but open to public.  Materials will be provided while supplies last.

name: Elephant Bird Camp
description: Explore live music, open jams, a pastie making workshop, and a Mutant Vehicle version of your grandmother’s house complete with a stern but forgiving grandmother! Join San Francisco costume party proprietors, the Funky Ones, for our desert manifestation, Elephant Bird Camp!

name: Elvis Beer Garden and Wedding Chapel
description: A celebration of our Lord Elvis, the King of all Rock music in drive thru chapel style. Come for a ceremony presided by our trained Elvis, rock out with our ukulele band, offer your used beer can to our Elvis idol.  Operating daytimes, partying night times.

name: Emerald City
description: Make your way through the Deadly Desert and past the poppy fields to the Emerald City.  Get your hair cut by the internationally trained stylists of the Emerald City Wash & Brush Up Co.  Come by for a haircut and you might catch an aerial or fire performance or get an audience with the Wizard.  Wishes granted, hairs cut, and fantasies brought to life.  At the Emerald City, there truly is no place like home.

name: Emergence
description:
Emergence: Revealing Beauty

We reveal beauty through wisdom, wit, and play! Come on in for good company and cool lemonade or to taste something delicious. Shake up your mind. Interact with remote controlled Tardis II. Join us at our Thursday Tardis Salon or Entheon and Center Camp talks to look at things differently.

name: Emergency Services Station 3
description: The Black Rock City Emergency Services Department provides fire protection, emergency medical services, and crisis mental health services to the citizens of Black Rock City.

name: Emergency Services Station 9
description: The Black Rock City Emergency Services Department provides fire protection, emergency medical services, and crisis mental health services to the citizens of Black Rock City.

name: Empire of Narwhal
description: Visit the Narwhal's island roost and chill to the sounds of Exotica.

name: enclave
description: The Enclave is a rich tapestry of Santa Barbara area artists, designers, engineers, and performers who are driven to bring a strong character of ceremony, play, and performance to the BRC.  Our space is defined by a unique architectural presence that is a play of shadows and interactivity in the day, and an eerie, eclectic place of fire and chaos at night.

name: End Of Line Club
description: We are a camp that is Tron themed. WE will be providing a stage for any DJs that want to sign up and spin through the festival, as well as an Tron Lightcycle art car, and tron themed gate.

name: EnHightened Beings of Leisure
description:
Life is a JOURNEY, not a destination. We are your pit-stop on the
ROAD TRIP of LIFE.
Come, weary traveller, rest your bones in our shady scenic-pullout.
Let our Cunning Linguists humor and intrigue you. Join the shenanigans
at our daily Happy Hours, themed to the landmarks of YOUR life.
 We'll get you HIGH (on stilts!), at the High-Road-Stilt-Bar, or on
yer' knees at the Low-Rider mini-bar. All this and fire too.

name: Enlightenedville
description: composed of Cubatron Camp, Camp Ma'am and Camp Save-The-Man

name: Entwined
description: Our camp is about all bout the ties that bind... Stop by for our 'Sneaker Pimping' workshops, and we'll show you how to playa-beautify your boots and sneakers.  We've got neon shoestring, stencils, paint and crazy shoe lacing techniques.  And kinksters stop by for shibari rope tying classes!  We'll teach you rope basic and advanced bondage techniques.

name: Epic Queer Camp, The
description: Our little group is convinced that THIS year's burn is going to be THE MOST EPIC ONE YET.  The art is going to be EPIC, the weather is going to be EPIC, and the people (yes, YOU!) are going to be EPIC.

name: Equilibrium
description: Come chillax and chat with the good peeps at Equilibrium.

name: Eridu Society
description: The Eridu Society's Steampunk Airship Outpost provides the perfect vantage point to watch (and celebrate) the passing of airships and land yachts throughout the week. Designed with all the latest devices for aethernautical enjoyment.

name: ESPRESSO CAMP / TACTICAL ESPRESSO SERVICE
description: Drive Thru mobile Tactical Espresso Service delivers hot naked espresso to select deep playa and art project locations most mornings.

name: Everywhere
description: Visit the Outreach Network and learn how the Black Rock Arts Foundation, Black Rock Solar, Burners Without Borders and the Burning Man Regional Network are bringing the playa to the world the other 51 weeks of the year! Check the What Where When for hosted cocktail parties, mixers, lectures and interactive art activities.

name: Evil Office
description: Welcome to The Evil Office: a true experience of presidential elegance with just a hint of debauchery. In our inauguration ceremonies participants will be sworn in to our cabinet and have the opportunity to have a presidential portrait taken alongside an American flag and a golden eagle. After the inaugural toast we will start the celebration and make important foreign policy decisions over mimosas and cucumber-cream cheese sandwiches.

name: Expansion Mansion
description:
Come climb our tower for the best view on the playa or just sit back and listen to grooves.

We want to keep expanding our community. There is plenty of space if you need a place to stay.! Drop us an e-mail to inquire.

CONNECT!

name: Ezh Camp
description:
We are the Ezh camp. 
Little hedgehogs Ezhiki. 
Come frolic with us in a forest of fun, 
chill with us in our norki and listen to our ezhik sounds. Games and treat and smiles await, 
Don't worry, you're never late!

name: F.A.R.T - Flatulence Amplification Research Team.
description: Stop by our F.A.R.T (Flatulence Amplification Research Team) kamp to eat Gaseous foods, and fart into one of our megaphones.  Wear your worst OD Green military surplus shit.  The best farts could win you a prize! Listen to solar powered F.A.R.T. Radio 107.3 FM for around the clock farts and playa information.  Look for the OD Green military kamp, flags and camo netting!  Ten+ years strong....peeew"

name: Fabulous Disaster
description: When a random of assortment of epic disasters gather in one place it may become fabulous.

name: False Profit, LLC
description: As the most advanced company on the planet, False Profit's most valuable asset is our brand.  By harnessing the full potential of our top secret american corporate technology, we will present an environment of delight that is guaranteed to throw the market into flux.

name: Fandango
description: The Fandango Village returns for another year of Total Playa Domination. Stop by for a cocktail at the Slowburn Lounge, drop by for Bootie: BRC, and don't forget to tune in to the Black Rock Broadcasting Corporation at 99.1FM. And pick up a copy of The BRC Weekly hot off the presses.

name: Farmopolis
description: Farmopolis will offer Manchanical Bull riding, The Cornhole Bar, The Melon and Zucchini Patch, nightly HoDowns, Bacon Camp, and daily events to keep you shaking in your Daisy Dukes. Enjoy the Chroma art installation on Esplanade!

name: Feed the Artists
description: Feed the Artists (aka FtA) is a communal art grant that enriches Burner community ties through food gifting. We facilitates offers of gratitude and support to the hard-working artist crews by encouraging theme camps and other groups to offer them the simple gift of a nourishing, heartfelt meal.  The program has literally fed thousands of artists since 2007, and inspired radical collaboration amongst diverse groups of Burners.

name: Fiasco
description: Fiasco, home of the Nordic Breeze and Spa Fiasco.

name: Fire and Mud
description: Make clay art on the playa. Kiln will fire all day and night Medallions and masks or a shot glass you make it

name: Fire Conclave Convergence
description: This is where all fire performers for the Great Circle check in and get the latest information

name: FireDrop
description: Experience a nonstop celebration of fire dancing, samba drums and life at Firedrop! Come see one of our shows, check out a fire toy workshop for the toyless among us, or come take a rest in our chillaxation station.

name: First Church of the Last Laugh world headquarters
description: The world headquarters of the world's oldest religion, the world's largest church. You may already be a member.

name: First Kiss Cafe
description: Celebrate the memories of your first kiss with us as you sip on a cup of chai tea at the First Kiss Cafe.  Whether you're chilling in our hammock dome, dancing at one of our parties, or drinking tea during a movie screening, this cafe is the place to be.

name: First Republic of Slacking
description: First Republic of Slacking

name: First Transdimensional Bank + Church
description: The First Transdimensional Bank and Church (FTB+C) extends a psychofinancial hand to facilitate any and all metafiscal rites of passage: baptisms, confirmations, exorcisms, faith healings, weddings, annulments, revivals, and transsubstantiations. Be sure to stop by for our Full Solar Salvation Music Series each afternoon at 4:33 pm.

name: Flattery Camp
description: At Flattery Camp we practice the fine art of flattery. We aim for sincerity,originality, humor, hospitality and comfort in the shade. BTW.. You're looking Fabulous !!

name: Flights of Fancy
description:
"Flights of Fancy"
A place to eat, meditate, make music, and make offering

name: Floristonia
description: For a mellow time on the playa, come get Floristoned on life with us.  You never know what we'll be doing next. We'll take care of your head, heart and feet. Margarita bar to share when we need it.

name: Flower Camp
description: Enter the atrium and behold the flowery dispositions of our comely denizens.  Take a stroll through our garden Thursday night for our infamous No Pants! party featuring pumping beats aboard the Dusty Rhino!

name: Fluid Fortune
description: Fluid Fortune Camp is about fortune telling of all kinds: from serious to silly, traditional or unexpected. For anyone who wonders what's next.

name: Fold
description: Fold is an orgasmic origami theme camp dedicated to the bending of paper, people, and minds. Anyone who folds a thousand origami cranes will be granted one wish by Guru Aura.

name: FourFathers of Saint Stupid Camp
description: Outlaw Adult Tricycle Club rides for the First Church of the Last Laugh spreading the word of Saint Stupid to BRC. Explore the mysteries of stupid and how it touches everyone... while delighting in the pedal powered antics of the FourFathers and the Acolytes of Stupid.

name: fr0zone
description: burning man department staff camp for penguins, polar bears & arctic seals

name: FractalNation
description: FractalNation is a visionary art, music and performance village that includes the Crown Collective, the Lady Sassafrass & Abraxas Dragamuffin art cars, and the newly formed Envisionary camp, a collaboration of Android Jones, Boom Festival, Envision Festival, Exile Nation, Elevate Films, Bamboo DNA, the Yum Sauce Lounge, Tribe 13 art collective, the DoLab, and the Playa debut of the TedX Presentation Series.

name: Free Breathing
description: Free Breathing brings BRC citizens awareness of the transformative role that breath plays in our lives. All are welcome to come take their first breath and re-learn the art and science of smell, voice, and breathdance to see how breath is the key between the conscious and superconscious worlds.

name: Free Fall
description:
Welcome to Free Fall, your rito de iniciación station. Awaken your mind, sanctify your senses, step through the door, there are no boundaries.

Free Fall is an international collaboration. Our mission is to bring beats to the playa; everything from psytrance to techno to progressive. On top of bumpin’ sound, our music will be mobile. That’s right; we’re building a mobile party so we can take our beats to the dusty streets.

name: Free Movement Zone
description: The Free Movement Zone is back and this year we've brought: the Temple of Polegasm.  Life in the desert is harsh.  Our Temple is the perfect place to start your journey.  Come by relax and unwind.  Or... test your limits in our fantasmagorical Polegasm Ritual.  Enter as a neophyte, leave as a...?

name: Free Photography Zone
description: For 15 years Free Photography Zone has been photographing and giving prints to the participants of Burning Man.  Please come by and have your portrait done in our studio and go home with your Playa portrait.

name: Freedom Lounge
description: Freedom Lounge a mystical day spa for the soul. Come get your dreams interpreted, a destiny reading, some spiritual healing, spiritual readings and many other things of the soul.

name: FreeStyle Palace
description: We operate a sound stage featuring nightly hip hop shows from sunset to about 2:00 am.  Performers of all stripes (singers, rappers, players and performers) are welcome and encouraged to join our ensemble performances.  Part alchemy and part black magic,  FreeStyle Palace is an amalgam of sophisticated and authentic Urban Underground music and culture forged by the heat of the Black Rock Desert and polished by the collective talent of Burning Man Participants

name: French Maid Brigade
description: Oui! Oui! Le French Maid Brigade will be dusting your Rites and Passages again this year! Please join us Thursday afternoon for the sexy French Maid Brigade Parade!

name: Frogma
description: Frogma is the little theme camp that could, where everyone is your friend and neighbor! Hop on over to our lily pads Monday through Thursday at 5:00pm for BRC's one and only Hoppy Hour. Serving up ice cold slushy Frogaritas in our dome sweet dome. You're guaranteed to make a rainbow of connections.

name: Funk Forest
description: When you can't see the forest for the trees, come to the forest for funk at four: sweet beats and good ol' Canadian hospitality.

name: Funk Pirates
description: We arrr Pirates!  We have a Ship!  We bring the Funk!  Soul Buccaneers from the Dirty South!

name: Funky Town
description: We are a collection of individuals from all over the world that love to share our passion

name: FUR
description: FUR is comprised of groups of individuals who are intent on bringing Anthropomorphic Arts to the playa.  Interested in Anthro Art, want to meet others with similar interests, or just want to learn more?  Then stop by our camp or one of our many events!

name: Furniture Car Rally camp
description:
Furniture Car Rally camp celebrates mobile furniture of all kinds.
We hope you will join us on the playa for our annual sunset furniture car cruise

name: Fusion Valley
description: Welcome to Fusion Valley! Stop on by at our Internet Cafe. We're your basic chill space that has music (FM station 95.7 DJ's!), phones, public computers & much more under our carpeted shade. We have an in house artist who has many of his paintings on display.  Check them out, some are black light based too! At night we have a drive-in theater, complete with popcorn. Stop on by and say hi to some long time burners.

name: Future Roots
description: A place for the next generation of Burners to build a solid foundation for the future of Burning Man. Learn ways to bring the event back to its original roots of community and creativity.

name: Fuzz Patrol
description: Friendly Fuzzy Furkers Frolicking & Flitting Franticly For Furious Fiery Fun Fantasies. We have great vibes, amazing sound, friendly bartenders, sexy dancers and a plethora of fun at our camp, come by and say hello!

name: Galactic Jungle
description: Galactic Jungle will create an oasis of plant life and cool air in the desert. Plants, misters, fans a portable a/c unit as well as a sound system and extensive LED lighting will create a spacey jungle environment for people to enter into.

name: Gallavant Goddesses and their Lost Boys
description: We are back for another year! The Gallavant Goddesses & their Lost Boys fly in from around the world to bring stability to the Playa by giving their fellow citizens BALLS. Located within (unofficial) Redirection Connection Village, sit in our inviting front yard while we supply you with a brightly colored tennis ball for your bicycle kickstand and lively conversation.

name: Ganesh's Boister Shack Baggage Shuck
description: Ganesh’s Boister Shack Baggage Shuck celebrates overcoming obstacles to rites of passage.  11-4, shuck your baggage, retreat from the heat & transform your state at our bar in a big, cool desert tent from India.  A maintained, regulation tennis court is also for volleyball & badminton at night.  The Gifting Tree provides interactivity around playa giving.

name: Gears & Ties
description: BRC's Steampunk Lightning Rail Station.  Home to a trading post, an academy of disciple, and the Battleborn Locomotive.

name: Gedi Prime
description: Come by and visit our Wild West Saloon and whiskey bar. We play all our favorite country songs all the time.

name: GEISHA HOUSE
description: Clean, comfortable climate controlled - (did someone say there's dust out there?) Come to the Geisha House! Your plush sanctuary on the playa where fuzzy pillows, furry floor & velvet walls invite you to focus your chi. Have some self-service sake, flirt with neighbors, share the latest playa gossip, or contemplate life.  A/C in the day..heated at night -- a 24 hour self-serve, dust-free spot that will rekindle your senses and give your spaceship a softer landing.

name: Gender Blender
description: Boy? Girl? Ze? Unidentified? You decide. Gender Blender is a safe haven for those bending and blending gender, a place to come and explore for those who have always wanted to mix up their gender but have never before, and a spot for those who are curious about gender play and how gender impacts and affects our lives. We are a gender conscious open loving community that runs workshops, theatrics, loves sparkles, drag, and making smoothies in the desert.

name: Genital Portrait Studio
description:
At Genital Portrait Studio, highly trained photographers offer you the
opportunity capture that special side of yourself in the privacy of our playa
studio. Your session may include a number of props and positions, and you can
walk away with your very own Genital ID card.

name: Geriantics
description: The Geriantics are Burners 55 and older celebrating the Rites of Passage into Seniority with creativity and self-expression.  Come by, say “hey”, sit awhile, share your story or listen to someone else’s.  When the dust has got ya down – Geriantics.  When it’s too hot to sleep – Geriantics.  When ya just saw the best damn art car in the whole friggin world – Geriantics baby!!

name: Get Lost
description: On the edge of the city sits Get Lost.  We'll give you directions and they will be wrong.  We'll point you to the punk rock bar next door instead.  Or we'll point you to a shady spot and give you a cocktail and relax you with pretty music.  Anyway about it, you'll definitely Get Lost.

name: Gherkin Lounge
description: The Gherkin Lounge, infamous since day one, is a slice of the playa you have been longing for. Classy by nature, sassy by default. Good music, better cocktails and greater people. Our three story bar/lounge will captivate you as you sip on yummy cocktails (like our famous Gherkin Martini) while listening to cool beats that transports you to an unforgettable human experience. Themed parties nightly. Ice-cold pickles and martinis are just the beginning...

name: Glitter Camp
description: Come get naked and shiny as nature intended!  We will adoringly slather you with glittery goo by day, and rock lap dances by night!

name: Glow Salvation Ministries
description: Wandering darkly in the darkness? Let us illuminate you (or your art installation)!

name: Gnome Camp
description: Gnome Camp will assist you in the rite of passage from human to gnomanhood. Get your hat and beard, then set forth to create gnomish mischief!

name: gNome Dome
description:
There is but one true and benevolent ruler of this universe and that kind monarch is none other than Sparkles The Unicorn and Sprinkles the Gnome is his Prophet! 
Play, unwind and discover your Inner-Gnome. 
Join us beneath our toadstool dome!

name: Godzilla Camp (GBC)
description: Members of the former Sloth Camp & Carney Camp reunite to bring you the traditional fare; Afternoon free-range boccie ball tournaments, discussions and examples of solar & wind generation, woman's foot care, scented misting station, massage, and a shaded gathering spot by the fountains.

name: Golden Cafe
description: Your home for exotic cocktails, live music, and gourmet dining since 2003. Swing by for elegant libations served in real glassware, jam with our house band, work with our chefs to bring culinary wonder to the playa!

name: Grand Hotel Ashram by Coco Poco Loco
description: "Your Home Away from Home Away from Home" The Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica sets the standard for hospitality in the Black Rock City Metropolitan Area for the 7th year running. Enjoy a crisp cocktail and conversation, with a twist: this year Ashram is being run by the Infamous Coco Poco Loco crew out of Melbourne, Australia so expect the unexpected.

name: GrassRoots United
description: GrassRoots United does disaster relief at Burning Man. Visit our camp for a taste of GRU in Haiti including: a hot dog stand, chicken shooting range, cafe with Haitian coffee and fresh bread, "hole in wall" bar, resource center with hand tools, electrical, welding and mechanics facilities, chill out dome, recycling center, compost bins, "tap tap" art cars, our famous Wednesday night Prom and post burn camp demo services.

name: Great Balls of Fire
description: From DC and beyond, we offer several activities for your delight: sock poi making workshops, poi spinning classes, hoop-making, hoop lessons, devil sticks, a performance by members of the PDF Fire Conclave, Naughty Nightie Cocktail Party.

name: Green Bean Cafe
description: "Cafe Verde" inspired by the idea of community, a symbol of growth, a unique structure that  will cultivate ideas, education and harmony.This will be a 45' tall green stalk with an observation deck on the 6th floor and in the main space a cafe that serves free home made soups, Herbal Teas and coffees, we will have an interior stage space for sustainable living and alternative energy seminars,  acoustic music sessions and childrens storytelling hours.

name: Green Tortoise Village
description: Green Tortoise = alternative travel entity. We operate the shuttle service to and from Empire and Gerlach and have a cool camp with shade, a chill area, and great folks from around the world. Come by if you have a bus problem, to check out our unique sleeper coaches or hop on board in San Francisco!

name: GreenSun Camp and Enchante
description: Camp GreenSun and Enchante will be celebrating the union of the Greenspan and Nelson families. We will also be holding a hug/massage instructional session, a Cornhole tournament, a Bar Mitzvah and Burning Man Gospel hour.

name: Gypsies, Tramps, and Thieves
description: Gypsies can join us for classes on palmistry and tarot, henna, massage, or belly dance; look for the Gypsy Caravan multi-person bike transport cruising BRC.  Tramp though our camp and paint a bandana, get your Tramp Polaroid picture taken, learn some circus arts, or lounge at the bar.  Thieves?  We’re just here to steal hearts with a parade across the playa, stopping to provide impromptu live drumming and American Tribal Style belly dance.

name: Gypsy Witch Camp
description: The Gypsy Witches are a welcoming group here for  the Newbies & the lone travelers. Our camp consists of experienced Burners who would like to provide a community for you to camp with, explore with, eat salsa with and drink tequila with.

name: H.M.S. Excess
description: The HMS Excess will be cruising the playa providing delectable refreshment to all-comers. As with Burningdale's we will be once again going overboard to provide unlimited libations and music and entertainment of a naughty-cal nature...

name: Habitat for Insanity
description: We explore novel uses of technology to bring great food, art, clothing, and experiences to Black Rock City. We welcome anyone that embraces the do-ocracy ethic!

name: Hammer And Cyclery
description: Comrades! Join the struggle to disseminate bicycle repair, advice, and the color red. Help Camp Hammer and Cyclery promote self reliance through Playa bicycle repair, Burner bike tutorials, and inspiring (and terrifying) Burning Man cycling stories.

name: Hammock Hangout
description: The Hammock Hangout is a multifaceted highly interactive camp. The primary structure is a GIANT 120 feet in diameter, 11,300sqft of passive solar tent. There will be approximately 60 hammocks, a karaoke lounge, a bar, and a lounge area. We are an easy going, no drama-zone fun camp with our core members having participated 10+ years. We snack people, lavish them with cold beverages and get them to sing songs during the HOT days.

name: Hang-Out
description: Hammocks, hammocks, and more hammocks swinging in the playa breeze filled with dusty desert nymphs, lost souls and the fortunate weary traveler who seeks our special version of Nirvana. The music never repeats, but the bliss it brings never ends. Come play with Satyr and his minions for an hour or the day and you will leave better than when you arrived.

name: Happily Ever After?
description: Journey through childhood Fairy Tales and Monster mayhem.  Will you find your Happily Ever After?

name: Happy Camp
description: Happy Camp is all about being HAPPAY. We shout, drink, play, dance, meditate, burn and romp to infect the playa with HAPPAY... for 11 years now :)

name: Hard As Fuck
description: Hip hop camp.  You know what it is.

name: Hardly Davidson Cafe
description: Biker bar, welding shop, and gambling saloon on the playa.  Come in the day to get your mutant welded, come back at night to hang out and win some prizes.

name: Harmonic Convergence
description: Bring people together thru song & mirth...please sing or hum as you pass our camp.

name: Hearth
description: Many nights are topped off with wanderings back into the city, a cold chill creeping up on you, searching for a place to alleviate those tired legs and that over-stimulated mind. This is Hearth.

name: Heavy Petting Zoo
description: Come and visit our fun, friendly zoo comprised of the cutest stuffed animals all done up in naughty bedroom attire. Grab some lube and condoms from our safe-sex trough and look for our events throughout the week including The Man Spa and a Virgin Burner Workshop.

name: HeeBeeGeeBee Healers
description: Black Rock City's oasis for healing, restoration and growth.  We have over 30 healers, a giant chill space to exchange massages and a classroom running 6-8 topics a day.

name: Hello Gigsville
description: Give us your tired, your poor, your huddled masses... because we need more fuel for the CarBQ!!

name: Heltervetia
description: Camp promoting artistic liberation, and the passage into a new world. Bringing people together under the same principles.

name: Hero's Welcome
description: Hero’s Welcome - we celebrate that all who make it to Black Rock City have accomplished a heroic journey, an odyssey deserving of commemoration! We celebrate your arrival atop a well lit throne where we adorn our heroes with laurels, medals, and fine oils. Drumming, dancing, and song are all part of the festivities in your honor. You will definitely feel the love and appreciation for all it took. Burning man would not be the same with you, our hero!

name: Hippocampus
description: Welcome to Hippocampus - where memories are made in your brain and on the playa. Stop by the cafe in the morning for the best coffee on the playa. We've gone mobile this year! The cafe might not be where you left it last time.

name: Hobart's Secret Passage
description: In 1969 an artist named Hobart Brown invented the Great Arcata to Ferndale Grand Championship Kinetic Sculpture Race from his home (and museum). Help us pay homage to our glorious founder by surviving this kinetic rite of passage: Hobart's Secret Passage.

name: Hoe Garten
description:
A traditional biergarten, happy hoes will whet your whistle and wiener your schnitzel at daily happy hours. Enjoy freshly tapped kegs, salty food snacks, and a motley collection of instruments so that we can all make our own beer-drinking tunes.

We will be hosting Happy Hour every day from 5 – 7, but even if we're not tipping the tap, you can hang in our cool garden, enjoy the shade and be first in line when we get frosty.

name: Hokey Pokey Initiation
description: Hokey Pokey Initiation Camp -Dance the Hokey Pokey everyday at noon and turn yourself around. Everyone welcome. Friends of Bill W. Meeting Everday at 5pm. This a 24 hour camp of clean and sober people. Everyone welcome to come by and adjust or just hang out.

name: Holi High Camp
description: Holi High Camp is bringing the colorful madness and wisdom of the Indian festival of Holi to the boisterous masses of the playa.  Our contribution this year is to recreate one of our favorite rites of passage from around the world for spontaneous public consumption.

name: Home
description: Come Home: stay a while, exploring our lush Home on the playa. Leave Home having participated, creating your space within ours.

name: Home Base
description: Welcome to Camp Home Base, your “Home Sweaty Home”— a collective group of bass abusing DJS, goddesses galore, delectable goodies, cool libations, and questionable humor. There is no place like home...base!

name: Home Brew 4A Home Brew
description: A Home Brewers community where brewers of the Playa come to meet and share. Enjoy a cold home brewed beer, mead or soda served daily. We have a pool table, foosball, a party dome and daily events including a home brew contest. Bring your keg and we will refrigerate and tap it. Old school Burning Man. Open... community... low tech.

name: Home Free Dome
description: Home Free Dome is an experimental community of encounter designed to accelerate and amplify the transformative cultural forces at play in Black Rock City. We turn spectators into participants, veterans into virgins, and virgins into virtuosos.

name: HomeSlice
description: Drop in for a cheerful "Slice of Home"—Playa-style.  Participate in our comfort-food cook-offs, climb the sky-high Tower of Transition's inverted pyramids, experience a hypnagogic Dream Machine reverie, upgrade or re-engineer your Playa duds and gear at our Radical Alteration clinics, boogie down at the HomeSlice Prom, or catch a ride across town on the four-wheeled Sliceicle!

name: Honey Tree
description: Come nap in the shade of the honey tree....

name: Hookahdome - Outside The Dome
description:
Hookahdome - Outside The Dome
Eastern Tribal Sound, Performance, and Fire

name: Horny Camp
description: Come to Horny Camp 12 PM-4PM Mon-Thu to release your inner demon or woodland creature by making yourself a pair of horns! In the great Playa tradition, Horny Camp miscreants will supply clay, teach you how to fashion your own pair, and bake them for you before you leave!

name: HOTD - Hair of the Dog
description: Your friendly neighborhood dive bar and live music venue returns! Our infamous HOTD stage features daily Open Mic, variety acts, poetry slams, and the latest, greatest, and famous unsigned bands daily and nightly. You bring the drinks and music. We'll supply the drinks and music.

name: Hushville
description: Hushville, an aural oasis in an undulating sea of chaos, is open to any camper who pre-registers and can abide our three simple rules: 1)No generators; 2) no amplified sound; and 3) Leave No Trace. We are proud to host large, solo, theme, and non-theme camps, and residents from all parts of the US, Canada, and Europe.  Because Hushville is a village in Black Rock City, we can't promise that it will be quiet... just quieter.

name: I love Holly Camp
description: Going to show burning man and the world how much I love Holly...

name: I SEE YOU BABY!
description: Come and play with us atop a black pyramid. Look out onto the playa from three stories up. I see you, baby!

name: Ice Nine
description: Ice Nine is the ice sales operation located in the 9 o'clock plaza.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per bag or, a 6-pack of crushed at the discounted price of $15.  Hours are Monday through Sunday 9am - 6pm.

name: Identi-T Farm
description: Identi-T Farm will be serving Playa Names and Ice-Tea daily.  We will also be hosting a happy hour on Tuesday and a sunset Secret Identi-T Masquerade Ball on Wednesday -Bring your own mask, or one will be provided!

name: Illumelodie
description: Camp Illumelodie brings the pure expression of creativity through an artistic exploration and engagement of all six senses and invites participants to experience their "rite of passage" by returning to their most basic human awareness. Visual, aural, sensual, "scentual" and savory transcendence occur when visitors step through our gates into a place where light and music entwine, fire dances on flesh and participants are invited to go beyond their perceptions of themselves and release the sensual creative s

name: Image Node
description: Camp Image Node is bringing you The Shadow Preserve And Observatory, and a delicious art bus!

name: Incendiary Intent
description: Incendiary Intent - Making life's bad decisions for you.

name: Infinity
description: Infinity is a New York City-based camp taking its name from a gathering space, hosting spontaneous and communal gatherings, potlucks, performances, and celebrations. Infinity as a camp creates spaces, environments, and events for like-minded people to connect, participate, express, and, in turn, create. This year.s offering to the community is .The Labyrinth of Infinity., providing a gathering place at its center where interactive art, performances, and a wedding celebration will take place.

name: Intention Dimension
description: Intention Dimension is a space that encourages living intentionally in all dimensions of life through example, workshops (See WWW Guide), and an inviting atmosphere.  Come join us in our sanctuary focused on sustainability, happy healthy life styles, healing and expansion, and creative expression.

name: Interaction Cafe
description: At the Interaction Cafe we do not serve food or drinks – we serve interactions. Perhaps you'd like to start off with a casual conversation for an appetizer, engage in an interactive game for an entree and end with a song for dessert while you drink in the moment.

name: Introspectacle: Chrysalis
description:
Calling all Nympha!
Introspectacle:Chrysalis is hosting the Pupal Stage !
Come as larvae and leave as butterfly.
Metamorphosis nightly@ Introspectacle.

name: Iron Rose
description:
...when you're tired of Techno:  Iron Rose
Burn Barrels, Bluegrass and a Big Red Pill.

name: Ironika Soup Nazi and Compliments Camp
description: Drop by Ironika for a bowl of Thai soup if the Nazi lets you have any from 3-6 PM. While you eat it prepare to be complimented.

name: Is Land
description:
(Honorarium)

I. Rene invites you to a viewing of her suspended real estate.

name: JOBI -- "Coffee, Tea or Me
description:
Coffee Tea or Me
Sunrise coffee, tea and treats for early risers and late returning burners.

name: Journeys
description: Spiritual based theme camp that is open to all people and all newbies to Burning Man. Come receive unconditional acceptance, along with Spiritual Readings, healing touch, dream interpretations, genuine love and a refreshing snow cone!!!

name: JubJub's Plastic Circus
description:
Welcome! Monkey's all grow'd up  & will proudly serve funny hard-to-get drinks, uneasy rest, strange music, weird plays, loud noises, oh-so-friendly grief, bruises, nausea, vertigo i.e. Monkey Business!!!

maybe poo too…

name: Jungle Bus Lounge
description: The Jungle Bus Cigar Lounge is a small, roadside stop where peaceful people come to relax to Pink Floyd. The Jungle Bus is a vintage GMC 4104 that has been done in a Jungle theme, and is true living art.Built by Jungle Jim. His Brother Coheba has built his bus as a tropical Cuban Cigar Bar, and between the two buses is a little piece of paradise.

name: Just Passing Through
description: Camp Just Passing Through will bring people together in a relaxed atmosphere to remind them that we are all temporary visitors on this planet and teach them creative ways to Reuse, Repurpose and Recycle. We will provide all the materials necessary for our guests to create beads from junk mail and magazines so that they may string them into bracelets while enjoying great company and new friends!

name: Just Pony
description: Just Pony Camp is home to the Ponies. If we are not riding away into the horizon with our ponies, you can always stop by our shaded lounge to relax, socialize, or meet up for some pony adventures. Our shaded lounge will feature the Pony Hole Bar that will host a Sunset COCKtail party on Wednesday. If you are lucky, you may encounter a saddle ride as a Rite of Passage into Ponyhood.

name: Kalitopia Kamp
description: A place for northern and southern Kalifornians to hang out and talk, or stay longer at our refugee kamp overflow.  Come check out our talks on ritual initiations and the Apocalypse as prophecized in the California love video by Dr. Dre and TuPac.

name: Kamp Kammaniwannalaya
description: Our camp is a place old where friends and family meet and greet new friends and family.

name: Kamp Kaos
description: Kaos is the complexity of causality or the relationship between events. This means that any 'seemingly' insignificant event in the universe has the potential to trigger a chain reaction that will change the whole system.

name: Kamp Sky-Nerd
description: An Oasis of Ignorance in a Sea of Enlightenment!

name: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye
description: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye, home of the Official Black Rock City Garnish Fire Conclave and the Suck 'n Fuck Saloon. Circus, fire, comedy... The kids that hid behind the curtains at the traveling circus till close and took over! Desert Sirens enticing the Great Neptoon from his watery layer. Suckie Fuckaaaaaayeeee!

name: Kanuckistan Virgin Sacrifice
description:
For make benefit glourious nation of Kanuckistan, featuring Old
Country Vodka Snorting Bar, 7th annual Xeni Cup street hockey tournament and Canadian cultural exchange.  Alberta Regional Camp.

twitter.com/kanuckistan

name: Karma Chickens
description: Karma Chickens are all about sharing knowledge and experience while having fun! In our 25-foot shaded dome we hold drink socials and hold workshops on poi, swing dancing, belly dancing, gray water management, solar power, felting, tai chi, play acoustic music and more!

name: KashyyyK
description: Welcome to the jungle planet of KashyyyK, home of the Wroshyr Trees. Come dance, play, and frolic in the shade around our tree trunks, wander through our Bottle Cap Flower Garden, and sample our native libation, Wookie Juice!

name: Kegel Kamp and Bijou Boutique
description:
Exercise your PCs!  Can you peg the Kegel-O-Meter?
Play Kegel Pong!  Compete for valuable bragging rights 
or pick up a piece of jewelry at the Boutique!

name: Kentucky Fried Camp
description: And for yet another year Kentucky Fried will liven the mornings with Kentucky Bourbon and our delicious smoked, fried Baloney Sandwiches. We served over 2000 last year. What better way to start your day than getting Fried the KFC way! Starting 9 AM each day.

name: Khufu's Stache
description: Khufu's Stache incorporates the mystic of the Egyptian ways with the diabolic sounds of dub-step and modern moves. Khufu's Stache brings the furry during daylight hours with recreational gaming options as well as refreshments. Keep a look out for the mega-sized pharaoh's, Khufu and Ra, guarding the entrance. Come "whomp like an Egyptian" on our two story dance floor/viewing tower.

name: Kidsville
description:
KidsVille is THE place for children of all ages, with a group of diverse
families creating a unique space for play and other activities. Families with
children 0-17 years of age are welcome to camp with us if they are
pre-registered by August 1, 2011. Note: Kidsville is NOT a babysitting
service.

name: Kin-Dza-Dza!
description: In the remote galaxy of Kin-Dza-Dza lies a desert planet named Pluke. Residents of Pluke have long ago used up all of their water to make fuel. Their harsh world is littered with remnants of advanced but dingy-looking technology. We are the emissaries of their post-apocalyptic culture, hoping to learn from the spirit of the Burning Man community and bring it back to our home world.

name: Kink'os
description: Kink'os: Get your photo taken and printed on a postcard. Play with our props and people to create fun and exciting photo opportunities.

name: Korova Milk Bar
description: Korova Milk Bar: A recreation of the Korova Milk Bar from Stanley Kubrick's film A Clockwork Orange.

name: Kosmik Dust
description: Stop in for our daily Iced Tea, Lemonade and Fresh Baked Kookies in our solar ovens not to mention scheduled hot dogs, burritos and sno cones. Take a pic in our Photo Booth and create music in our walk through Sound Garden or enjoy great company in our expanded shade structures.

name: Kostume Kult
description: Kostume Kult offers daytime costuming makeovers and a celebration of YOU - emerging from the Kostume Dome, through the Nyrvana Arch and down the runway where MCs/DJs propel you onto the playa and into your new life.  For 2011, we present "Rites of Kultage" celebrating all cults and their unique rituals. Featuring Witchdokktor Magamboo O'Boogie, a Mayan Dance Temple, the Church of Coulrophilia hookah bar, the Passage of Enlightenment video tunnel and a Horned Voodoo Ball on Wednesday Night.

name: Kreme Burners
description: Rave de Creme Brulees: Enjoy cool beats in the afternoon with our DJs, while tasting the finest Creme Brulees on the playa. Later, join us for the Francophone Burners Aperitifs, and play our rites of passage game.

name: LAF Camp
description: 9 years? Yup, the LAFers are back again with the Paint-Your -Booty party, caricature artists, random Karaoke and general debauchery. Come by for a visit and get a medallion that is designed by one of our artists and laser-cut.

name: Lahontan Korps
description:
Shade and hydration for weary travelers, water refilled or provided.  Sanctuary for those that need to get away for awhile.
Misting on the road on hot afternoons, daytime workshops, and bi-nightly movies.

name: Lamplighter Village
description: For over a decade the Lamplighters have faithfully and without fail gone forth at sunset to gift Black Rock City with the light of civilization. Any and all who wish to participate in the largest and longest running art project on the playa are invited to join us at 5 P.M. every evening.

name: Land of NOD Experiment
description: Land of NOD Experiment is an interactive performance vehicle from a primitive future.  Eclectic tribal performance groups converge to collaborate on large scale music and art display meant to inspire and enhance the surrounding environment.

name: Last Rites Lounge
description: Been misbehaving on the Playa? The Last Rites Lounge, is hosting your last chance for absolution!  Come join us for a procession of mourning before we arrive at the Martini Village bar and consume mass quantities of our "Forgiveness Martini".

name: LaToya
description: LaToya = Yoga at Dawn

name: Laughing Monkey Camp
description: Come have some primal good fun at Laughing Monkey Camp. Refresh yourself with Coconut Water while enjoying djs and live music, and strong drink from the Goodnight Moon Saloon.

hometown:
ounge
A place to relax and chill from the heat and dust with beds, lavender eye pillows, cooling lavender mist and vibrating head massages. All are welcome to join us. 
Hometown: San Francisco, CA
name: Lavender Lounge
Le Zoo
description: 30 ft high, 90 ft long wooden Maya pyramid where the animals of Le Zoo will worship the Burning Sun

name: Left of Passeggch Bar
description:
Left of Passeggch Bar: your local gathering spot and so much more.

Come Drink, Sing, Dance, Enjoy spontaneous interaction in our splendid environment, our gift to you...

name: Legendary House of Booze on Black Rock Strip
description: Tired of the oontz oontz? Come by Legendary House of Booze on Black Rock Strip, have a drink, and listen to live music. In addition to having scheduled bands, we also provide a stage, sound, a drum kit, and mics for other musicians to stop by and play.

name: Lenny Camp
description: Come visit the now legendary Pope Lenny O' The Playa and his loyal minions as they wreak their very special brand of havoc from the friendly confines of Lenny Camp. We're the secret substance that holds our companion Camps all together.....come see how and enjoy the live acoustic music jams!

name: Leopard Martini Lounge/Black Rock Hash House Harriers
description: Making Martini's as dry as the playa since 1998!  Home of the Black Rock Hash House Harriers and all related activities.

name: LEtsGO Lounge
description: A place to relive (or continue) your childhood with your favorite plastic building blocks. Pounds and pounds of Lego to keep yourself entertained for hours.

name: Light and Illusion
description: Persistence of Vision, Reverspective, Electric Kaleidoscope, and many more light-optical illusions.  Demonstrations and symposia.

name: Light Hazing Camp
description: A Light Hazing art Support Camp with glow in the dark body painting and other glow and UV technologies

name: LightBox
description: Documenting your Burning Man experience one photostrip at a time.

name: Lights of Passage
description: Have you stepped out for the evening without a light?  We will find you and help light the way :)

name: liminal labs - LEGBA'S GATE
description: LIMINAL LABS are honored and—we'll admit—a bit spooked that LEGBA, dread guardian of the LOA's GATEWAY, has decided to make our camp his own. LIMINAL means THRESHOLD, after all, and for 13 years we've erected grand gates to aid transition to THE OTHER SIDE. this year's LIMINAL portal will be the grandest yet and here LEGBA will test SEEKERS, mark the WORTHY, and grant them passage to THE OTHER SIDE. revivals for the marked each evening at dusk.

name: Liminal Labs' Legba's Gate
description: LIMINAL LABS are privileged and—we'll admit—a tad spooked that LEGBA, fantome guardian at the LOA's GATEWAY, has decided to make our camp his own. it makes sense. LIMINAL means THRESHOLD and for twelve years we've erected grand gates that grant passage to THE OTHER SIDE. under this year's GATE, the grandest yet, LEGBA will test SEEKERS, mark the WORTHY, and then usher them thru to VILLE AU CAMP. raucous revivals for the MARKED each evening at dusk.

name: Liquid Baptism
description: The gods are great as they have granted us secrets to tap rivers beneath the Black Rock Desert for sweet nectars of earthly delight! Come baptize your parched throats with never-ending cold sake, infused vodkas and magical tiki drinks that miraculously bubble up from the playa in our camp's towering 8-feet tall transparent 'Toobz"... Dance the afternoon away or just chill under the shade of our authentic Moroccan tent. Brothers and Sisters, join us for happy hours Tuesday through Friday!!!

name: Liquid Latex Lounge
description:
Explore fun uses, creative techniques & sexy possibilities with liquid latex body art!

Come relax, romance, converse, contribute, partake, bake, imbibe, refresh, reflect, respect, flirt, alert, admire, desire, share, be bare, shave (body) hair, meet hotties, be naughty, devise a disguise, socialize, have (verbal?) intercourse... We're the source: PAINT/BE PAINTED in LATEX!

We provide leading brand for body art, costuming, clothing, crafts, performances, etc. (original since1998, premium quality, eco-frien

name: Livers End Bar
description: Friendly neighborhood bar, chill space, performance area.

name: Living Room
description: The Living Room is a games-oriented camp for people who want to see fire operas, all nude marching bands, and 50-foot giant squid cars from the comfort of their own home. Live.

name: LoLuxury
description: Come sit in the lap of luxury. The LoLux art car has now devolved into the ultimate advancement: LoLuxury.  and has upgraded its digs to the ultra luxurious Camp LoLuxury. Come for the glam and stay for the "High Court" badminton facility, upscale real estate, Tibetian drums, and shark tank.

name: Lost Lizard Lounge/Plumber's Crack
description:
Plumbers and Lizards...Who could ask for more!

Home of the AZ Fire Conclave, the AZ CoRE project, The Tunnel of Questionable Enlightenment and the Black Rock City Department of Public Works Plumbing Department!

name: Lotion Bar
description: Your skin is thirsty.  Drop by to hydrate, apply sunblock & much more!

name: Love At First Bite
description: Idolizing teen vampire culture is a true rite of passage.  Join our camp Tu-Fr at 2PM for celebration of Twilight.  If you are really brave, you can come by at night. It is the place to be if you want to hang out with vampires.  But watch out!  If you hang out long enough, you just may become a vampire yourself.

name: Love Potion Camp
description:
Love Potion Camp welcomes you to a chill space full of art, creativity,
whimsy, fun, family, positive vibes and Luurve. This is a non-sexual space but cuddling and BIG hugs are welcomed and encouraged.

name: Love Puddle Playground
description: Recess!  Complete with tetherball, four square, a swing set, and our all original "dildo jousting" contests, there's plenty of Love to go around.  You can even taste it if you visit our bar that serves up Love Puddle Punch, rumored to be the best punch on the Playa.  Yum!

name: Lust For Life
description: Gathered together from the cosmic reaches of the universe are the most powerful forces of good ever assembled! We are dedicated to truth, freedom, love, gifts and lemonade!

name: M*A*S*H 4207th
description:
We're not Doctors. The least disciplined (& only) military unit on the playa. Random security Checkpoints will occur. Terrorists & Loyal Citizens will be labled. Propaganda & commentary provided for the prevention of communism. Nightly viewings of old episodes & movies from the show. Since 1999, your bastion of Democracy in a sea of fifth column communist/socialist/lawless infiltrators! 
(Now located in Terminal City)

name: Magrathea
description: Help build Planet Black Rock!  Stop by and see our catalog of executive oriented, ethos maximized, planetary constructs.  Can you afford a Magrathean planet?

name: Mansonian Institute of Urban Studies
description:
Bringing the history of Burning Man to the Play, the Mansonian Istitute of Urban Studies brings the lore and legends of the event to life through a series of interactive displays.
Bring your T-Shirt to get a limited edition transfer of our award-winning logo.

name: Marching Band Camp
description: Marching Band Camp is Titanium Sporkestra and Environmental Encroachment with some members from Minor Mishap, Hungry March and Itchi O, as well as any other marching band refugees who want to camp with us, growing the alternative marching band community, making lots of music, and making people dance. We will have a stage and scheduled performances.

name: Martini Village
description: Stop by Martini Village and enjoy cold refreshments, a little relaxation or yoga, unique games, entertainment and more!!!  Visit The Shallow End, The Last Rites Lounge, Blue Agave and Local Cooling and come be apart of our world.

name: Math Camp @ Group W
description: Math Camp, A Safe Place for Mathematics. A small, social camp, we offer a place to drink and derive! Home of the Fabulous Electric Cupcakes. Purveyors of crunchy snacks & The Best Friday Morning Sunrise Cocktail Party on the Playa. Don't miss this year's DorkBot lectures series!

name: Matrushka's Roadhouse
description: Matrushka's Roadhouse - a place for weary comrade to stop for rousing political discussion, traditional libation, and some of  Old-Time Party feel.  Need to see Red?  Suffering from lack of Leninism? Glasnost got you down?  Come visit your matrushhka at Matrushka's Roadhouse - part of glorious Terminal City village.

name: MAZECAMP
description: Lost at burningman? You will be at our camp.

name: Media Mecca
description: Media Mecca is the Press Room on the playa, welcoming and helping to acculturate the registered members of the media who come to cover the event.

name: MegaCamp
description: A camp designed for the sci-fi geek in all of us.

name: Mellow Mountain
description: Try a retrograde rite of passage.  Be a kid and come play on our playground equipment.

name: Memento Mori
description: Memento Mori - Remember your death. We're all going to die... so we better have fun.

name: Ménage à Mécanique
description: Ménage à Mécanique is a collection of people and machines. Literally translating to "Household of Machines", our camp of engineers and artists design and fabricate vehicles and walking machines that are based often in themes of biomimicry and powered by alternative energy.  We believe that art is an essential component of a more energy-conscious future, and that, as shapers of this future, we can help to define and excite the discourse to come.

name: Metro Mart
description: Metro Mart.  Your Place for Playa Necessities.

name: Mid Town Campywampus
description: Not downtown, not surbubia.... Mid Town Campywampus. Bringing small town charm to Black Rock City. Mid Town  Campywampus includes members that originate from the towns of Auburn, Colfax and Weimar in Northern California and a few other random people from small towns in Japan and Kentucky.

name: Midnight PopCorn Palace
description: The Popcorn Palace returns to BRC once again to share our scrumptious late night gift with our beloved community. Chill out in our plush inviting Palace Theme Camp or find our mobile popcorn kitchen out on the playa spreading our love seed, and don't forget to visit our Palace Flossing Center.

name: Midnight Ridazz Camp
description: LA bike culture in BRC - DIY repairs, DIY destruction, and DIY F.U.N. with bicycle mechanics, builders, and ridazz. Build it, ride it, break it, fix it.

name: miniMOO Camp
description:
Stop on by for fun in our pasture, day or night, including:
- MOOvie nights
- Get your grOOve on DJs
- Art MOOvement
- Tea for me and MOO

name: Minitropolis
description: Minitropolis is a wildly interactive offering of a large group of experienced burners from both Reno/Sparks and all over the world. Drop by for laughs and a drink in The Rising Arms pub, many exciting activities including our "wheel of rites" of passage.

name: Misfit Circus
description: Here at Misfit Circus, we enjoy the simple things in life. These include (but are not limited to) tetherball, juggling, drinking, drinking while juggling, and extreme gladiator challenge!

name: Mission Country Club
description: San Francisco's Mission district outpost on the playa. Pretentious coffees served daily! Find our bike-mobile CURRY KART for fresh authentic Mission street-food. Come by Thursday at 4:20 for our 7th Annual Sangria SoundClash Party: dance to Cumbia/Salsa/Merengue while devouring 50 gallons of Sangria.

name: Misting Dome
description: An oasis in the Black Rock Desert... stop by our 20' Misting Dome and cool off!  We offer the finest organic mist available: pure Sierra snowmelt from 10,000 ft mountain wells.

name: Mohammeds Mini Martini and Erotica Camp
description: Mo's is the place in Black Rock City for the coldest martinis and the hottest erotica on a hot desert afternoon. Come in and enjoy a cool one(13 is our limit!) in our bedouin tent amid pillows and rugs. This year we will be asking our guests to write about any sexual rite of passage(first kiss?) to include in our ancient book filled with seven years of true burner erotica.

name: MOIST
description: Make art out of human body parts...any body part! Get plastered!

name: Monkey Pirate Pirate Monkeys
description: Monkeys, Bacon, DayWalker Taco's, Music ... Need we say more.

name: MONOMYTHIA
description: Become initiated in Burning Man's ever-growing secret society by completing 5 heroic tasks in the playa at large, based on Joseph Campbell's heroic cycle of the monomyth. The 5 tasks involve participation/creativity, an interview of someone noteworthy, volunteering, knowledge, and returning with a talisman. Become mythic and join those who seek the experience of the hero.

name: Monticello
description: Monticello is an interpretive colonial world where ruffles, lace, and absurdum collide to form a bedazzling collage of debauched frivolity, ornate costumery and associated lavish affairs.

name: Moolandia!
description: Have you Herd about Moolandia?  It's where all the Cool Cows go to pasture.  Whether you're in the Mood for posing for a Cow Family Portrait, being stamped with a MOO quality seal, or you just gotta have more Cowbell during our interactive "More Cowbell Hour", Moolandia has your brand of fun!  Guaranteed Udder Madness!

name: Moonbow Camp
description: A Group of Gay outdoor participants that will bring this years Gay Pride Parade and various community/spiritual events. Experience our new Shade Lounge and our Gay Pride reception Party this year!

name: Moonrock High School
description: Moonrock High School is a functioning funhouse replica of a typical American high school. We encourage scholars of all stripes to come congregate and learn with our licentious lecturers and scandalous students.

name: More Carrot (Black Rock Farmers Market)
description: Every day is a harvest festival celebrating the abundance of nature. Fresh chilled fruits, crispy crunchy vegies, assorted herbs and some ready to eat surprises will be served dust or shine, 8-11am Monday-Friday.

name: More Fun, Less Suck
description: The name says it all. Non-naughty knots and Neighborhood Watch to keep things safe-ish and keep away the suck.

name: Morning Margarita Maniacs!!!!
description: Thirsty in the morning? Come by and have a margarita on us! We will be serving our refreshing cocktails from 10am-12pm

name: Mosaic Lounge
description: A camp inspired by the atheistic and magical vibe of the ancient Arab country of Morocco, built utilizing the principals of sacred geometry and sustainability.  Explore all the senses of your body as we take you on a magical journey into Mosaic Lounge:  touch, smell, listen, dance, pose, taste, savor and embrace this rite of passage.

name: Mountain Mayhem
description: Mountain Mayhem shall provide beautiful beats, chill atmosphere and stupendous smiles for all that dare to enter.  Come chill in our camp with mountain critters, and put a shot-ski in your mouth whydontcha.

name: Mudskippers Urban Decay Cafe
description: A queer-friendly camp serving up the gayest Root Beer Floats on earth!

name: Mudslingers
description: Individually brewed cups of coffee with freshly ground beans fit for the best (or worst) of coffee snobs, served daily.  Host of the Burning Man Bike Race.

name: Multi Multi Touch Touch Camp
description: Come play with our interactive Kinect-based instrument that generates music and visuals.  Any number of hands (or other appendages) can be used simultaneously.

name: Music Savages t-shirt Arena
description: An intimate multi-level, shaded arena with a recycled T-shirt outer skin, hosting daily electronic dance music events from noon until midnight. Join us for a host of costume theme parties, ridiculous accoutramons, sleazy antics and an eclectic mix of internationally recognized musical talent.

name: Mutant Vehicle Repair
description: Mutant Vehicle Repair, your one stop for all of your mutant vehicle fuck ups, break downs, mishaps, and uh-oh's, if your lucky

name: Mystikal Misfits return home
description: Welcome Home!  This year the Mystikal Misfits return home: the basement hangout space of our youth.  We are returning to restore, rejuvenate, and save up for our own place.  Come hang out with our “parents”, watch TV with friends, have a drink on the house, play a game, or just escape the sun for a minute.

name: Mystopia
description: Mystopia is the playa's most refreshing oasis. Our multi-generational camp has everything you could need: cool misters, frozen otter pops, chill house music, comfortable seating, and more Persian rugs than a camel can sneeze at.

name: N.I.P.S.
description: Nipple Inspection and Placement Station. Coming tp BRC to further advancements in the science of nipple classification. How do your nipples stand up? Come by to have your nipples evaluated for type and class. Nipple coverings and jewelry will be given as needed while supplies last.

name: NAILS N 'TAILS
description: We all know how the playa leads to nothing but chipped and cracked nails. Well head over to Nails N 'Tails to slap a nice fresh coat on while you enjoy a cocktail. Relax in our comfy playa salon, make friends and have a nail painting party with us!

name: Naked Ninjas
description: Our sneakiness is something to be seen! Join us Monday and Wednesday afternoon for tasty libations and funky beats in the Ninja Temple, and Thursday evening for classic sci-fi movie action in honour of a fallen friend.

name: Namers at Rest
description: PLAYA NAME HELP provides meaningful playa names for Black Rock City citizens.

name: Nasty's Dive Bar
description: Welcome to Nasty's Dive Bar, your new home away from home. From misfits to heathens, from ravers to furries, you are all welcome to take a load off a relax a while, play some games, sing some songs, as Nasty fixes you up a fresh cocktail.

name: Nectar Village
description: Nectar Village is about you. It is about what you need… to survive, refuel, and revitalize. Mind, body and spirit are all served, and you’ll find the nectar you seek for any of them, in the camps at our oasis. Offerings continuously from 8am to 10pm.

name: NEON MONKEY
description: Where the concrete jungle of metropolis meets the prismatic nature of the hominid family, Neon Monkey is formed, an evolutionary experiment of buffoonery and rapturous indulgence. We offer to our community yoga, meditation, EFT circles, hoop jams, and incredible music by talented EDM producers and DJs. Enter our Neon Jungle and evolve with us.

name: NeverNeverLand
description: Calling all lost boys and girls, fly away to NeverNeverLand, where you'll never grow old.  Come to our lagoon and party down, and watch out for those pesky pirates.

name: New Jersey
description: What a difference a state makes!

name: NEXUS
description: Nexus is an experimental community, within an experimental city. We live, sleep, work, eat, drink and party like rockstars together. Epic music every night, and friendly sarcastic bartenders keep you coming back for more all week long.

name: Nice Nice
description: We are an international group of artists, musicians, and innovators. Come make music with our tubular bells and gongs, interact with our neon sculpture, or just take some time to relax; all while listening to the sound of a babbling brook.

name: Nit Whips
description: Nit Whips is a luminescent and physical space where human and elemental momentum becomes light. Up close, engage with interactive Nit Whips and generate rich luminous compositions, from afar experience the drapes shimmering in the night.

name: NOLA CORE
description: NOLA CORE is the base camp for Mama Nola, the New Orleans regional effigy.

name: Nom De Plume
description: Dub... Were a dub camp and we play a variety of dub sounds. We serve chai tea, yerba mate and coffee, come by to skank, watch a movie, drink some tea and thrive.

name: Noonaantea
description: Noonaantea is a loving camp devoted to revitalizing travelers during their many rites of passage. Come by our comfortable dessert oasis to enjoy tantalizing teas and scrumptious naan bread daily at noon.

name: Northwest Mist
description: Providing a soothing Northwest atmosphere to escape the mid-day heat. Step through the Northwest Mist portal and transcend the heat of the day for a momentary refreshening.

name: Nose Fish
description: Nosefish returns in 2011 with Quesadillas and the MEZ Video screen at night, and our EL Wire Repair service during the day.

name: Nutz
description: Bunnies, Smurfs, Jellies, Monkeys, and Spacenutz... we've come to realize we're just Nutz!  See you at sunrise:)

name: NYC Container Camp
description: NYC Container Camp is the New York container filled with all the love, joy, art and creativity shipped from the other side of the country! Come get your goods, put your art and bikes together, and sit awhile for our nightly NYC Happy Hour!

name: Nyrvana Village
description: Nyrvana Village is anchored by Kostume Kult to be joined by Raised By Wolves, Entwined, Love3 and PRED.  Our Esplanade will be alive all day with costume giveaways, MCs, DJs, ongoing runway shows and 24-7 shenanigans.  Find the 15' arch and you will be in Nyrvana. We have fun here.  (see individual camp listings for more)

name: Oasis 47
description: We are the small craft bazaar in Black Rock city.  Liberate your inner artist amidst our comfortable tribal nomads.  Join us to practice fire spinning, embellish bronze pendants, learn the secrets of EL wire or take our crab taxi to far away places.  Join us. We serve you.

name: obnoXious
description: obnoXous returns to the playa this year with their tower full of lights and sound.  You can visit us or listen to our "Public Service Announcements" broadcast over our PA system which provide you with absolutely no useful information!

name: Ocean's Serene Luxury Day Spa
description: Retreat from the heat and the dust inside Ocean's Serene Luxury Day Spa @ Stardust Lounge Casino, where you can pamper your skin with a rejuvenating treatment, cool off with our hand-held fans and misters,or simply hang out and relax with our lovely mermaids. New for Rites of Passage: playa weddings and photo opportunities at our "Under the Sea" Wedding Chapel!

name: Octopi in the Sky!
description: Octopi in the Sky is the ultimate underwater experience in the middle of the desert! Come explore the sights and sounds of the deep ocean, dance with sea animals and get lost in an infinite forest of seaweed!

name: Oden's Eye Apple Cider
description: As Fenris Wolf rises on the event horizon of the Black Rock Desert, Oden's battleslain return to bandy cider to the embattled residents of our fair City.  Drink of the Fruit of the Tree of Knowledge, and distinguish between Good and Ill!

name: Oh No You Didn't!
description: Be our guest and get it off your chest at our playa confessional lounge, featuring unprofessional counseling, libelous libations and scornful judgment from our panel of experts.  Commiserate with the best as MC Amy Wineho' helps keep your shame in perspective.

name: one world currency camp
description: One World Currency Camp, is a hub for a network of community currency activists, whose mission is the creation of a secure, ecologically sustainable, resource based, electronic, open source, transparent, interest free, fee free, money system / medium of exchange created by the people, for the people, available to every human on the Earth.

name: ONiON
description: Yep, it's us.  Your least favorite cigar bar on the playa.

name: Opulent Temple
description: Sacred dance to world class music, in a self made setting for the evolution of the community and the world through shared peak experience on a dance floor.

name: Oroboros!
description: Oroboros! is an art collective consisting of BBoys and BGirls (Break dancers), Poppers, Fire Dancers, Visual Artists, Yogis, + other vibrant personalities from NY, Cali + Beyond. We intend to illuminate, entertain, beautify, and expand the creative parameters of the human spirit!

name: OSIRIS
description: Step onto the dusty playa expanse, warm wind caressing your face, eyes scanning the horizon. You will witness the rise of the great pyramid, a feat yet unknown to Black Rock City.  Man-made or mythical, OSIRIS is your portal; your doorway from the living to beyond.  Your passage between worlds – music, passion, and art are created here.  Exiting OSIRIS you are changed forever.  You've glimpsed the Underworld, with OSIRIS as your guide.

name: OtherMelon
description: Celebrating and destroying The Other since 1943.

name: Otter
description:
Otter is an oasis of love and conscious celebration.  This is
the 17th year in a row in which we, the Otter Clan, bring our big love, laughter and fancy pants dancing to Burning Man!

name: Outpost 23
description: Outpost 23 - we strive reach new and obtuse ways to affect your sanity. Whether it be through music or just being generally weird; we're here to serve you. But were not sure what to do after that...expect 80's music, megaphones and bubbles...

name: Paddy Mirage
description:
The Paddy Mirage is your bar on the playa. Dedicated to live music, Great craic, Art, Communication, Guinness, Whiskey.. you know.. all the good things.

http://www.burntheirishbar.com/

name: Painting your Patootie
description: Body painting from armbands to risque all week, just drop on by, or come talk if you are looking for something special. Artists are welcome to bring your stuff and help with the crowd, email us if you are interested.

name: Pancake Playhouse
description: Pancakes and soft rock:  two great tastes that taste great together

name: Pandora
description: Come visit us to find a variety of awesome events and people inside the "box".

name: Pandora's Lounge & Fix-It Shoppe
description: A full-service daytime lounge and light-service do-it-yourself fix-it shoppe, Pandora's is back for its sixth, seventh, i-dont-know-ith year of fixing it until it's broken!

name: Papa Legba
description: Papa Legba operates a free-use, experimental cellular service supporting texts and short calls on-playa and to (but not from) the outside world. We also provide a gathering point for people interested in VoIP, telephony, software radio and cellular technology.

name: Paradise Motel
description: Weary travelers are invited to stop in for a snow cone, enjoy some progressive beats and relax by the "pool".  Look for the pink flamingoes.

name: Party Liberation Front - PLF
description: The PLF brings you boombastic beats, performances, chill space, libations, and Dirty South Hospitality straight from the Capitol of the Crunkfederacy! You can Boogie Down with us or retreat into our homegrown Rites of Passage, a series of seven altars designed to squeegee your soul!

name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
description: Serving morning Bloody Mary’s and cold alcohol Tiki Punch for ages 21 and over. Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. Pull up a stool and enjoy a conversation. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get “leid”. Come party with us & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly. Also check out our party schedule. Be prepared to show proof of legal age.

name: Pee Funnel Camp
description: Pee Funnel Camp dispenses Pee Funnels for ladies that want to stand and pee in the port-a-potties or to save a trip and pee in the bottles.  Come get yours 24/7 from Pee Funnel Camp or our 2nd Pee Funnel Dispenser.

name: People's Art Congress
description: People's Art Congress, where the people and the art are one. All Black Rock artists are invited to participate in the evolution of the People's Kaleidoscope, an interactive art project. You provide the imagination - we provide the paint and brushes.

name: Persian Excursion
description: Kick up your feet and recharge your adventurous spirit in our cozy & cool ambient oasis by lounging in our hammocks, receiving a soothing henna tattoo, enjoying the belly dancers, sipping refreshing Moroccan mint tea, misting a new friend, and sharing fine Turkish tobacco from our hookahs.

name: Phantasmatis Apparatus
description:
Phantasmatis Apparatus  is a camp celebrating the uncanny in technology,
the fascinating autonomy that mechanisms seem to take on, and their habit
of playfully subverting  users' intentions. Phantasmatis Apparatus in
Latin means "ghost machine"; it also evokes the word phantasm, or fantasy.
When technological devices go haywire, they open the door to new worlds of
imagination, pointing us in directions that we would not have envisioned
had they continued functioning according to design. Our camp features DI

name: Philadelphia Container Camp
description: This will be the place where the Philadelphia container will be dropped off. Come collect your gear & make sure to drop it off no later than noon on Sunday!

name: Pickle Joint
description: Pickles, served the way you like 'em: fresh, crisp, and brisk.  Dare to try our signature, legendary playa cocktail, the Pickle-tini, or just sit at the bar and look cool.  Since 2002.

name: Pigmalions: Boar Mitzvah
description: Pigmalions camp has traditionally served up delicious batch of hot bacon and bloody marys at 11am-ish every morning.  This year we will be mixing it up with day and night time offerings.  We will alternate service of bacon and blood mary's Mon & Wed morning from 11am-1pm and serving hot toddies Tues & Thurs evening from 10pm-12am.  We promise a relaxed atmosphere and good natured servers day or night.

name: Pillow Punch
description:
Come try the Ambrosia known as PlayaPunch and step in the ring with your fluffy weapon of doom.

Pillow Punch is a Pillow Fighting ring where all participants are invited to drink heavily of our specially brewed punch then do battle with pillows in an all out melee.  Settle that grudge with pillows! Like Thunderdome only softer!

name: PINATAS REVENGE
description: Behold! The Pinata Strikes Back--and Revenge has never been sweeter! Look for the world's only 'Living Pinata', roving the Playa. Find it swinging freely and fearlessly over the incredible PinataMobile. And if you dare to face it, choose your weapon carefully--because this Pinata fights back!

name: Pink Carpet (formerly SchweinKamp)
description: Pink Carpet bows in adoration to all pink and porky rites of passage - all that is bacon - and brings porcine love to fellow burners. It's a space for interpersonal management refinement, fashion, and self-help for those cursed with hangovers, physical and metaphysical.

name: Pink Heart
description: Pink Heart brings to you shade, shelter and a water bar in the Pink Lounge & Esplanade Viewing Station while you sit in soft furry pink comfort and look through our super hi-def portal looking towards the active Playa.  We only get one channel… but it is AWESOME.

name: Pink Parachute Booblz
description:
Play with your Bubbles
Kids of all ages.

name: Pixelstad
description: International hub of Art, Music, Performance, Yoga, Absinthe

name: Planet Earth
description: Planet Earth is Black Rock City's 80s and 90s dance camp, join us nightly to dance to New Wave, Goth/Industrial, Pop, Synth, and more starting at 8pm every night.

name: Planetarium Camp
description: The Planetarium is a walled roofless structure that provides a clear view of the night sky without the light pollution from BRC. Additionally, artificial celestial events, such as meteors, UFO's, fake constellations, etc are superimposed upon the night sky adding a funny interactive element.

name: Play Practice Poi Camp
description: We gift sets of practice poi & teach basic moves of spinning poi (no fire.)

name: Play)A(Skool
description: Play)A(Skool: Naughty boys and girls, degenerate faculty, kids in the playground of life; adherents to the ethos of Burning Man with a mission to sprinkle the globe with Playa dust. Calling all Lovers, Rock-stars, Scholars, the Opulent and the Mystics: pull up your Big Wheel to our playground, check out daily .classes. at the SkoolHouse, play games in the yard, get immortalized in Play)A(Skool's .unique. yearbook, and even lose your virginity all over again as we resurrect Prom.

name: Play-a-Ground
description: Play-a-Ground Is made up of 3 32 FT. Galvanized Domes, One Dome hosts the McCauley sound system, the second hosts the "Body Bar", and the third Dome is the "Main Event Bass Dome" Come Play with us on the Play-a-Ground.

name: Playa 54
description: Playa 54 - a happy little groove - Join us in the afternoon as L.A. local DJs spin the best of the 80's, disco, house, and more. Come over and celebrate music with us, and get your groove on!!

name: Playa Bike Transport
description:
"Playa Bike Transport" will transport your bike - anyone's bike - from San
Francisco to BRC!  Our camp" Bike Lounge features a bar, mist, music, piano,
shade, and bike repair tools.  Mechanics drop in.  We especially love
2-seater bikes and their riders (Pedicabs, Rickshaws, Tandems, Xtracycles).

name: Playa Info
description: We've combined many of the information services into one, easy-to-find, location in Center Camp: our famous Oracles who will answer all your questions; Directory computers on which you can register your campsite or locate a theme camp, find art, events, and your friends as well as send/receive messages; bulletin boards; and, Lost & Found.

name: Playa Jazz Cafe
description: The Playa Jazz Cafe is back for it’s 7th year with live nightly jazz performances and our signature Irish coffee. The Jazz Cafe is a musical sanctuary for the weary playa traveler lost in a sea of electronica. Musicians are encouraged to bring their instruments and help spread the magic of jazz!

name: Playa Pail Kids
description: Providing a valuable public service by educating Black Rock citizens about the many colorful characters that they are sure to meet. Our art will grace the Playa for one week only before it is whisked off to the Louvre, the Palace of Fine Arts, and the MOMA in Manhattan.

name: Playa Pete's Plaza
