description: Home of the Famous and mysterious Playa Pete. Yes, he does exist.

name: Playa Prayer Flag Camp (aka "Terraform")
description: PPFC  (aka Terraform last year) is a sanctuary from the intensity of Burning Man, providing a mellow & sacred space for you to come and artistically express yourself.  We will have a mobile prayer flag making art car at The Temple, our camp, and throughout Burning Man, downtempo beats, and chill vibes.  Stop by for a cool drink and take a load off...Namaste

name: PLAYA SURFERS
description:
Playa Surfers are back with motorized surfboards and tarp surfing! Yup, get Pipeline style stand-up barrels! Of course, we will have surf instructors at hand to assist in case. Look for our traditional lifeguard tower #33 and in addition our new Wave Stage which will add beauty to our Esplanade frontage especially at night. We also will host a couple ragin' sunset parties with some sick DJ line-ups being scheduled.
C-ya on the playa!!! Wooohoo!

name: Playa-dentity
description: CAMP PLAYA-DENTITY will do our part by providing the fine citizens of BRC with their very own personalized laminated BRC ID Badge.  Come by and chill while creating a memorable badge of honor where we will photograph your most valued physical attribute along with some fun who are you in the world responses and your of course your Playa address to help you find your way home after a crazy night of Playa FUN!

name: Playagon Village
description: The PlayaGon is an infinite-dimensional hyper-inclusive object containing futurists, scientists, artists, 'free-range synergists', and more.  In this object you'll find minds looking forward, listening inward, and reaching out. Join us for mind expanding memes, rigorous debate, and good margaritas.

name: Playasophy Camp
description: Our gift to Black Rock City? Knowledge: Join us in our quest for Playasophy, "The wisdom of the sand."

name: Playatel, Tweet, and Chill
description:
Playatel provides a chill dome with high speed wireless internet for those
who want to Skype home. Also we will provide a secondary cellular base
station for free SMS and cell service across BRC in conjunction with Papa Legba Camp.  We will also  host  the Playa Choir, performing at our 50 ft dome
on Sunday morning at 10:30.

name: Playawaste Raiders
description: No mutants allowed and we have games and stuff.  This year, featuring Japanese pop artist Ken Hamazaki and awesomeness.

name: Playfully Yours
description: Our camp is well equipped and a safe environment for beginners and those curious in light BDSM (dungeonous) play. We also have an 8 ft chain web, petting zoo cage, and kneeling prayer bench that offer fun Burning Man photo opportunities for you and your friends.

name: PLEASair
description: 125' Airplane shaped Performance Bar providing a "Mile High Pole Dance Contest" daily with our grand prize winners getting a flight over BRC from the BRC Airport.

name: Pleasure Island
description: Join us at Pleasure Island for a Donkey Bar cocktail served by pretty wenches.  Make an ass of yourself and earn your donkey ears!, pumping DJ beats nightly, hammocks to loaf in, Poi, Hooping and various entertainments.

name: Pod of Bliss
description: A serene oasis where you can float in the frequencies created by an intimate crew of sound healers, body workers, and movement therapists. Whether you come for tea and yoga at sunrise or a didgeridoo treatment by dusk, a visit to our calm dome may be the most relaxing space you'll find at the Burn.

name: Poetry cosmic & spoken word atelier
description: write, realize your dreams & feed the writing machine. Workshop & spoken word for 1 hour at noon every day. Tuesday "Initiation" Wesnesday "Cosmic identity" Thursday "Metamorphosis" Friday "Live with the fire" Saturday "First Love" Sunday "Conscious dreams". Included Body Writing

name: Poisoned Palace
description: Come be a rock star at the Palace Karaoke Bar. We've got a professional sound system, stage lights, and 2500 songs in our book. So what's it gonna be? The Stones or The Smiths? Madonna or Metallica? Neil Young or Neil Diamond? Van Morrison or Van Halen? Dare to bare for nude-a-roke, or pit your pipes against other contestants at Black Rock Idol!

name: Pollyanna Camp
description: Come Play the Glad Game!  There is a lot of suffering in the world and sometimes even misery on the playa, but playing the Glad Game will help you keep all that suck from harshing your burn.

name: Poly Asylum
description: Aahhhh it's the asylum! Poly Asylum, that is. We're both a refuge from the wilds of monogamy, and a place to be locked up for your own safety while you work out your nonmonogamy drama. We welcome all burners, monogamous and polyamorous alike, to stop in, be seen by experienced Poly Doctors, attend our workshops and parties, or simply be put in a straight jacket.

name: PolyParadise
description:
PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from  '2:00 - 10:00'  for the past 12 years.

We are a group of Polyamorists seeking to live our dreams, and this camp is one manifestation of that. Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners.

Join us in a variety of events - Come in from the sun....take a load off your feet...

name: Pony Girl Express
description: Pony Girl Express is a delivery and transportation service for the population of Black Rock City. Our pony boys and girls will deliver mail, papers, ice, gifts or anything else (even potentially passengers) from camp to camp.

name: Pope Decadent's House of Beverage
description: Come join the good people of Pope Decadent's House of Beverage for the most state-of-the-art methods in integrating your transformative on-playa experiences with your off-playa self. Leverage a delicious beverage, share your story at our listening post, borrow from our lending library, get photographed in our photography studio, and explore our nightly ceremonies that are guaranteed to put the "permanent" in "transformation."

name: PORT11
description: PORT11.org is your gateway to the BRC spaceport observatory, welcoming center for brilliant visitors from around the galaxy. Visit @spacePORT11 to land your mutant spacecraft for a day of music & talks or explore your human potential as quantum acrobats & integral leaders. Imagine TEDxMosEisley with music, social enterprise visionaries & deep space travelers convening to blow your minds and you are almost at PORT11. Get your intergalactic visa at port11.org

name: Porta-Potty Pigs
description:
Looking for a clean potty? Tired of checking for paper? Visit the Porta-Potty Pigs!
Located at the Porta-Potties at 4:00 between C and D.
Our elegant courtesy station offers an unlimited supply of toilet paper! Also find amenities such as hand sanitizer, wet-wipes, tanning lotion and water. Always offering shade and good vibes. Visit the Porta-Potty Pigs when you're in the neighborhood!

name: Primate Playground
description: Celebrate your Primal Passage at the Primate Playground! Participate in our Gorilla style Samba dancing, Hula Hoop swinging, Sparkle Pony educational workshops and more entertaining events. Chill on our shady luscious astro-grass.

name: PrivateMonkey
description: Party & Arts Community from Duesseldorf, Germany

name: Pro Leisure Tour
description: Pro Leisure Tour - Lubricating your passage to Adulthood through the Leisure Arts.

name: Prod Pump & Rest - Polka Dot Prom
description: Come to the Prod for coffee in the morning, prom at night and a full service nail salon to get you all dolled up or maned up for the prom

name: Prometheatrics
description: Bringing the Gift of Fire to Humankind since the Dawn of Time! Come experience the fully immersive Tesseract Mirror Box (Lasers, Blinkies and Pool Toys, oh my!), delight in the transformative rite of the ReBirthing Tube, enjoy edifying Flow Temple workshops during the day and join us for nightly fire shows and daily dawn-fire as we liberate the Spirit of Flame!

name: PRON
description: PRON is an interactive cyber entity that responds to participants tempo and exuberance with sound and light. This summer at Burning Man, come dance with PRON

name: Psychedelic Freakshow Camp
description: Psytrance is back on the playa! Join Psytribe and family for a magical experience on the dance floor featuring some of the biggest acts in the world!

name: Psychic Taxi
description: Psychic Taxi is the home of "Random Service" Rickshaws. Our home base is 20 hammocks in deep shade. Luxurious bicycle-drawn carriages operate on a random 24 hour basis to ease the travails of the foot sore and weary. A cafe pulled by bikes decaffeinate the needy.

name: psychoticbumpschool
description: days of the funkapus!

name: Pyramid Cocoon (Pyracoco)
description:
Commune with the pink, fabric supporting you, weightless,
protected. Gather energy from the pyramid for your travels.

name: Pyramid Portal
description:
Here's the opportunity to experience the freedom of childhood again.Our 40' pendulum swing allows you the ability to free your mind & heart & return to a time when your life was much simpler.Remember jumping on a swing & pushing the
limits, if you closed your eyes, you WERE flying! Come FLY w/ us!

name: Pyronauts & Galactic Jedi
description: Pyronauts & Galactic Jedi Camp is a nexus of Jedi from around the Galaxy, dedicated to the development of our interplanetary relationships and progression of various dynamic art forms including Dance, Poi, Staff, Sword, and Hoop. With an international all-star Fire Conclave troupe and a multitude of Galactic educators, speakers, and performers, this camp is a hub for Guardian initiates and seasoned Masters from across the Galaxy.

name: QPTQA
description: QPTQA is changing the art of DJing, Spinning Tunes back to back is has been... we invite audience participation and integration... its about being part of the performance not about performing.

name: Quixotes Cabaret  Presents The Flashman Arms
description: Quixotes’ returns to Burning Man in 2011 to embrace the wonder of cabaret whilst tipping our hat to the Rights of Passage via Tom Browns Schooldays by presenting The Flashman Arms. Our gift to the desert is a Pub with an open mic Cabaret Stage where you can come and realise your Cabaret fantasies, join us for a tasty beverage, and enjoy the show

name: Radio Electra
description: We put the ROCK in Black Rock City. Tune in for an eclectic array of music, mayhem and commentary. Theme camps, villages, and artists wishing to make radio announcements about events on the playa are welcome to stop in or contact us by email prior to the event. Celebrating our 12th year on the playa.

name: rainbow sapians
description: We are Rainbow galactic warriors that share art and music that will soothe the savage soul.

name: Raising the Dead
description: Stop by camp for playa survival tips.

name: RAMPART Urgent Care
description: RAMPART Urgent Care is the premiere medical care facility in Black Rock City. Humboldt General Hospital operates the facility in partnership with the Black Rock City Emergency Services Department. RAMPART Urgent Care is fully equipped to handle any medical emergency.

name: Rancho Amarillo Collective
description: Come to the Rancho Amarillo Collective for what ails ya;  see the playa from our deck or just dive in to a PB&J, any time of night or day.  Get a spiked slushie from the Ice Palace, hang out in the dome tent, ride on the GrrrBug or Yellow Submarine, enjoy our mirrortopia and/or get heckled by Ajax, the One True Heckler of BRC.  Attendance is mandatory.  All is well, that is all.

name: Ranger Camp Moscow
description: The "Cold War" is not over yet, comrades...

name: Ranger Outpost Berlin
description: May ve zee joor papers pleaze?

name: Ranger Outpost Tokyo
description:
Ranger 0utp0st T0ky0. T0ky0 loves you. Come to T0ky0.
Home of the 10-7 Lounge.

name: Rawsafari
description: Raw energy is our game- come by tuesday through friday during the day to enjoy kombucha and raw treats with us as we dance, play, and relax in the warmth of the sun.

name: Reading Rainbow
description: Butch Queens! Femmes! Banjee Boys! Put on your best face, work a fresh look and vogue your little heart out at Camp Reading Rainbow!

name: Reborn Again
description: Come One, Come All to reclaim your virginity!! We guarantee restoration of your burning man hymen to its pre-playa, pre-jaded, pre-dusty condition. Unlimited rebirths available....

name: RECLINERS
description: RECLINERS - We have stationary & motorized recliners to carry you through the Rights of Passage.

name: Red Lightning
description: Red Lightning is dedicated to serve as a catalyst to help transform our connections with Earth, Spirit and each other.  Through events, workshops, performances and ceremony, we provide connections with other community members and access to critical information for our collective evolution and awakening consciousness.

name: Red Sun
description: Camp Red Sun:  Come escape the burning sun.  Relax in our red hammocks, get red in the face playing a game of dodgeball on our court, or enjoy our raging red sno-cones.

name: Reformata
description: Reformata is a newfound collective of modern thinkers, passionate artisans, and talented movers and shakers. Our purpose is the continual discovery and refinement of new forms of art and sound well beyond the present envelope to provide the mind and soul with new beginnings.

name: Reincarnation Lounge & Day Spa
description: Who will you come back as? Here is your chance to change who you are and what you will be. Come by and visit with our non-Certified Reincarnation Counselors, who will assist you in finding that new you.

name: ReinKarmation Station
description: Come to the ReinKarmation Station to tune up your karma. Spin the "Wheel of Karma" and win fabulous prizes!!!

name: Reno Housewives
description: Helping costume BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US! From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered.

name: Research and Development
description: By day our camp is a place to lounge and learn about your fellow citizens. By night, we shake our tail feathers; bring your dancing shoes.

name: Retrofrolic
description: Retrofrolic is an adult oriented camp offering games of pain and pleasure for prizes.  Various sensual toys and furniture are available for lifestyle activities pertaining to exploration of interactive situations in the pursuit of the undulations of agony and ecstacy.

name: Reverbia (Live Music Camp)
description: Reverbia will feature Live Music with festival caliber bands who are currently active on the festival scene TBA.  Join us for Live Music Morning Yoga, Beatles at Noon, Open Mic- 1pm-2pm, Singer/Songwriter Showcases, followed by Live band concerts, and Burn This Town Down (Collective musical jams in the late afternoon). Each night from Tuesday- Saturday 9pm-midnite, we will feature a concert with one or two acts. If you like live music... Reverbia is your destination.

name: RevoFuckinLution
description: Camp RevoFuckinLution is back for the third time with the coldest North West beers on the Playa. Serving from dusk till the kegs run out! Bring a cup, your ID, a joke, a stupid human trick, or anything that will impress our bartenders. We also offer various workshops and fun events during the day along with themed music nights for this year.

name: Revolution Camp, HQ of Department of Public Words
description: Activists, anti-capitalists, artists, scientists and philosophers who yearn for a better world; join us for unfettered and bodacious discussions with revolutionary intent. How the imagination, community, creativity, ethos and radical ideas found at Burning Man, can be part of a cultural Rite of Passage – Where people are encouraged to go beyond a system dominated by capitalism and its culture of consumerism, narrow individualism, racial and sexual oppression and the unending destruction of the planet and it

name: RhythmWave
description: RhythmWave theme camp brings conscious dance and movement to Black Rock City. Several times every day, we will offer facilitated ecstatic dance (including 5Rhythms, Soul Motion, and Dancing Freedom), contact improv, sitting meditation, breathwork, drumming, yoga, and more - all on our unique, fully shaded bamboo dance floor. All are invited to join us in the experience of RhythmWave!

name: Right There
description: Camp Right There is a shady chill space where we encourange you to express yourself with the written word. Come in and write you thoughts, feelings and experiences on one of our daily boards or in one of the journals

name: Risa
description:
RISA is just like the resort planet from Star Trek, renowned for its breezes and easy-going, uninhibited sexuality. Our main attraction at Risa this year
is the Peacock Shuttle.

name: Rites of Assage
description: ASS not what Burning Man can do for you, but what your ASS can do for Burning Man. -"This is some crazyass shit, man!"

name: Rites of Spring! Camp
description: Childhood is often described as “the springtime of one’s life”, so come visit our Spring!time playground to relive your childhood among our spring-themed toys and participate in one of our daily pogo stick races for springy prizes!  After playtime, chill in our spring dome and listen to the Rites of Spring by Stravinsky and other Spring!time music.

name: Rites Of Zion
description:
http://element11.org/
http://element11.org/the-events/galleryy/

name: Rites, Rituals, and Traditions
description: The goal of this year's exhibit will be to educate and involve Burning Man participants in understanding the important role that BLM plays in the protection and management of America's cultural and historic legacy. Emphasis will be placed on how to experience the many wonderful opportunities that public lands offer each of us to experience, for ourselves, this great historic and cultural resource.

name: Riviera Beach
description: From deep behind the Orange curtain, a rag tag group of burners have escaped to the Black Rock underground.  If you can find them, and you need a margarita, find Riviera Beach

name: Robot Heart
description: The Playa's biggest mobile sound system featuring international music talents rocking the decks every night. Enjoy love and beats in high fidelity sound while we roll around, kicking up dust by day, and illuminating the skies by night. Come play with us on the playa by finding the Robot Heart.

name: ROBOTRONIA
description: Home of Hotshot the Robot, Intruder Alert! Robotic Art, d6, The Interactive Omega Wall, awful movies and ice-line audio.

name: RockStar Orphans
description:
RockStar Orphans, a small group of misfits from Seattle Wa, will be providing a "Roaming Spa" in 2011. We'll travel the length of the playa each day, providing lucky individuals with spa treatments including: umbrella shade, aromatic misting, hair treatments, lotion, massage, reiki, makeup/face painting, a heart covered pair of new socks, and all the love and compassion YOU DESERVE!

So, if you see a lonely chair on the Playa that says "Sit Here!", you'd best do it!

name: Rogue Burners
description: An eclectic neighborhood, camps clustered around an "open space" chill zone, a home for travelers on the endless journey, dharma bums, those booking passage to Erewhon, lost souls and madmen...not for everyone.

name: Roll the Dice
description: Many Rites of Passage are a roll of the dice.  The future is uncertain.  Risk your old self, roll the dice and see where you go.

name: Roustabout 505 Circus Camp
description: A camp a silly circus wanderers from New Mexico and beyond! Come enjoy tutu-making, poi, hula hooping, belly dance, and juggling lessons, or come hang out and play on our aerial rig!

name: Rue Morgue
description: Rue Morgue is a sanctuary for grieving durring the day. Daily origami crane folding instruction during the day. Origami cranes are placed in our playatech Goffins for later transport to the years Temple burn. At night we party like zombies on jet fuel at the Infected Bar to the sounds of Industrial, Goth and a mix of whatever gets us up an dancing. Nighttime is a celebration of letting go.

name: S'mores N Amour
description: You can't go camping without S'MORES...everyone's favorite camping snack.  You bring the appetite, campfire songs, and good cheer; we provide the rest for you to roast marshmallows, then create and eat a S'more.

name: Sacred Cow-Girl Saloon
description: The Sacred Cow-Girl Saloon welcomes all wayward cowpokes to our frontier Saloon, where from 4p Wed-Fri you can make your reservations and join us grilling up the best grub this side of the Truckee (and don't forget the moonshine!).  Listen to bluegrass beats, test your riding skills on Bessie, our bungee bull riding barrel, and play some high stakes horseshoes as the grill fires...after dinner entertainment includes crooked poker, offensive comedy and non-thematic live music!

name: Sacred Spaces Village
description:
SSV is continuing its tradition of combining the efforts, talents, resources, gumshun and elbow grease of a multi-national plethora of artists, teachers, healers, builders, performers, visionaries, culinaries etc. to create an amazing, transformative, embracing, grounding, captivating, and engaging experience for each other and our playa family.
Our theme this year is "reEmegence" with emphasis on the various dimensions of growth/change as demonstrated by the seasons, directions, elements, the human endeavo

name: Safer Sex Camp
description: Source of all your playa safer sex needs: Safer Sex Kits with condoms, lube, gloves, and dental dams.  All Kits are free, not for sale, not for barter.  Look for Kits in blue Outpost Bags.  Also home of Making Erotic Fetish Wear from Rubber Inner Tubes, Women- Only, Liquid Latex Body Painting (See What When Where for days & times)

name: Safety First
description: A safety minded themed camp featuring live electronic music insanity, D.J.s , Experimentation's in sound, and a safety mind alcoholic watering hole

name: Sake To Me
description: Sake To Me is your neighborhood sake bar. Stop by for a comfortable shady pitstop, some great chilled sake, and test your skills at a giant version of Jenga.

name: Sakenoma
description: Looking for the coldest, most refreshing sake on the playa?  Well, look no further than Sakenoma, Black Rock City's original sake bar!  Adults only, please.  Kanpai!

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, and interaction with other beings. We invite the Burning Man community to visit our friendly, comfy quadruple Do-Me Domes any time, stop by for a dance at our Prince Butt Funk cordial, or enjoy one of our healing fairs offering massage, readings, or relationship counseling.

name: Samba Stilt Circus
description: Samba Stilt Dance Entertainment for every event. Bringing Color and Flair to every inch of the world!

name: Saran Sarong
description:
Need some alternative Playawear?  Then try out our Saran Sarong.  We offer a selection of beautifully colored semi-transparent plastic wrapping options to adorn portions of your body either as your primary fashion ensemble or as an accessorily to accompany your nearly completed playa persona.

Either put on your new Saran Sarong yourself

or

Step onto the Turntable of Fashion and allow our technicians to spin you into a colorful translucence of playa plastic couture.

Bubble wrap also available while supp

name: Sat Chitti City Ananda Bang Bang!
description: An inspiring, uplifting, artistic experience of yoga to explore our existence (Sat) of consciousness (Chit) and bliss (Ananda). Please check the WhatWhereWhen Guide for pre-scheduled class times, and stop by the camp to check our ever-expanding schedule board for spontaneous additions daily!

name: Saturday Morning Cartoon Camp
description: Bringing you the best of Saturday morning cartoons and sugary, sugary cereal goodness on everyday but Saturday.  Bring your own bowl and spoon!

name: Scarbutts Cafe
description: Wake Your Ass Up! Come on by at the crack of Playa dawn (10:30am - noon) to get your daily spanking and hot coffee. Yes, from Tuesday through Friday your friendly semi-corporate pawns will be serving up brisk spankings and piping hot, super-strong coffee! Bring your own cup.

name: SchizoFrenzy
description: SchizoFrenzy is a team of highly-energized Southeastern US burners: bringing you the Alchemy CORE project located around the Man, the never-before-seen SuperCube interactive dome, UV Rorschach art, the actual AdultSwim SchizoPhrenzy game and we're the home of the OctoBus art car. We will also be hosting a Southeastern Burner Mixer late in the week on playa, so join us!

name: Science of Churchology
description: Come and play with us. If you enjoy thumb wresting, have a match in our Thumbderdome, it's like Thunderdome, but our dome is less than three feet wide. Or a game of chance perhaps? If you dare play our toy gun Russian roulette game with water balloons filled with stage blood. Losers will taken to our coffin where you will be reborn, maybe take on a new playa name? And you will have a new lease on life. :)

name: Scotch and Hop
description: Scotch and Hop, a spot goof around on a playground, play some games and have fun. Don't forget there is Scotch...

name: Senior Prom
description: Senior Prom is a dance hall.  There will be a prom Queen and King coronated daily.

name: Sensual Pleasures, The Camp of Sensual Pleasures
description: The Camp of Sensual Pleasures is dedicated to providing pleasure for women.  Our offerings will be hair washing and massage by Pope DB, and we will be the home for the Orgasamator Experience that was hosted at Spanky's Wine Bar (RIP) in years past.

name: Serenity Giant Game Camp
description:
Serenity Giant Game Camp is back this year and we’re growing, we’ve added some new games to our camp. So come be a kid again and enjoy giant versions of Mancala, Connect Four, Jenga, Checkers, Backgammon, and Qwirkle to name just a few.

No more searching for people who aren’t embarrassed to play kids games. Check our calendar for other events and watch for the Giant Connect Four mutant vehicle.

name: Sew Sew
description: Our camp is based around teaching people how to sew/knit/crochet, if you already know how, come join us to repair and/or enhance your playa wear.  Nearly everything you need is supplied (ie. fun fabrics, yarn, sewing machines, insanity, etc.), just bring yourself and maybe a friend (or six) and pimp your playa wear!

name: SEX Filth Avenue Boutique
description: SEX FILTH AVENUE Boutique 24/7 self service. Donations desperately needed. Recycle your old naughty sexy playa wear. Bring a big bag of costumes. Cleanup & Restocking daily 9:30AM volunteers clean up and put out new costumes. They get first pick of the new costumes. Don't miss out. 3:15 on "A"

name: Sexagon
description: Swing by our singular six-sided living room to relax, or...get busy! Climb to see 360 degrees of BRC from our Observation Deck, 20 feet high (seems higher), pass our PlayaPilot? cycling challenge to receive your Official Pilot's License and bike ID tag, peruse and position a panoply plastic people pursuing pleasures in Barbie's Sexagon, or feel your own Hoopdance joy!

name: Shady Waffle
description: Burning Man can be pretty intense: the people, the music, the motion, the heat... our goal is to provide an escape from all of that. A shady, cozy nook on the playa where you can take a yoga class, meditate, or enjoy a peaceful breakfast.

name: Shadyvil
description: Shadvil is  a welcoming, laid-back haven for the weary playa traveler.

name: Shakti Tribe Shake Face Camp
description: Creatures in the wild instinctually know that shaking after a stressful experience releases trauma in their physiology.  We, at the Shakti Tribe Shake Face Camp celebrate this wisdom and say “Bring on the Shake!”

name: Sham Rock City Pub
description: Sham Rock City is an Irish inspired pub, created to serve the thirsty masses at our beloved party in the desert.  We are an all inclusive watering hole that celebrates the hard working members of the Burning Man Community. We are a live music venue and will host many dance parties along the way. Our goal is to put a jig in your step and jolt in your cup. Hope to see you at Sham Rock City Pub!!!

name: ShamanDome
description: Shamandome is a collective of "Shamanistas" - people interested in developing our understanding and practice of ancient wisdom for the good of others and ourselves. We find joy, community, identity, and healing through shamanic drumming journeying, and helping you do the same.

name: Shangri-Lawless
description: A lost paradise for sun-beaten adventurers, or a den of chaos for the wild hearted? Come to investigate for yourself the legends of Shangri-Lawless.

name: ShangriLa
description: ShangriLa is known as an imaginary remote paradise on earth, utopia so to speak. Also known as a distant and secluded hideaway, usually of great beauty and peacefulness. Our theme camp will be ShangriLa for you and your playa friends and we will adhere to the managing principle of Black Rock City by Participation, Radical Self-expression, and Leaving No Trace! Hope you'll stop by our camp!

name: Shangri_Lawless
description: A lost paradise for sun-beaten adventurers, or a den of chaos for the wild hearted? Come to investigate for yourself the legends of Shangri-Lawless.

name: Shantytown
description: Come chill with us at Shantytown... Orgasmatron head massages, leisurely arts and crafts, and best of all: join us every sunset for Sunset Curries- don't forget your bowl and spoon! Ohhh yeahhh.....

name: SHARKEY'S BAR AND LOUNGE
description: Sharkey's Bar AKA the Preferable Party Past the Porta-Potties is known as the "Cheers" of the BRC.  Come join us for cold beverages served daily by our mixmaster Sharkey.  Bar opens when the Shark awakes and closes when he sleeps.  We cater to young and old, an awesome vibe as described by most.  We do temp BRC themed tattoos and are staffed by former neighbors who are now friends and camp mates from across the globe.

name: Shibumi
description:
Shibumi (shi-boo-mee)  n.
1.  a rare kind of personal excelence; a state of effortless perfection.
2.  a balance of simplicity and complexity.
3.  where's Andrew?

name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge
description: The scattered remains of a vintage sailboat beached upon the rocks of a forbidden isle. Join the castaways for afternoon grog, flaming rum drinks, and the spectacle of classic tiki culture at their exotic driftwood bar of handmade idols, gods, and flaming totems. Beware of cannibals!

name: Show Us Ur Pits
description: Woohoo! Show us ur pits!

name: Siberian Electric Company
description: A nuclear powered vodka bar with a stage for people who like to expose themselves. Come on by. Get contaminated.

name: Sign Post Forest
description: Ventucky Burners return to the Playa and happily bring BRC citizens, "The Sign Post Forrest." This amazing inter-active oasis crafted from found, recycled, and re-purposed materials, is a fresh expression of classic technology, connecting old and new friends, both on and off the playa!

name: Silicon Village
description: Join us for Tesla coil demos, cool down in the misting booth, take a windsurfing lesson, refill your bike tires, get an airbrush heart tattoo, check the time at the big sundial, see the Merkin fashion show and SO much more. We love to meet new people and are looking forward to seeing YOUR face in our HOLES: cartoon cutout photo-ops.

name: Simple Times
description: Camp Simple Times keeps things simple.  We have a porch, a rocking chair, and a slow-goin perspective for good ol' times.

name: Sin City
description: "What happens in Sin City stays in Sin City." Sin City is a place where freedom of expression is embraced. There are many things to see and do at the Party Naked Tiki Bar, BRC Airbrush, Sin City Day Spa, Sin City Costume Exchange, DNA's Wrongs of Passage and much more. There are lots of photo opportunities and something always happening here. Come and check out our village schedule of planned events.

name: Sin City Costume Exchange
description: Donations of gently used costumes welcome. Come browse our selection of playa costumes that we’ve been collecting on Thursday. Leave with a fun new costume for the playa and you can even pay it forward when you donate a gently used costume that no longer suits you. Come early for the best selection.

name: Sin City Day Spa
description: Take a MIRACLE “SHOWER”. Learn how while you are on the playa you can “shower” with two glasses of water and feel squeaky clean. It’s a miracle! All you need to do is bring your own towel. Other services include foot moisturizing, sun screen or aloe vera application, and more. Come by and check for hours of operation and full services list.

name: Sin City NYC Fetish Tribe Club
description: New York style evening kinky parties. Come try out the suspension gear and other fun equipment. Strictly for adults only! Come with a sense of adventure and try something new and kinky. Check for schedule of lessons and parties.

name: Sin Cuty Stage
description: OK, so it’s not so much a stage as a space in the front of Sin City. Daily demonstrations and activities are planned. Check out our hoop demonstrations and join in. Practice hoops will be available 24 hours a day and the extras will be handed out on Sunday. Enjoy our Mega-Twister board. Yoga instruction with Uma as scheduled. Watch evening traveling fire performances in front of camp from here. Check our posted schedule for days and times.

name: Singers' Sandbox
description: A creative, constructive playground for vocal music enthusiasts.

name: Sk8 Kamp
description: skate junkies with no cement to ride on, get your fix on the ramps at Sk8 Kamp

name: Skinny Kitty Teahouse
description: Regroup and Relax at our teahouse with Skinny and friends; serving tea 24/7. We offer a refuge from the blistering sun and the blustery winds by providing a piano and space for performance, music, conversation, funk, yoga, art, and copeira.....or whatever your heart desires to offer.  Bring a cup and meet our cats!!

name: SLURP
description: SLURP serves delicious nutritious wet noodles in the afternoon.  BYO bowl/cup if you can.

name: Slutgarden
description: Remember those guys who treated you like shit just because you wanted their crappy vodka drink? Fuck those guys. Slutgarden will dress you, drink you and dance you into perfection.

name: Smile for Grandma: Rights of Flashage Cafe
description: Come enjoy hot beverages at this friendly neighborhood cafe'. Smile for Grandma while you pose in our Rights of Flashage Family Photo Wall, fill out a census form and hang out with the friendliest people on the playa.

name: smoke on the water
description: Relax ; sit down on Morrocan style cushions,savor the Hooka pipe,while enjoying the exotic flavored sheesha as intoxicating aromas of frankincence and myrrh, and sandalwood drift through the tent. Indulge in the ancient art of all natural organic henna body art.

name: Snack Food Glory Hole
description: Open your mouth, close your eyes, and get snacked! 80% delicious, 90% interesting, 100% food.

name: SNO*PAC
description: EAT THE YELLOW SNO. Don't worry, we got your PAC.

name: Snow Koan Solar
description:
Snow Koan Solar provides a solar-powered charging station where Burners can recharge batteries of ll shapes and sizes.
Camera's, car batteries, whatever... bring them over.
We also serve snow cones each afternoon @ 4pm in a festive and music-filled dome. Come by.  You can recharge, relax and refresh.

name: Snowflake Village
description: Snowflake Village (since 2001) is a home for Midwesterners and far-flung travelers. Our many smaller displays combine into one massive interactivity zone.

name: So Fly Tribe
description: We can help you fly high! At the 'So Fly Tribe' learn to make kites with all the materials and instructions to get high on the playa!

name: Society for the Perpetuation of Empatheogenic Celebrations (SPEC)
description: A Canadian collective dedicated to promoting community events that engender an empathetic bond between the participants.

name: Solnishko
description: solnishko - diminutive word for the Sun (russian).  At camp solnishko, we will recreate the warm, light and life-filled atmosphere that the Sun provides to the Earth and its inhabitants in the form of live and recorded music, warm beverages at sunrise, cool smoothies during the hot hours, and yummy snacks at various times.  We will also engage our guests in active meditation of Shaolin tradition, invite them to practice soccer and poi spinning skills and much more.

name: Sore Nipple Camp
description: The World Famous Sore Nipple Camp is back an *&%$# than ever.  Ladies come by and see how many CD's you can put on your nipple (record 15) or enjoy a nice inner thigh message with the Sybian.  Games and trivia daily!!!

name: Space Cowboys
description: Shaking your business since 1997.

name: Space Gnomes
description: Galatic party enablers.

name: Space Gnomes
description: Galatic party enablers.

name: Space Island
description: Home to a band of space pirates who cause mayhem and disorder with their art car: the Space Wench.

name: Space Virgins
description: The Space Virgins invite you to experience our portal into the Space Time Continuum -- where you will experience a new place and time of cool comfort and verdant, jungle luxury.

name: Spaghetti Taco
description: From the fertile desert of New Mexico, we are a Mixed Food Camp, specializing in Spaghetti Tacos.  Come for the Ass-Impressions, stay for the Chicken Fighting, Fish Rodeo.  Fortune Telling, Captain Cuervo, Duct Tape Wallets, Magik, Costumes, Green Chile, and the KouchWhole Mutant Vehicle!!!

name: Spandex and Steroids
description: Challenge our Gladiators at 2 games of physical skill: "Assault," where contestants dodge pneumatically launched tennis balls while shooting foam missiles and arrows at a target and "Joust," where the first to fall off a gimbaled platform loses. Helmets and jock straps provided. Spandex encouraged.

name: Spank Bank Camp
description: Your Past. Your Future. Your Bank

name: Spank of America
description:
Black Rock City's finest bank.
Get your bottom robotically spanked on our ATM (Ass Thwacking Machine).
Enjoy the mist system,"Bottom Bar",bank/spank satire art and videos. Swag...stickers and glow mugs.
Our motto.."We give till it hurts".

name: Spank the Monkey Lounge
description: Wet your whistle at the Spank the Monkey Lounge, enjoy virgin burner shots, playa friendly poontang (aka the playa screwdriver) as well as other refreshing beverages.  They come with free harassment from our assortment of monkey clad bartenders, we'll try not to throw poo.

name: SparkleSpaz RainbowTron 20:11
description: A spazatronic collective celebrating silliness, sunshine, sparkles, rainbows, robots, the future, the present, and the past and possessing a healthy dose of Midwestern-bred sarcasm! Our Mission: Spread Fun!

name: Spicy Krunchy Camp
description: Camp Spicy Krunchy is a collection of freaks that dig the spicy and the krunchy in reality. We also host and supply the post apocalytpic mobile wellness center art car project. Come and have a ride! Have you experienced spicy Krunchy? Come and visit us and say that you have!

name: Spin Art Camp and the Delfuego Art Wall.
description:
Make A Spin Art  Masterpiece
Make a large Spin Art on 15" x 20" core board... or take off your shirt and make a one-of-a-kind wearable Masterpiece! Every day from noon to 3pm. Also, all day every day, come and paint on the 40-foot long Delfuego Art Wall.

Spin Art Camp and the Delfuego Art Wall.

name: Spin Cycle
description: The Spin Cycle is a hoopiong camp for all spinners.  We create an enormous shaded space with a killer sound system for spin jams whenever the community asks for it.

name: Spirit Dream (Interpretation Café)
description: Perhaps it's your thirst, the smell of fresh ground coffee, the sounds of steam, the rhythms of percussion, or something deeper that draws you to us.  You fill your cup and decide to stay.  As your body rests, your spirit is stirred.  A gentle wave washes over you, drawing you into the encounter tent.  The atmosphere is charged and the filling of your soul and spirit begins.  Welcome to your Spirit Dream.

name: Stalker Camp
description: Have you ever wanted to be a stalker? Well we can make your stalker dreams come true.  We have many colorful stalking stories if you come by our camp and if you are really adventurous, go for a consensual stalking adventure that we will set up for you.  Come back to our camp with your Stalkee and you will receive a commemorative necklace and a patch.  Let the stalking go on!

name: Stardust Lounge
description: When the Stardust Casino was reduced to a pile of ashes, dust, and memories, witnesses swore they saw a glittering swirl of purple smoke drifting Northwest. Pawn your jewelry and double down at the Stardust Lounge, where dirty martinis and dirtier cocktail waitresses rekindle the spirit of old Vegas.

name: Steam Bath Project
description: Steam Bath Project welcomes visitors to share a steam bath experience.  Visitors are invited to enter the geodesic dome and relax on wooden bench where boiling water produces steam and negative ions that fill the dome.  This process results in a clean body and improved respiratory function.

name: Steampunk Saloon
description: Gents and Ladies: Indulge in a trip back to the future in our rollicking Steampunk saloon.

name: Still Stings Camp
description: Still Stings camp this year will feature Mama Kabuke's Big Tent, the Moroccan Tea Lounge and the Soul Cleaners.

name: Straight 2 the Dome
description: Two domes and a whole lot of bass! Tired of bad music? So are we, and we take great pride in it. Come by and tell us what you would for a klondike bar!

name: Street Life: Hip-Hop comes to the Playa
description:
Street Life 2011: Hip Hop comes to the Playa

Picture Mr. Rodgers swigging a 40oz beverage while listening to Public Enemy.  Street Life is bringing the story and soul of Hip-Hop to the Playa with the levity and neighborhood feel of Sesame Street.  This is OUR version of a metropolis: the nostalgia we all feel for Sesame Street and the urban swag, bounce, and flavor of Hip-Hop.

www.streetlifecamp.tumblr.com

name: Stretchy Camp
description: Come by and give your spine some love with choices including inversion table, body balls, massage tools and a nice chill zone with hammock & cots.

name: Sukkat Shalom
description: The mission of Sukkat Shalom is to “nourish the faith of those who sleep in the dust.” For three years, Sukkat Shalom has gathered disparate sparks of the Divine contained in all persons, forming a space for interconnection and exchange between all religions and cultures present on the Playa.The energy of such a convergence is used to elevate life on earth to more closely resemble a heavenly paradise.

name: Summer Camp Sync
description: A collection of intentional communities bringing the spirit of collective hospitality to the playa! We welcome you to join us in celebrating rites of passage.

name: Sun Guardians
description: Sun Guardians is a place for creative men in a supportive and engaging environment to help perpetuate creative energy. Considered a collective, it remains open to anyone who wants to sign up, but has a focus on masculine energy. Although this camp might be seen as a “gay camp” it does not exclude any males who identify themselves differently.  If other apply, they will not be denied to not exclude anyone with a honest commitment to the collective.

name: SuNido
description: Su Nido, "one's nest", is the place to roost in between your rites of passage on the playa this year. More than just a cozy lounge, use our hemi-sync meditation technology to rewire your nervous system, and become a Citizen of the Universe in a unique and magickal ceremony that honors our connection to the One.

name: Sunrise Coffee Camp
description: Come over and visit us from sunrise until our pots run dry.  We will share hot coffee and all the fixings with you to greet the new day or finally send you off to bed! Use of personal cups is greatly appreciated.

name: SuPer DuGs!!!!
description: SuPer DuGs You're DOIN it Wrong!!

name: Super Friends
description: Whether you loved the Super Friends or love your SUPER friends, stop by and get friendly with us. Hone your hooping skills, strike out at wii bowling, or get cozy with us during nap-time; whatever the super occasion, we are your Super Friends too!

name: SurlyCamp
description: SurlyCamp, home of the SurlyBird celebrates it's 10 year anniversary at the BRC.  We're still a bunch of obnoxious assholes, still home to the best djs and mobile party on the playa and still paying it backwards.  Now fuck off.

name: Suspended Animation
description:
Experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage rides, workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties. We also rove the playa and build impromptu bondage sculpture!

Stop by for a rite of passage that will leave an indelible mark on your memory.

name: Sustainable Sound
description: Home of the Sustainable Sound (AKA lowRes) Pedal Powered mobile art project (Sound, Light & LEDs). Other fun stuff too!

name: Swag Mart
description:
SwagMart is an Oasis of creativity located in the heart of Black Rock City. We provide shade and music with FREE unusual materials to create Swag, Necklaces, Earrings,and noteworthy embellishments for your Playa wear.
Join us for a bit of shade, fun conversation and meet Burners from all over the Planet.

name: Sweaty Betty's Misting Parlor / The Mon Salon
description:
Rejuvenate, invigorate and experience an overall cooling sensation from head to foot as you stroll through our misting tunnel and watch the smiles emerge while body temperatures drop, open each day during peak heat on the playa.

Salon style, emergency hair washing services offered for those with crunchy hair (you know who you are...) open 10:00 to 3:00, Crunchy hair only please...Other spa services offered...Volunteer opportunities...Tea...

name: Swing City
description: Swing City returns to the playa with more momentum and fun!

name: Syncytium: Reset
description:
Traverse the mysteries of the hereafter with Existential Liquidators, the most trusted cut-rate custodian of souls on the playa!

Witness your own funeral!  Jettison your worldly baggage!  Enjoy a personalized eulogy from a Board-Certified
Existential Minister!  Overhear the words of loved ones from the other side!  Traverse the mysterious Tunnel of
Spacetime!  Enjoy the beaches of Purgatory!  Be interrogated by an astral tribunal!  Dance to '80s music!

Experience all this and MORE at Syncytium: Reset!

name: TaH-o-e
description: Yachting with the Christina's TaH-o-e's!

name: Tahopia
description: North Lake Tahoe Burners - "Think outside the cube!"

name: Tangoed up in Blues
description:
Discover what it's like to hold a partner in your arms and move to the music.  Tango.  Blues Dance.  Join us in re-popularizing partner dance in America.

We'll have the music going around the clock for you to come explore these two intimate dances with a friend, lover, or even a stranger.

name: Taos re:Camp
description: an oasis in the creativity and chaos that is black rock city

name: Tarwater
description:
Tarwater returns with the Tarry Bowl-a-Rama and the Tarot Croquet Court.  Play in the day time.  Play after dark.  At night, our Light Garden will be lit.

Watch out for unscheduled acoustic music, and more.

name: Tasty
description: Tasty is the support camp sponsoring the Solarium art project

name: Tattoo Oasis
description:
Tattoo Oasis is a sacred space for people to engage in body modification while reflecting on tattoo as ritual. See how people have used tattoos as rites of passage, share your own stories, and come get inked* on the playa!

*Supplies provided will include paint, stencils, stamps, henna... but no needles!

name: Tequila Shack
description:
Experience the true Right of Passage.

Come lick the huge Salt lick that thousands have licked before.
Serving REAL Tequila on the Playa since 2006

Daily Shootings from 4-5PM Daily.

name: Terminal City
description: Terminal City is a village of theme camps including The Booby Bar, APOKILIPTIKA, Playawaste Raiders, SEX Filth Avenue Boutique, Espresso Camp, and M.A.S.H. 4207th.  Join us for many fun games, interactive features, and nightly theme nights at the Booby Bar. Terminal City - No Gas, No Food, No Mercy.

name: That Bloody Camp
description: That Bloody Camp returns with its haven of morning-after repose. We will cut through the dust of the playa and the previous night's excesses with spicy bloody marys and even spicier servers.  And of course we will give you space to relax, connect and maybe even make a new friend.

name: The Artists Of Debauchery
description: Come meet The Artists Of Debauchery and express your interpretation of debauchery with us.  "Bond" with us and be gifted away to someone else, play debaucherous games where only you can decide where too far is.  Most of all, come sin with us.

name: The Big O-vum
description: The Big O-vum is a 8 foot tall community use egg shaped oven for baking your eggs sausages cookies and other foodie delights.  Have a drink with us at the bar while the smell of your exotic dinner wafts across the plaza, enticing others to visit the oddly shaped and inspiring cooking machine, The Big O-vum!

name: The Black Rock City International Post Office Village
description: Not just an average BRC Post Office, an International Post Office Village!  Featuring Ritual Delivery Services: Rituals delivered & performed anywhere on the playa, The Portrait Passage post card making, Eurotrash: the schengen of the 9:00 Plaza, a History Museum for BRC Philatelists, and, of course, lot's of good ol' bureaucracy, E-Mail Playagrams, on and off playa mail & Playa-O-Grams from your beloved BRCPO 2.0. Come play, hang out, volunteer or just wait in line. "Next!"

name: The Chillage
description: The Chillage is an oasis of replenishment for tapped-out Burners who want to move their body and stimulate their stomach, eyes and ears. With a vegan-friendly breakfast restaurant, a grilled-cheese experience, fat beats, a low-key dance floor, mellow yoga classes and sound, light and video art installations,  the Chillage is the place to go to find your inner chiller.

name: The Church of Big Science
description: The Church of Big Science is a refuge for science at the Playa. Can you pass the test to pledge your soul to science?

name: The Cowbell Saloon
description: The Cowbell Saloon is a dive honky tonk 10x16 shade structure. Need more cowbell ? Furry Bar, Cowbell centric music interaction area, and Photo Booth ! Your hosts the More Cowbell M.C.

name: The Crossroads
description: The Crossroads is the epicenter of musical, social, and physical collaboration through Live Music Performances, burlesque, dance, libations, conversation, art and vinegar. We welcome any and everyone to come join our tuneful, mutil-cultural, social orgy!

name: The Daily Planet
description: Come visit The Daily Planet for shade, fresh water mist and great social scene.

name: The Dirty Goddess Day Spa
description: The Dirty Goddess Day Spa is now on the Playa! Come by and get refreshed in our dome, or enter our daily "Dirty Goddess" contest and be rewarded with all the accolades such a lofty position deserves!

name: The Dump
description: Where the worlds most fabulous musicians and dancers from MarchFourth Marching Band, Vagabond Opera, and The Saloon Ensemble are dumped and recycled to endlessly create music from a by-gone era.  Come sing, dance, play our piano, and join-in as we all share electronic-free acoustic joy!

name: THE DUSTY KITTY LOUNGE
description: The Dusty Kitty Lounge - Home of the Romper Shroom (The Magical Mushroom Bounce House) and the Land of Lounging Kitties. Lounge in our shady dome or Find your inner kitty by bouncing under the towering mushrooms!

name: The Electric Sheep Farm
description: Come peruse our stock of beautiful realistic looking Electric Sheep so real your neighbors will believe you own a living pet! Be warned any suspected replicants may be subjected to our Blade Runner's Voight-Kampff Test! Will you flip the turtle?!?!?!

name: The Empire of Dirt
description: The Empire of Dirt is a conglomeration of old-time and new fangled; the Valhalla down home experience.  It is the support camp for The Front Porch and the Honorarium project The Serpent Twins.

name: The Fun Cult
description:
The Three Rules of Fun Cult:
1.) Have Fun
2.) If your fun is getting in the way of someone else's fun, go have your fun somewhere else*
3.) Safety* 
* Optional

name: The GreenHome Effect.
description: The GreenHome Effect is an incubator for creative seed starting. Just as you use a greenhouse to cultivate plants, we offer our GreenHome to cultivate human interaction through play, experimentation, art, ideas, rituals, skills, dreams, games, subversion, and activism.

name: The Gypsy Monkeys
description: Gypsy Monkeys help the masses on their rites of passage by giving them sagely advice, fortune telling, and graphology.

name: The Haze Stage Brotherhood
description:
Join us on our hazing game stage to out-frat your challenger!
Our goal is to recruit Phaternity Brothers, Sisters and the Undeclared (it's a tri-sexual institution - we'll try anything!) through the ancient ritual of subjecting people to public humiliation for the entertainment of others.

name: The Hive
description: A buzzing mass of madness from the East descends upon the desert, full of burning light and energy.  Is the Hive full of honey, or stings?  Bathe in our glow, and discover!

name: The Hookah Lounge
description: Come to the Hookah Lounge and enjoy our premium flavored tobaccos, teas, and coffee. Our Moroccan style lounge serves up shisha filtered through juice and water every night starting at sundown. The plush seating, soft carpeting, and great people make this the ultimate chill-out zone.

name: The Inner Temple Tribe Camp
description: The Inner Temple Tribe Camp, Teaching and performing Belly Dance with live music and Lively people.

name: The Institute
description:
Ah, the Institute... of higher learning? higher earning? higher yearning?
Perhaps. Or perhaps just a center for the study of the wide-spread, grievous affliction of bicoastal disorder. We'll never tell. We merely guarantee round-the-clock experiments with the edges of art, technology, and movement.

name: The Janky Barge Collective
description: The Janky Barge collective is a crew of DJs, producers, dancers, builders, mayhem enthusiasts, and mischief makers. A family of friends that works hard and plays hard, we aim to provide some of the best music and cleanest sound on the playa. Come and join us for adventure and whomping good times!

name: The Key
description: Bringing you the KeyHole Lounge, a basement porno den from the 70s, complete with shag carpet, wood paneling and mustaches.

name: The Lost Boys
description: Peter and the Lost Boys are BACK! This year with a covered wagon, MORE BACON, a movie night with S'mores, and teeter totters.

name: The Lost Penguin Cafe
description: What could be more lost in the desert than a Penguin? Drop in and enjoy our shade, couches, wine, chocolate, snow cones, friendly people and entertainment. Night and day there is always something or someone interesting at The Lost Penguin!

name: The Mad Tea Party
description: Mad Hatter's whom quench the thirst and warm the shriveled and stiff. Meet, greet, and... Care for a cup of tea?...

name: The Master-BASS-Sin Station
description: The Master-BASS-Sin Station is a colaborative effort of many minds bringing the finest in SUB level bass music to the Burningman community. Our goal is to get the playa shaking with deep deep beats!

name: The Mine
description: The Mine is the art support camp for "Bapteme de fue" by Anton Viditz-Ward.

name: The Ministry of Douchebaggery & The Mystery Dome
description: The Ministry of Douchebaggery is comprised of many art cars, artists, DJs, and long time burners, many with 10+ years on their playa resumes. We strive for eco-conciousness, community awareness, intelligent partying, and unity through music. Besides which, we're an awful lot of fun.

name: The Oontz Pouch
description: An oasis of oontz providing rolling brownouts mixed with pouch hits straight to the dome. Come oontz us!

name: The Paradise Motel
description:
Paradise Motel is the most garish of roadside motels; yet the best of the "no-tel" genre, where weary travelers are invited to stop in for a snow cone and enjoy some progressive beats while lounging by the "pool".

This year's roadside attraction is Dirty Summer Camp, where you can re-live your most capricious teenage memories...or the ones you wish you'd had... Snow cones served daily, gifts of unopened bags of ice are greatly appreciated.

name: THE PERFECT WORLD
description:
Welcome, Bienvenue,

Perfect World the only one officialy unofficial french camp is back !

This year, we continue to welcome participants from all backgrounds.

Everyone can find his place in the animation provided many surprises await you ...

name: The Phage
description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth's living diversity. These ubiquitous viral lifeforms evolve faster than any other life on earth.  Phage scientists and artists will evolve your minds with lectures, dancing, yoga, capoeira, open debate, and interactive art.

name: The Pier Support Camp
description: The Pier support camp is just that, a camp dedicated to supporting The Pier.

name: The Polygraph Camp
description:
Come test your current beliefs about Career, Love/Sexuality, Faith, and Family.

In the exhibit, the participants' physiological output from a polygraph will be monitored and projected onto a large screen.  Participants will be asked to choose among the four topics they would like to explore: Career, Love/Sexuality, Faith, Family.

The prize for successfully passing the polygraph test will be a 10-minute massage by a professional masseuse.

name: The Purple Palace Camp
description: You've found the theme camp of the Purple Palace art car and the Purple Parasites! We leave here at apprx. 8:30pm every evening (xcept thurs), if you want to guarantee your spot on the Palace this is the place to be! If you want to take a art tour on the Palace sign up at the Artery 1 day in advance.

name: The Sand Trap
description: Fore! Come play golf. Dancing gophers welcome!

name: The Seed
description: The Seed provides fertile ground for BRC citizens to germinate, take root, and experience life altering Rites of Passages.  Try your first taste of Kombucha at our Bar, meditate an educate in our Star Lodge with a ceremony or a reading, cool your body, melt your heart and open your mind in our plush Dome with daily yoga, workshops and experiences led by powerful practitioners.

name: The Shallow End ( in Martini Village)
description: The Shallow End - A place in Black Rock City for the citizens our diverse community to come and enjoy a variety of activities appropriately designed with each year's theme in mind.  This year come and pass through our Rabbit Hole.

name: The Spenard Bar
description:
real Alaskans bringing you a taste of old time Alaska !!
come enjoy our Fur Rondezvous and Spenardigras events or just chill on a couch and watch the show on our stage...

name: The synchroniciTEA house and JuJu Parlor
description: We believe in an everyday sort of magic -- the inexplicable connectedness we sometimes experience with places, people, works of art and the like; the eerie appropriateness of moments of syncronicity.  It's TEA time!  ?

name: The Temple Of The Flying Spaghetti Monster
description: The Temple of the Flying Spaghetti Monster A refuge for all Pastafarians Yearning for a brief touch of His Noodly Appendage. Nightly sacraments and events will fill the hearts minds and mouths of devotees with praise and piratical yelling, and dust! Come on by and see the Temple! ?

name: The TriBe ~ Laser Lounge
description: Swing by The TriBe where every evening we invite all questionably sane playa hippies in for an evening of music, "frolic" and just slightly kinkified shadow dancing! Hang at the Laser Lounge bar and cuddle in the hormone dome or, just make-out 30' in the air while the laser lounge is rocking out below!

name: The V-SPoT: Volunteer Here!
description: The V-SPoT is Burning Man's official Volunteer Headquarters in Black Rock City. Where VCs, Managers and Staff come to seek Volunteers and where Burners come to find out how to help. Our friendly Volunteer Experts are here to answer your questions and help you find your "special place" on the Playa. Volunteer needs change often; we work pre-event to post-event and have lots of ways for you to contribute!

name: The Wanderer's Camp
description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, libation and Hot Dogs. We also provide information about the Black Rock's early inhabitants/explorers/wanders, provided on a kiosk for all to enjoy!

name: The Worlds M ost Inviting Climate Camp
description:
The World's Most Inviting Climate Camp arrives at Black Rock City in 2011 providing tasty organic fruit to playa citizens in need.  Check in with us Monday - Friday in the heat of the day (1PM-5PM - ish) for sweet fresh nourishment.

Join us for our White Russian Party on Thursday afternoon as well.

name: ThemeCampTestAllYes
description: ThemeCampTestAllYes

name: Things That Swing
description: We've got your traditional swing set, hammocks and a 15' aerial silk. For those who like to watch, our suite of Chaos Pendulums are sure to mesmerize. Get your inner swing on with yoga classes and chanting circles. And at night, we open The Bonobo Lodge, a heated dome for adult workshops and play. So whether you're a kid in years or at heart, there's plenty of things for you to swing here.

name: This Camp is Bullshit!
description: Is your bike the shit, ready to run with the Bull? Probably not. Come down and outfit your bike with customized horns.  This way you will be ready Friday to Run with the Bulls. Supplies are limited. Because, This Camp is Bullshit!

name: This is Not the Camp Youre Looking For
description: This is Not the Camp You Are Looking For is the base for the Death Star art car, and the home of Star Wars lovers.

name: ThunderBubble Circus
description:
Always evolving theme camp, whose primary focus is creating a magical space for the awakening and free expression of the Self.
We offer a community for all walks of life and interests.
All talents are welcome to the circus.

name: Tiki Fuckos
description: Tiki Fuckos - Your adventure party group. Hiking, Hooping, Rock Climbing and Biking is what we're all about!

name: Time Colony
description: A certified resource center for time travelers and the temporally dislocated. We provide time travel visas, messaging services, and entertainment from the Historical Preenactment Society.

name: Time of Your Life!
description: A global camp with collaboration from Canada, Costa Rica, Russia, and USA creating a space to gather, grow, and play.  We are DJ's, dancers, artists, shakers, and movers here to guarantee the Time of Your Life!

name: Tissue and a Plan
description:
Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don't know what to go do next? Camp Tissue and a
Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear
plan and a clean tissue. 'Cause all you really need is a tissue and a plan...

name: Titicaca
description: On the shores there is light.  High in the Andes mountains, Lake Titicaca stirs our primal energy, which creates a beautiful dance around our ceremonial fire.

name: ToneAge
description: ToneAge is a camp full of like-minded, geographically disparate, brought together on the playa, music loving, age ranging, high desert fashion, sunset waking, sunrise walking, did I mention music loving, music making makers. Come meet us - or we'll find you!

name: Tough Love Lounge
description: Doling out tough love in the form of constructive criticism, supportive heckling, and radical honesty in an intimate environment and positive chill space.

name: Transmorphagon
description: Transmorohagon has as many sides as it has.  Home if the Transmorphagon Live performance space & The Cuboctahedron Art Project

name: Trashistan
description: Home of the Black Rock City's Next Top Assassin competition. We will also be offering heckling and surprise spiritual services.

name: Tree House
description: A tree house is a rite of passage! We'll be serving up strong beverages as we square off against the neighbors in a modern adult but childish war of the Tree House gangs.

name: Tren Way Bike Camp
description: Drinking gang with a biking problem.  Riding dirty in La La Land.

name: Tropical Twister
description: Tropical Twister is a giant 25 ft square Twister game that also has Badminton available if that's your thing. Look for the palm trees at the entrance, and bring your camera for photo opportunities at our Island Photo boards

name: Troy Camp
description:
Troy Camp, home to the Trojan Horse Project, will include one of the most fabled living venues at Burning Man--Vertical Camp--which made its first appearance in 2005, built by a San Francisco team of real estate and design enthusiasts.

This year, it anchors a city with a central plaza, towers, and a 2,500 sq. ft. mural by NY artist, Jordan Betten. Four satellite centers will have communal areas, large shady oases, and lookouts.

name: True Mirror Palace
description: True Mirror Palace brings True Mirrors to the playa - mirrors that reflect you without being reversed!  Look for the amazing person that we see all the time, and that gets lost by being backwards in a regular mirror

name: Tsunami Bass Experience
description: Tsunami Bass Experience presents "the ~WaVe~," an interactive art installation created specifically for the facilitation of bass culture music appreciation which invites the audience to engage directly, in a tangible means with the art project. The ~Wave~ is a combination sound system, stage & dance platform in the shape of a breaking wave that is specially designed to submerge participants with full multi-sensory (audio, visual and kinaesthetic) enhancement in order to ignite the intuitive modality and dee

name: Tsunami Camp
description: Tsunami Camp sponsoring the Black Rock City Inconveninece Store where you will be served all sorts of inconvenineces.  Playa Fashion Makeovers, Body Painting, and host to the 4th Annual Lake Lahontan Syncronized Ice Hockey Game.

name: Tús Nua (Gaelic for "New Beginning")
description: Craic and Music served the Irish Way!!! Wake up and experience a New Beginning at the Irish Wake at Tús Nua.

name: Twin Freaks: Cirque du Freak
description: Ladies & gentlemen, boys & girls, freaks one and all! We bring to you the best show this side of Black Rock: Cirque du Freak. Start your daily ritual with some damn fine coffee and a slice of pie straight from the gods above, then enjoy some of our most strange and hypnotizing circus delights: carnival games, fortune telling logs, freak shows, and performances of playa magic. Last but not least, join us at sunset for the BIGTOP-FREAKOUT!

name: Two Lanterns
description: Best weddings on playa, Unofficial Playa Civil Unions (incl. rings/certificate), Black Rock Temporary Divorce, Annulments, Annoying Phone Booth, Crazy Traffic Light, Dreams Visions Hallucinations Fantasies and Joslyn’s Little House of Oral Delights.

name: Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves
description: O illustrious merchants of the flesh and pillagers of the wealth of man, our glorious master, Uli Baba, he who is magnificent and just, he who rules with the wisdom of Soloman and the might of Saladin, commands your presence at his slave auctions and workshops.

name: Undercity
description: Geekery and gothy rockness combine for a truly spectacular playa experience. Quests! Goth, Rock & Industrial dancing! Jackassery! Come see the fun side of the playa.

name: Undulate, Articulate & Bloom
description: Billion Jelly Bloom is an art performance project to float an undulating luminous jellyfish bloom through the night playa. Our mobile performer-articulated jellyfish sculptures attract, interact and participate in spontaneous playa encounters.

name: Universal Citizens At Play
description:
Welcome to the UnConventional Center where you can paint in our Gallery, relax in the Bliss Bar and take in the sights by day or the starry skies by night on the Observation Deck...lounge on the Ear sculpture and do a listening meditation, get your nails painted or become a Universal Citizen...it's all here!

You are invited to our annual 50's Housewife Party, Wednesday 1-4pm.

name: Up!
description: What Black Rock city lacks is rocks - so we decided to bring one, except rocks are really heavy, so we brought a climbing wall instead.  Rediscover your inner-monkey and come climb with us!

name: Urban Jungle Journey
description: Urban Jungle Journey is ready to pamper your mind, body and spirit. We are a group of medical doctors, alternative healers, and seekers of all sorts coming together to create new approaches to health and well-being. Our camp offers daily playful yoga, funky alternative healing activities and psytrance journey dance.

name: Vamp Camp
description: Stop by Vamp Camp for daytime cooling on the Mr Mister Stage and clean up with BRC's only fully functional bidet or stop by the Vamp Camp Bar at night and sit next to the Cauldron of Fire to warm up.

name: VegCamp
description: VegCamp invites people to consider how their choices affect animals, the environment, & humanity.  This year we're planning more vegan food giveaways, our popular Ask-a-Vegan booth, videos, lectures, discussions, cooking demos, photo exhibits, & more.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience
description: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience - We provide delicious Vietnamese Iced Coffee in a festive setting to the denizens of Black Rock City, and a variety of activities at our camp.  Please see schedule of events.

name: Village Green Preservation Society
description: Come visit the British inspired Kinks themed Preservation Society. Stop by for instructed meditation classes at our Shangri-la dome, free meals offered at the Animal Farm (featuring chefs from the Harvard Culinary Society), or just hang out and jam out with musical instruments on Denmark St!

name: Villains & Vixens
description: If your knowledge of fire has been turned to certainty by words alone, then seek to be cooked by the fire itself.  Don’t abide in borrowed certainty; sit down in the fire and burn, and by doing so find the fire within.

name: Virgin Dinner Camp
description: Hosting a dinner for random virgin burners, individually picked by camp members through their own creative experiences this year on the Playa.

name: Vitamin B Bar
description: Bacon, Booze and Boobs! What could be better? How about drinking games and playa shenanigans.

name: Voodoo Shooting Gallery
description: Shoot voodoo dolls with blow guns because it is fun and maybe we will give you a cup. You can chill and daily blog the old fashion way on the "I saw you when" board.

name: Vortex of Infinite Possibility
description: Walk the spiral into the Center of Infinite Possibility.  Upon arrival, you will discover exactly what you need to find:  a space for healing, magic, synchronicity, shamanic typhoons, energetic and spiritual cultivation, manifestation, transformation, and meetings of kindred spirits and destiny.

name: Voted Best Camp
description: Come on down folks to the rootenest tootenest punk rock bar on the playa. Try your luck on the halfpipe with one of our provided skateboards or marvel slack jawed at the incredible rock and roll coming from our stage that is played on ACTUAL INSTRUMENTS. Or perhaps you simply wish to thoroughly wet your whistle at our full bar; the choice is yours. No minors please- this isn't your entry level debauchery.

name: Vulcantown
description: Vulcantown is a camp dedicated to the teaching, practice and performance of object manipulation and flow arts.  Juggling, Fire Spinning, Hooping, and other movement arts have profoundly influenced our lives and we want to share that joy with the world.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: VW Bus Camp welcomes all Transitional Beings and new camp mates to join us for our 14th year on the Playa.  Relax in our Urban Jungle Day Spa, party in the Leopard Lounge Tiki bar and the Rasta bar, ride BusZilla 2 the VW Bus based articulated art car, grab one of our many hula hoops and hoop away while enjoying a brew, learn tie dying, all in a camp of dusty Burners and their fabulous VW Buses!

name: Wabi
description: Beauty in the imperfect, host of the Black Rock Warriors water battle games, home of an unforeseeable Something Awesome and the amazing Barbershop Infinitet, alternative energy nexus, welcoming space-age aluminet haven!

name: Waiting for Edward
description: Come join us for Whiskey and Sunscreen to get your day started or to end your night!  Open every morning.

name: Wandering Dudeists
description:
Come join our slowest growing religion in the world, the Church of Dudeism. We're a laid back group, drinking White Russians in the shade by day, and party-hopping hard by night. 
At our camp there may be marriages performed by an ordained Dudeist Preist, soap wrestling, scavenger hunts, fire-spinning, and news distribution--it all depends on what kind of relaxed we are on any given day.
Join us? Or whatever.

name: Want It!
description: Do you WANT a cocktail? Do you WANT some sushi? Do you WANT a cup of tea? Do you WANT a slap in the face? Do you WANT to dance? Well what the hell do you WANT?!?!

name: Warmbaby Camp
description:
Warmbaby_The Wet Dream: An interactive whimsical fantasy of rain in the desert.

http://warmbaby.tumblr.com/

name: Warp Zone
description: Come play on our towering pipe latticework, high above the playa.

name: We Do!  Do You?
description:
When the moment is rite, head to the chapel bar to renew your vows or vow to renew.

We Do! and hope You Do to!

name: We're OK Village
description: The Boise & Denver crew from the Altitude Lounge unite with the Bay Area folks from I'm OK, You're OK Corral to form the We're OK Village for 2011!  Join our daily playa virgin round-ups with OK branding station and catch a sunrise on our spectacular 5 story lighted tower too!

name: Wedlock Ranch
description: Wedlock Ranch.  A Wedding, A Square Dance, and A Gun Fight.

name: Welcome to Nowhere
description: Empire is now a ghost town. The future of Gerlach is unknown. Please come to Welcome to Nowhere and add you memories to our story board. After the event the story boards will be donated to the Burningman Gerlach office for everyone to enjoy.

name: WetSpot
description: The WetSpot Bar & Faceplant Lounge: Welcome to the best place on the playa to enjoy a home crafted beer while relaxing in our unique lounge. WetSpot is about making new friends in an open to all setting while engaging in musings around one of our favorite pastimes: brewing beer. Our crew includes homebrewers and non-homebrewers alike and provides an inviting atmosphere to sample and learn about the art and science of brewing beer.

name: What Would Duct Tape Do
description: Would Duct Tape be doing this or that or this or that? You decide! We are home to duct tape interactive art, body adornment (rose rings, bow-ties), bike decoration, repairs and anything else you can imagine. We will hold you together or hold other things together. Mix with us to find out more.

name: Where's Dr. Dre? Camp
description: Howdy all you Playa Goers!!! Join your old pal Dr. Dre as he adventures through the wacky wonderland of Black Rock City. The search is on! Have YOU found Dr. Dre yet?

name: Whisker Biscuit
description: Come enjoy aerial dance performances, take a load off over tea and puffs of shisha, get your very own snapshots at our photo booth, stretch you limbs while wearing a pubic wig, let your muscles be worked over or just swing by for a heart warming cup of tomato soup and a grilled cheese.  No matter what kind of Burner you are, Camp Whisker Biscuit has something for you!

name: Whiskey and Dust
description: Whiskey and Dust is a theme camp at the 2011 Burning man event. We are a Whiskey (and wine) camp with a small yoga problem. Our concept is simple. Capitalize on what the Burning Man community desires more of (Yoga, Lyra performances, Juggling, Hooping, and amazing hand Jobs). At the same time be challenging and creative to show the community something new and different. New This year for 2011! A cootie zone! Stripper pole!

name: Whiskey and Whores Saloon
description: We got Whiskey, we got Whores, what else do you F-ing need??!! Stop on into the famous-est Playa honky tonk this side of the Mississippi, and enjoy our stage-hogging troubadours, world-famous stripper contest, and beloved shots of bona fide rot gut: Just be prepared to give us your best YeeHaw and spin of the wheel, because when you walk in--you're a Whore too!

name: White Dragon Noodle Bar
description: If you sumo, you get in the VIP line for vegan shiitake mushroom noodles.  We also serve the lovely Leg Opener and the disturbing Concentrated Liquid Evil.  Every day at sundown.  Daytime workshops and discussions.

name: White Trash Superstars
description: Come party like a superstar! we've got community stages, shadow boxes, stripper poles, music, & shaded comfy couch area. BYOcup to pimp out n enjoy WT lemonade @ our lemonade bar and get your Airbrush "camp stamp" tattoo.

name: Wigg Party Camp
description: The Wigg Party is a resilient community organization based around the San Francisco bicycle route the Wiggle. Our camp takes what we do in San Francisco and brings it out to the Playa.

name: Wilde Oasis
description: The Wilde Oasis is a gentle yet exotic place with echoes of a canadian raincoast wilderness.  Come relax on our two person Oxacan wedding hammocks or have a carrot and watermelon early in the morning.

name: Writes of Passage
description: Join us at Writes of Passage as we spread the word of the written word! Come chill out and express yourself, and maybe even catch a literary workshop or live public reading.

name: Xenofeelya
description: Swooshing through the Burnerverse, sewing our alien seed, we Xenofeelyates will penetratingly probe you in precarious positions.  Have your mind wiped in our Xenofeelyatron, learn the finer points of probing in our warped workshops, and align with our armada!

name: XPAT ALIEN
description: To accommodate the growing number of aliens choosing Earth as their permanent residence, XPAT ALIEN hopes to smooth the transition to Earth based partying. Come share a beverage and swap intergalactic tales with fellow XPATs at the Crop Circle Cantina... look for the blue and silver spaceship circus.

name: Yabba Dabba Dome
description: Every action has a reaction, and every motion has an emotion. Crazy play time on the Jellinator in the Yabba Dabba Dome.

name: Yellow Gorilla Lounge
