description: The Yellow Gorilla Lounge is a 800 sq. ft. hexagonal tent with 320 sq. ft. stage at the center, lighting for night performances and a sound system available 24/7!  The elevated stage will be surrounded by playa pews for seating and cushions on carpet.  Please inquire on the playa to reserve facility for you or your groups.

name: Yes! Have Some
description: The Tiki Gods demand a rite of passage at the "Yes! Have Some" camp. Sacrifice your sobriety to the Angry Tiki Gods during the  ritual each evening as the day transforms to night. Partake in a variety of Tiki-themed attractions.  Lounge, drink, play.

name: Yeti Winter Wonderland
description: Yeti's from across the country come together provide a cool place to chill!

name: You Are Here
description: You Are Here provides space-time context you didn't know you were missing.  Visit the Black Rock City Historical Museum, which documents the rich history of our city over the centuries, contemplate our automated map of city hot spots and improve it using your own GPS tracks, then consider your new perspective on location from inside our eye-catching sculpture.

name: You Are That Pig
description: YATP Presents: This Little Piggie Goes to Market...come on out little piggy; show your naughty, haughty, playful, whimsical self in our eclectic meat market of the mind.  Performers, here's your stage; all are welcome.

name: Young Curmudeons
description: Where the young teach the world how to be old, including knitting, crocheting, heckling, and manner of dress.

name: YummyRUMInations
description: Live interactive performance oriented camp uniting burners through laughter, curiosity, and consciousness.  Mobile group performances, social experiments, storytelling and workshops...people leave with a smile and often come back for seconds.

name: Yurt Cafe
description: The Yurt Cafe will feature afternoon tea, shady refuge, and impromptu dust storm parties.

name: ZanZibar Lounge & Bar
description: Come chill an enjoy a friendly, engaging environment at ZanZibar Lounge & bar.  This is our 5 straight year playing music, hosting our thursday afternoon Rolling Stones party.  Ride on over, relax and enjoy a refreshing cocktail.

name: Zeitgeist
description: Camp Zeitgeist will be built emulating the circular cities of social engineer, Jaque Fresco's 'The Venus Project'. We will focus on promoting awareness of the current failing economic system, and present viable solutions for the entire Planet.

name: ZENRG
description:
Enjoy in lounging, meditation, tea sipping, and sand sifting. RELAX!
is our philosophy. Step into our life size zen garden to rake your cares away. ZENsation with DJs, dancing, and sand play at night!

name: Zip Ties & Beer
description: We are Zip Ties & Beer; named after the two things that hold our camp together. Come by and say hello, we'll have plenty of both for you when your camp is falling apart - looking forward to meeting you!

name: !Zoom!
description: www.campzoom.org

name: (My First) Period Bar
description:
Serving liquid period libations in the afternoon and a nice thick goopy period in the evening, suitable for consumption at dusk.

Come and drink to that time honored tradition of initiation into womanhood in all its awkward and uncomfortable glory, surrounded by friends, strangers, and everybody's favorite aunt.

name: )'( Recycle Kids Toy Shop
description: This is a place for kids to come and get a toy out of our toy boxes. Maybe you would like to bring a toy home to your child or family member that could not attend. Each of our toys comes with a custom label so they know where the toy came from. Come on by and help your self to our kids toy boxes.

name: )'(Ooligan Alley (the )'( is silent)
description:
By day Ooligan Alley is a shady and welcoming haven for a cold beer, cider, or gin in a teacup under a well placed umbrella.  By night travellers can join us in an exploration of visual spectacles and temporary art.

Fun, frivolous & mostly English we love nothing more than dancing in fancy dress to our favourites DJ. This year we've brought them with us, so do come sink your teeth into our F1 rig.

name: 2011  KING OF CARNAVAL CAMP
description:
2011 SAN FRANCISCO KING OF CARNAVAL CAMP
CELEBRATE THE JOY OF HUMAN  BEING THRU SAMBA AND HULA DANCE

name: 64 Arts
description: 64 Arts creates live music and performance at Black Rock City's playa art installations, and offers events at our in-camp performance space. Visit us for details of our daily schedule, or for more information on bringing your performance to 64 Arts!

name: 7 Sins Lounge
description:
Embrace the Heat as the Playa's friendliest little slice of Hell returns for an 11th year!

Daytime again offers what sinners need – respite from the night with shade & slushy drinks!

But night brings what sinners WANT - the Wheel of Sins where our skilled staff happily delivers absolution & encouragement with a FIRM hand! So come earn your "Get Out of HELL Free" card and don’t forget our “Flaming Blue Phucks” on Thursday night!

Remember: Start your Sins at 7!

name: 7 Sirens Cove
description: A pirate bohemia where merrymaking, gypsy lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground.  Beware; it is futile to resist the 7 Siren’s call.
We bring light, levity, a bit of boom and a bunch of magic. Swing by for a wiggle, a giggle, a chat or a respite.
